title: Blue Nun Deutscher Tafelwein
Description: This top-selling wine phenomenon is back in a new and improved style. Nose is enticingly aromatic and floral with fruity notes of pear, orange, peach and herbs. The palate has a delicate sweetness,  with luscious but balanced flavours of pear, citrus and peach. Refreshing, mineral-like acidity on the long lively finish.

title: Fontana Di Papa White
Description: The grapes for this light and refreshing wine are grown on volcanic soils in the hills southeast of the city of Rome. A delicate and lightly fruity wine that excels as a partner for chicken, fish and light cuisine. Enjoy fresh bread, mushrooms, spice, floral and citrus flavours, with a soft minerally note on the finish.

title: Flat Rock Twisted White
Description: Traditional grapes with a twist. This is an off-beat blend of Riesling, Gewurztraminer and Chardonnay. Vivid pear, grapefruit, passion fruit, lime and stony mineral. Makes a great sipping wine or pair it with spicy calamari or roasted pork tenderloin.

title: Angels Gate Chardonnay VQA
Description: Meticulous vineyard practices ensure optimum fruit quality, and wines that are elegant in style. Enjoy upfront flavours of yellow plum, lemon, vanilla and hazelnuts. Medium in body, and made in a refreshing style, with lively acidity and a balanced finish. Serve with poultry, fish or pasta with a creamy sauce.

title: Mouton Cadet Bordeaux White AOC
Description: From France's leading wine family, a wine that has been the world's introduction to the Bordeaux region since 1930. A blend of sauvignon blanc, sémillon and muscadelle showing flavours of quince, vanilla, nuts and green pear with light cantaloupe note. Serve with seafood pasta, shellfish or salads.

title: Aveleda Vinho Verde
Description: Aveleda has been a family-owned business since the 1870s and vinho verde is their key focus. This one is pale lemon coloured with fresh lifted aromas of fresh bread, citrus, herbs and green plum and apple. Harmonious on the palate with balanced acidity and bright flavours that culminate in a zesty, slightly spritzy finish.

title: Deinhard Green Label Riesling, Mosel
Description: The vineyards of Germany's Mosel Valley are the source of some of the world's finest rieslings. Pouring a bright pale straw colour, Green Label has aromas of apple, melon and citrus. On the palate, it is soft with medium sweetness, balanced acidity and a minerally finish.

title: Navip Riesling
Description: Serbia's Fruska Gora wine region lies along the River Danube, and is home to some of Serbia's finest wines. This riesling is medium-bodied and floral, medium sweet and notes of caramel, grapefruit, herbs and cantaloupe. Serve with veal schnitzel, or cheese-filled pastries.

title: Moselland Bernkasteler Kurfurstlay Riesling
Description: Germany's Moselland cooperative is known for excellent value in fresh and lively wines. Enjoy lifted aromas and flavours of fresh herbs, slate, honey and citrus with balanced sweetness. Serve well-chilled with seafood, Asian-inspired noodle dishes or your favourite curry.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Chardonnay
Description: Chardonnay is the world's most popular white wine, known for its flavours of ripe pear, hazelnuts and vanilla. Smooth and light to medium-bodied, this wine has a hint of spicy oak, and a mellow, balanced finish. Serve with roast chicken, grilled vegetables or salads.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Pinot Grigio
Description: Easy drinking, refreshing white wine, sourced from vineyards in Canada and around the world. Shows aromas of cantaloupe, yellow berries and pear with a hint of chocolate. Extra dry, medium-bodied with refreshing melon, berries and pear flavours. Perfect for casual sipping or pair with light fare, salads and appetizers.

title: Citra Pinot Grigio Terre Di Chieti IGP
Description: The sunny vineyards of Terre di Chieti lie between the mountains and the sea in Italy's Abruzzo region. This zesty hand-harvested pinot grigio has aromas and flavours of citrus and stone fruit, with a touch of almond on the finish. Serve with seafood, chicken, salads and light cuisine.

title: The Vinecrafter Chenin Blanc
Description: Chenin blanc is South Africa's most planted grape variety, and this example is brimming with upfront aromas and flavours of button mushrooms, yellow pear, quince and spice. Serve this fresh white well-chilled, and pair with smoked trout appetizers, seafood pasta or a cheese platter.

title: Yellow Tail Chardonnay
Description: From Australia's largest family-owned wine company, a wine that's easy to drink and to understand. Aromas of shortbread, yellow pear, floral note, nuts and ginger. On the palate, it is extra dry and medium-bodied, with notes of pastry, pear and nuts leading to a clean finish. Serve with roast chicken or creamy pasta.

title: Jackson-Triggs Pinot Grigio
Description: From an award-winning winery comes this light and lively pinot grigio, offered in a range of sizes for all occasions. Pouring a pale lemon colour, look for aromas and flavours of lifted, fresh cantaloupe, ginger and spice. Moderate acidity makes this fresh, it is extra-dry on that palate with a clean finish.

title: Thirty Bench Winemaker's Blend Riesling
Description: From the Beamsville Bench, one of Niagara's best spots for growing Riesling. A classic, featuring ripe peach, pear and lemon flavours, refreshing acidity and a hint of spice. Makes any meal special, from simple ham-and-brie sandwiches to foie gras.

title: Danzante Pinot Grigio Delle Venezie IGT
Description: Made for consuming while young and fresh. The pale lemon colour leads to aromas of fresh white bread, mushrooms, nuts, honey and green melon. Fresh on the palate with balanced acidity and resonating light fruit character that lasts to the clean finish.

title: Flat Roof Manor Pinot Grigio
Description: Grown on rocky hillside soils in the Stellenbosch region of South Africa. Attractive floral, quince, yellow melon, pear and citrus aromas, followed after a first sip by crisp fresh quince, melon and citrus flavours. The finish is lively and clean. Serve with grilled fish, seafood or salads.

title: Goose Bay Sauvignon Blanc KPM
Description: Available at select VINTAGES locations.Gooseberry, passion fruit, grass, lime and grapefruit. Try with trout.

title: Ruffino Orvieto Classico
Description: Pale straw colour; aromas of yellow berries, fresh pastry, citrus with spice and golden raisin notes; dry, light to medium bodied, smooth, clean and fresh palate, shows flavours of yellow berries and fruit, lees and citrus with hints of light spice on the finish.

title: Liebfraumilch Drathen Qualitatswein Rheinhessen
Description: Liebfraumilch is a semi-dry light white wine from the Rhine region of Germany. Produced mostly for export, the Liebfraumilch name derives from The Church of Our Lady Monastery in Worms, Germany. Aromas and flavours of pear, cantaloupe and a touch of minerality and spice lead to a crisp finish. Pair with curry dishes.

title: Kim Crawford Sauvignon Blanc
Description: This sets the benchmark for New Zealand's intensely flavourful style of Sauvignon Blanc: think gooseberry, pea pods and passion fruit. Vivid and refreshing, it pairs well with steamed clams or mussels with asparagus risotto, or grilled chicken.

title: Marques De Riscal Rueda DO
Description: For 160 years, this Spanish award-winning winery has pledged a commitment to quality. A customer favourite, this wine is made with the native verdejo grape. Look for aromas and flavours of yellow flowers, citrus, fennel, with mineral and pear notes. Medium-bodied and fresh, with a clean finish, serve with seafood paella.

title: Folonari Soave DOC
Description: Founded in 1825 by Francesco Folonari, the winery has been crafting quality wines that express their place of origin. This blend of garganega and trebbiano is balanced and food-friendly. Pale straw color with spice, fresh bread and mineral notes, with tobacco and fig hints. Medium-bodied and fresh; pair with grilled shrimp.

title: Vineland Estates Elevation St. Urban Vineyard Riesling
Description: The vines for this Riesling, which are now nearly 40 years of age, were brought to Ontario from Weingut St. Urbans-Hof in the Mosel by Hermann Weis. They have flourished in the ancient, sea-born soils of the Niagara Escarpment. This wine is floral and juicy, with lime, peach, apple and a refined mineral note.

title: Woodbridge By Robert Mondavi Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Founder Robert Mondavi was a catalyst for the American wine industry. This fruit-forward wine is a light lemon in colour, with upfront aromas and flavours of kiwi, gooseberry, citrus and herbs. Medium-bodied with a refreshingly clean finish; perfectly suited to accompany California spring salad topped with grilled chicken.

title: Flat Rock Riesling
Description: From an industry leader, this floral Riesling comes at you with gorgeous mineral, peach, apple, and lime citrus with superb vibrancy and zest. Intense and complex and an amazing value, this is an Ontario gem.Try with spiced sushi or a spiced honey-glazed ham.

title: Beringer Founders' Estate Pinot Grigio
Description: From one of California's oldest wineries, this is made with fruit from California Delta, where vines enjoy warm, sunny days and cool nights. Extra dry, light to medium-bodied and fresh, with upfront flavours of fresh bread, pear and melon with balanced and crisp finish; serve well-chilled with salads, pasta or grilled fish.

title: Fontana Di Papa White
Description: The grapes for this light and refreshing wine are grown on volcanic soils in the hills southeast of the city of Rome. A delicate and lightly fruity wine that excels as a partner for chicken, fish and light cuisine. Enjoy fresh bread, mushrooms, spice, floral and citrus flavours, with a soft minerally note on the finish.

title: Bouchard Père & Fils Petit Chablis
Description: With grapes sourced from specific sites within the Chablis zone, this white shows lifted aromas and flavours of pine nuts, nutmeg, chalky minerality and fresh bread. The palate is light to medium-bodied, extra dry with vibrant acidity leading to a clean and refreshing finish. Serve with grilled calamari beside baby greens.

title: Bouchard Père & Fils Macon-Lugny Saint-Pierre
Description: The Macon region is the most southerly region of Burgundy, and the warmer climate is reflected in wines that show richness and intensity of flavour. LIfted aromas and flavours of nutmeg, roasted nuts, toast and canned pineapple. Serve with fish and seafood dishes, roasted chicken or a selection of fine cheeses.

title: Peninsula Ridge Sauvignon Blanc VQA
Description: Peninsula Ridge Winery is known for its quintessentially Canadian, cool-climate wines. Enjoy floral, kiwi and grapefruit flavours, with hints of yeast and herbs. This wine is aged in stainless steel to preserve the purity of the fruit's expression. Serve with seafood, salads or creamy-textured cheeses.

title: Jaffelin Bourgogne Aligote AOC
Description: Pale straw colour; lifted aromas of nuts, cantaloupe, vanilla and anjou pear; extra dry, medium bodied, with clean melon/pear flavours and balanced acidity on finish.

title: Barefoot Pinot Grigio
Description: Extremely versatile, food-friendly and enjoyable. Pale lemon colour with floral notes and aromas of pineapple, fresh bread, white melon and peach. On the palate, this is dry, fresh and medium-bodied with flavours of pineapple, melon and peach. The finish is long with refreshing fruity tones.

title: Latour Chardonnay Bourgogne
Description: Pale straw colour; aromas of toast, vanilla, oatmeal and nuts with yellow plum and pear. Balanced acidity and medium-body with nuts and pear on the palate followed by a clean finish.

title: Bouchard Père & Fils Pouilly-Fuisse
Description: Pale straw colour; lifted, savory spiced oatmeal, flinty/mineral, nutty, and underbrush nose with yeasty notes; extra dry, medium to full bodied, with savory fruit, flint and nutty flavours with a long, fresh finish.

title: Jackson-Triggs Reserve Sauvignon Blanc VQA
Description: Pale straw colour; floral, grapefruit, pear, white melon and cassis on the nose; medium-bodied, extra dry, balanced acidity, and a long lemony finish.

title: XOXO Pinot Grigio Chardonnay
Description: XOXO wines are smooth, easy to enjoy and ideal for any occasion. Pinot Grigio and Chardonnay grapes make a perfect match, with delightful flavours of fragrant fresh pear, nuts, cantaloupe and vanilla. This fresh, stylish white is great on its own, or pairs wonderfully with seafood, salads and sushi.

title: Deinhard Riesling Dry, Rheinhessen
Description: Pale straw colour; floral, nutty, citrus and yellow berries on the nose; clean, wax and citrus flavours with berry and spicy notes in the finish.

title: 20 Bees Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: Bees are hardworking, unselfish and in tune with their environment - all qualities that also describe Ontario winegrowers! Pale yellow colour, with aromas of grapefruit zest, wild flowers, yellow plum and melon. Medium-bodied and extra dry with a fresh finish. Serve with grilled chicken salad, smoked salmon or as a starter.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Dry White
Description: Pale yellow straw; Cooked pear and yellow apple aroma; slightly off-dry with soft round fruit flavours and light tropical fruit notes; easy drinking wine.

title: Wayne Gretzky Chardonnay VQA
Description: Medium yellow; red apple, citris & spice box aromas & flavours; dry, with crisp lemony acidity.Clear, medium lemon yellow. Aromas of green apple, citrus and mineral are combined with a rich mouthfeel showing crisp green apple flavours, finishing with a lingering citrus note.

title: Eastdell Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: A locally crafted pinot grigio, Pale straw yellow colour, it exhibits lovely aromas of nuts, pear, fresh fig and melon with similar flavours coming through on the palate. Medium-bodied and extra dry with a soft but refreshing acidity. This is well-suited for Cajun cuisine, pork tenderloin or create a delightful sangria.

title: Inniskillin Unoaked Chardonnay VQA
Description: Pale straw; soft ripe pear & spice on the nose; dry, light-bodied with crisp citrus, pear & spice flavours.Pale medium lemon; lifted aromas of yellow pear, white melon, vanilla and nuts; on the palate it is extra dry and medium bodied with flavours that repeat the aromas and a hint of spice on the finish.

title: Yellow Tail Pinot Grigio
Description: Pale straw colour; aromas of nuts, floral note, spice, mushrooms and herbs; dry, medium bodied, with mellow acidity, and delicate flavours of herbs and nuts.

title: Sawmill Creek Chardonnay
Description: Pale gold straw colour; aromas of oak, vanilla, pineapple and melon; dry, medium bodied, soft and buttery with a refreshing citrus finish.

title: Sawmill Creek Dry White
Description: Pale straw colour; aromas of citrus and apple; dry, light-bodied, crisp lemon and pear fruit flavours, with notes of peach and yellow apple.

title: Carlo Rossi California White
Description: Pale straw colour; pleasantly floral with a pear drop candy note; clean poached pear, honey and cantaloupe flavours.

title: Montalto Pinot Grigio Sicily IGT
Description: Pale straw with green highlights; light aromas of fresh pastry, black currant leaf with floral and citrus notes; extra dry, medium body; round fruit flavour and clean citrus finish.

title: Casal Thaulero Pinot Grigio IGT
Description: Clear pale straw colour; fresh bread, floral, quince, yellow berry and pear aromas; extra dry, medium bodied; floral, quince and soft melon flavours and clean lemon finish.

title: Alianca Vinho Verde
Description: Pale straw yellow colour; fresh, pronounced aromas of green plum, minerality and grapefruit; comes across as extra dry with intense and focused fruit and mineral flavours, crisp acidity and spritzy citrus finish.

title: Hochtaler
Description: Pale straw colour; mild aromas of fig, citrus and herbs that carry onto the palate; dry finish.

title: Citra Trebbiano D'Abruzzo DOC
Description: Pale straw; rather neutral aroma light body and flavour with short crisp finish

title: Gato Negro Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Pale straw colour; upfront herbal and gooseberry aromas with a hint of citrus; extra dry, fruity flavours with an herbal edge.

title: Château des Charmes Barrel Fermented Chardonnay VQA
Description: The grapes for this wine are hand selected and sourced exclusively from their vineyards. Light golden in colour with aromas of pear, vanilla, yellow plum, herbs and butter. Rich, creamy texture fills the palate, with a bright note of acidity that adds balance. The rich fruit flavours persist on the lengthy finish.

title: Pasqua Soave DOC
Description: Pale straw; delicate nutty, yeasty and citrus aromas and flavours with a hint of bitter almond; extra dry and fresh with a clean finish.

title: Kourtakis Apelia Moschofilero White Peloponnese IGP
Description: Clear, pale lemon; aromas of citrus, herbs with floral, minerally and mushroomy notes; extra-dry, medium in body, flavours are dominated by citrus and mineral notes, balanced acidity and a clean finish.

title: Beringer Napa Valley Chardonnay
Description: Founded in 1876, Beringer is California's longest continually operating winery. This Chardonnay is vivid and focused with tropical fruit, lemon, pear, toasty spice and zesty acidity. Creamy and round, this will be ideal for buttered lobster.

title: Colio Dry White
Description: Pale straw colour; delicate yeasty note with fig, pear and melon fruit on the nose; dry with soft acidity on the palate with a clean finish.

title: Oggi Botter Pinot Grigio DOC
Description: The freshness and zing of pinot grigio from Northern Italy give Oggi its light and charming, crowd-pleasing character.  Delicate aromas of lees - mushrooms and bread, lead to minerally, banana and nuts flavours. The finish is light and fresh. Serve as an aperitif or pair with garlic and chili prawns or grilled mussels.

title: Tawse Sketches of Niagara Riesling
Description: Always a great value for Niagara Riesling, this is a reliably vibrant wine, with sweet-kissed apple, lime, white peach, apricot and mineral and a long, intense finish. Pair with grilled fish or pork sausages.

title: Tawse Sketches of Niagara Chardonnay
Description: A food-friendly, great-value Chardonnay from one of Ontario's most lauded new wineries. There are loads of tropical fruit, pear, cinnamon spice and oak all perfectly balanced by fresh acidity. Will match everything from chicken Caesar salad to grilled crab.

title: Quinta da Aveleda Vinho Verde
Description: Pale lemon yellow with green highlights; aromas of nuts, grapefruit and herbs; extra dry, fresh and lively, with a slight spritz, steely mineral notes as well as flavours of lime, herbs and a cleansing touch of yeast on the finish.

title: Loios White
Description: Pale straw colour; floral, yeasty, nuts, citrus and herbal aromas; extra dry, medium-plus body; leesy, nuts and citrus flavours with a crisp finish.

title: Wyndham Estate Bin 222 Chardonnay
Description: Lemon yellow colour; fragrant aromas of toast, vanilla and nutty oak with fragrant fresh pear presence; extra dry, medium bodied with toast, vanilla and pear flavours; note of hazelnuts on the finish.

title: Trefethen Estate Chardonnay 2018
Description: 100% Chardonnay. A delicious, enticing Chardonnay which draws you into the glass with its fresh lemon rind and pith characters, balanced by a touch of perfectly judged oak sweetness. Very textural, showing strident fruit and a juicy finish. Score - 97. (Decanter World Wine Awards, 2020)

title: Barefoot Chardonnay
Description: Clear straw colour; vanilla, fig, toast, pear and nutty aromas; dry medium body; good fruit flavour with a touch of vanilla, well balanced.

title: Naked Grape Pinot Grigio
Description: Brilliant pale straw colour; delicate aromas of yellow pear, cantaloupe, floral note, quince and banana; extra dry and medium-bodied with balanced acidity; flavours of pears, melon and banana.

title: Cavit Collection Pinot Grigio delle Venezie IGT
Description: Sustainably grown in mountainous northern Italy, this is a best-selling pinot grigio, with flavours of green pear, light floral element, cantaloupe and quince. It's light-plus bodied, extra dry and notably food-friendly. Serve well-chilled as an aperitif, or serve with pasta, veal, chicken or seafood.

title: Woodbridge By Robert Mondavi Chardonnay
Description: The colour is a bright pale lemon; aromas of ripe pear and buttered toast are joined by hints of spicy vanilla; the wine is extra dry and medium-bodied with balanced acidity framing notes  of ripe pear, toast and vanilla; a medium length finish, with honey and toasted oak notes balanced by lemony acidity.

title: Domaine D'Or White
Description: Pale straw colour; subtle nuttiness with herbal and yellow plum notes, soft dry finish

title: Santa Margherita Pinot Grigio
Description: Vintages releases thousands of wines each year, and this is consistently a top seller. It put Pinot Grigio on the map with its refreshing green apple, peach and citrus notes. A favourite with a plate of antipasti, grilled chicken or seafood salad.

title: Gray Fox Chardonnay
Description: Soft and fruity with spiced apple and pear, serve chilled with grilled pork chops.

title: L'Epayrie Blanc
Description: Clean, simple and ready to enjoy, this L'Epayrie white is a timeless, uncomplicated customer favourite. The pale yellow colour is followed by light nutty, leesy and savory fruit aromas and flavours of nuts and yellow berries. Light to medium in body with a soft, clean finish.

title: Sandbanks Dunes White VQA
Description: Pale straw colour; citrus, nutty and herbal aromas with hints of fresh fig and cantaloupe; medium body with citrus, nuts and melon flavours, clean finish.

title: Reif Estate Riesling VQA
Description: Pale straw colour; aromas and flavours of ripe pear, floral note, biscuit, golden raisins and pine nuts; dry, medium-bodied with medium finish.

title: Beringer Main & Vine Pinot Grigio
Description: Pale lemon colour; aromas and flavours of pastry, fresh pear, with touch of minerality and floral, honeyed notes; extra dry, medium bodied with gentle acidity.

title: Concha Y Toro Frontera Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Pale lemon with a green hue; aromas of white citrus, green apple and gooseberry; flavours of lemon-lime, lemongrass and mineral; dry, medium-high acidity, medium body, with a lingering finish of citrus zest.

title: Fuzion Chenin Chardonnay
Description: Argentina's Fuzion combines innovation and tradition to create wines that have achieved worldwide recognition. This is an approachable white wine has a wide appeal. Enjoy soft floral, shortbread and citrus aromas, and flavours of candied citrus and melon. Serve well-chilled with chicken pot pie, or salmon en croute.

title: The Beachhouse Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Pale straw colour; grass, citrus aromas with light smoky, savory touches; dry, medium body; flavours match the aromas, with balanced, clean finish.

title: Cavallina Grillo Pinot Grigio
Description: Pale straw colour; cantaloupe, green pear, floral and golden raisins aromas; dry, light to medium body; melon and pear flavour with soft finish.

title: Sibling Rivalry White VQA
Description: Pale bright straw colour; aromas of grapefruit, nuts, herbs and ripe melon with a tobacco note; dry, medium bodied, with moderate balanced acidity and flavours of grapefruit, nuts, herbs and melon; refreshing medium to long finish.
By:: Henry Of Pelham Family Est. Winery

title: Wildass Riesling 2018
Description: J-L Groux and the team at Stratus make this off-dry Riesling in an approachable, easygoing style. Look for notions of peach, lime cordial and applesauce, and pair the wine with pork chops.

title: XOXO Pinot Grigio Chardonnay
Description: XOXO wines are smooth, easy to enjoy and ideal for any occasion. Pinot Grigio and Chardonnay grapes make a perfect match, with delightful flavours of fragrant fresh pear, nuts, cantaloupe and vanilla. This fresh, stylish white is great on its own, or pairs wonderfully with seafood, salads and sushi.

title: Adesso Chardonnay D'Italia
Description: This lovely chardonnay from Italy delivers on flavour. Pale yellow colour followed by aromas of fresh bread, coffee, earth, smoke and spice. The palate is light to medium bodied and filled with rich fruit flavours, hints of smoky oak and spice. The finish is warming and harmonious.

title: Open Riesling Gewürztraminer VQA
Description: Clear, pale straw colour; floral, peach and ripe pear; dry, with these plus herb and melon flavours with fresh citrus finish.

title: Pelee Island Chardonnay VQA
Description: Pale straw yellow colour; fig, stony, golden raisins, vanilla and yellow pear aromas and flavours; extra dry palate with intense and round flavours.

title: Sogrape Gazela Vinho Verde
Description: Pale yellow straw colour; floral aromas with nuts, fresh herbs and green pear notes; dry, medium bodied, with delicate fresh fruit flavours; bright and refreshing with a spritzy finish.

title: Wayne Gretzky No. 99 Riesling VQA
Description: Very pretty Riesling sporting ripe peach and fresh flower aromas that follow through on the slapshot...er...palate. Nice, crisp finish. Excellent value. Pair with grilled teriyaki chicken or shrimp skewers. (Vintages panel, Sept. 2013)

title: Pelee Island Lighthouse Riesling VQA
Description: Bright pale yellow colour; aromas of pine nuts, spice, fresh bread, floral note and honey; dry, medium bodied, fresh and lively, with flavours of nuts, spice and honey.

title: Inniskillin Riesling Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: Pale straw colour; waxy, delicate floral, pear, melon, peach and herbal aromas; dry, medium bodied with pear and melon fruit and herbal flavours; fresh, clean finish.

title: B & G Partager Blanc
Description: Pale straw yellow colour; light yeasty notes, also nuts and hints of savory, spicy aromas with echoes of melon and citrus; medium-bodied with fresh, clean finish.

title: Donini Trebbiano Chardonnay
Description: This is a blend made with grapes grown in Rubicone area, on the Adriatic coast between Bologna and San Marino. Aromas and flavours of fresh mushrooms, spice and lifted mineral notes - chardonnay contributes presence, and trebbiano lightens the body and aromas. Chill well and serve with grilled fish or light pasta dishes.

title: Terra Vega Sauvignon Blanc KPM
Description: Available at select VINTAGES locations.Floral with citrus and melon. Sip, or pair with grilled fish.

title: Laurent Miquel Pere Et Fils Chardonnay d'Oc
Description: Pale straw colour; floral, yellow pear, stony, herbal and melon aromas; extra dry, medium body, well balanced, with matching pear and melon flavours on the lingering finish.

title: Kim Crawford Sauvignon Blanc
Description: This sets the benchmark for New Zealand's intensely flavourful style of Sauvignon Blanc: think gooseberry, pea pods and passion fruit. Vivid and refreshing, it pairs well with steamed clams or mussels with asparagus risotto, or grilled chicken.

title: Fielding Unoaked Chardonnay
Description: Fermented in stainless steel at cool temperatures to preserve maximum freshness and vibrancy, this characterful, textured charmer has an alluring soul and will offer crisp apple, tropical fruit, melon and pear. Try it with grilled seafood or roast chicken.

title: Graffigna Pinot Grigio
Description: Pale straw yellow colour; aromas of citrus, fresh mushrooms, lees and herbs with light floral tones; extra dry, medium bodied, soft with balanced acidity, flavours of citrus, mushrooms and herbs with a nice seam of acidity and good finish.

title: Colio Extra Dry White
Description: Pale yellow colour; pungent, orange blossom aromas with herbs and honey notes that carry onto the palate; fresh, dry finish

title: Fazi Battaglia Verdicchio Dei Castelli Di Jesi DOC
Description: A winery with a long history of making quality wine; now run by the 4th generation. Pale straw yellow colour. Aromas of fresh bread, mineral notes, spice, nuts and mushrooms. The palate is fresh, clean, slightly spritzy, with balanced acidity and flavours of lees, spices, nuts and mineral notes.

title: Fuzion Alta Torrontes Pinot Grigio
Description: Pale straw colour; very floral - orange blossom, plus soft pear and melon aromas with savory and honey notes; extra dry with light to medium body; balanced citrus and pear flavours.

title: Boutari Moschofilero White
Description: Pale lemon; delicate floral, citrus, herbal and mineral aromas; extra dry and creamy on the palate, with flavours of ripe citrus, herbs and green apple; the finish is clean and lingering.

title: Funf 5 Riesling Rhein
Description: Bright straw colour; smoky, floral and mineral aromas; medium sweet; spicy and mineral flavours with clean finish.

title: Wente Morning Fog Chardonnay
Description: Pale straw colour; pear, floral and vanilla aromas and a touch of canteloup; pear and tropical fruit and soft vanilla oak flavour.

title: Sandbanks Shoreline Chardonnay Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: Sandbanks have been one of the leading wineries in Prince Edward County since 2003. A blend of unoaked chardonnay and pinot grigio that offers floral, pear, fig, melon and mango notes. Medium-bodied and extra dry with a finish that is delicate yet flavourful. Serve with seafood salad, Cajun cuisine or use in a Sangria.

title: Open Sauvignon Blanc VQA
Description: Clear pale straw colour; good intensity of citrus, gooseberry and floral aromas, with yellow plum and herbal touches; extra dry, medium body; citrus and gooseberry flavours with a herbal twist, medium finish.

title: Lindemans Bin 95 Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Pale straw colour; upfront aromas of grapefruit and passion fruit, with nutty and minty elements; flavour follows nose, round acidity balances nicely the wine's fresh fruit character.

title: Megalomaniac Homegrown Riesling VQA
Description: Clear, pale straw colour; fresh pastry, mushrooms, spice and quince aromas with a floral touch; off-dry, medium body; savory, spice, quince and a hint of honey in flavour with soft balanced acidity for a clean finish.

title: Silver Point Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Pale straw colour; citrus, nutty, yeasty, spicy and minerally aromas; medium body; nice core of rich fruit flavours with good acidity, yet still elegant; long strong finish.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Chardonnay
Description: Chardonnay is the world's most popular white wine, known for its flavours of ripe pear, hazelnuts and vanilla. Smooth and light to medium-bodied, this wine has a hint of spicy oak, and a mellow, balanced finish. Serve with roast chicken, grilled vegetables or salads.

title: Tawse Quarry Road Organic Riesling
Description: Floral with lime, lemon, nectarine and mineral notes. Complex and pure with excellent weight and texture. A precise and exquisite Ontario Riesling. Great with spicy Asian foods.

title: Konzelmann Chardonnay Unoaked VQA
Description: Bright yellow-gold; citrus fruit with light tropical fruit & vanilla notes; dry with a zesty, citrus finish.Bright yellow-gold colour; green plums, herbal, yeast and citrus fruit with nutty notes; medium-bodied with a refreshing, citrus finish.

title: Gatao Vinho Verde
Description: Pale straw colour; pretty floral and juicy pear aromas with minerally, citrus and nutty notes; extra dry, medium-plus body yet refreshing; slightly frizzante with biright clean finish.

title: Baron Herzog Chenin Blanc KPM
Description: Available at select VINTAGES locations.Nectarine and gooseberry. As an aperitif or with spicier food. Chill.

title: Pasqua Pinot Grigio Delle Venezie DOC
Description: Pale straw; the nose offers notes of spice, nuts, mineral, cantaloupe and banana; dry and light to medium bodied with a mellow, yet refreshing finish.

title: L'Epayrie Blanc
Description: Clean, simple and ready to enjoy, this L'Epayrie white is a timeless, uncomplicated customer favourite. The pale yellow colour is followed by light nutty, leesy and savory fruit aromas and flavours of nuts and yellow berries. Light to medium in body with a soft, clean finish.

title: Black Tower Rivaner
Description: Pale straw colour; floral, fragrant pear and peach aromas with citrus and spicy notes; medium sweet with floral fruit and balanced acidity.

title: La Chablisienne Les Vénérables Vieilles Vignes Chablis
Description: Old vines (vieilles vignes) produce less fruit, so the wines are more concentrated and flavourful. This classic, steely, Chablis features aromas of sweet apple, mineral and citrus. Ideal for grilled white fish, as well as oysters on the half shell.

title: White House Wine Co. Riesling Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: Pale lemon colour; delicate pear, tobacco, fig, herbal and nutmeg aromas; dry, medium body with fresh pear, tobacco and fig flavours.

title: Konzelmann Pinot Blanc VQA
Description: Straw yellow; floral, peach & melon fruit aromas; dry, medium-body, with nut, apple & citrus fruit flavours.Pale straw colour; grapefruit, green apple and floral aromas; extra dry, medium body; citrus and apple flavour with balanced acidity and clean lemon finish.

title: Ruffino Orvieto Classico
Description: Pale straw colour; aromas of yellow berries, fresh pastry, citrus with spice and golden raisin notes; dry, light to medium bodied, smooth, clean and fresh palate, shows flavours of yellow berries and fruit, lees and citrus with hints of light spice on the finish.

title: Trius Sauvignon Blanc VQA
Description: Pale straw colour; floral, gooseberry and passion fruit aromas with notes of herbs and nuts; extra dry, light-medium body; fresh passion fruit flavour with a long refreshing finish.

title: Robert Mondavi Fumé Blanc
Description: This iconic Napa expression is intense with a rich mouthfeel. It features toast, vanilla and roasted fruit tones along with ripe, bright apple, melon, lemon zest and tropical notes. The addition of roughly 15% Semillon adds a gorgeous silkiness to the texture. An intriguing classic, it will have good versatility at the dinner table and will work equally well with turkey dinner or grilled fish.

title: Fielding Pinot Grigio  VQA
Description: Very pale straw; grapefruit, herbal, spice, mushrooms and melon aromas; extra dry and medium-bodied with grapefruit, herbs, savory and melon flavours; well balanced with a touch of spice on the finish.

title: Pelee Pebbles Vidal Hibernal
Description: Straw yellow colour; mango, honeydew melon, honey, herbal and waxy aromas; medium acidity, dry, medium bodied; mango, melon, honey and herbal flavours.

title: Folonari Pinot Grigio Delle Venezie DOC
Description: Made in stainless steel tanks to preserve and accentuate its fresh character. Pale lemon colour, with inviting aromas of bread dough, nuts, citrus and light floral notes. Juicy on the palate with fresh fruit flavours matched by balanced acidity and hints of minerality that lead to a clean finish.

title: Cono Sur Chardonnay Organic
Description: A ripe and mellow style of Chardonnay; look for aromas of honey, floral notes, yellow pear, spice and yellow melon. The palate is medium-bodied with flavours of honey, pear and melon followed by a clean and fresh finish.

title: Cupcake Chardonnay
Description: Golden yellow colour; lifted aromas of smoky oak, yellow melon and spice; ripe, medium-bodied with a soft mouthfeel and soft balanced acidity; smoky vanilla oak notes, melon and spice flavours leading to a medium-long, balanced finish.

title: Bartenura Moscato
Description: Bartenura Moscato in its eye-catching blue bottle is slightly effervescent or 'frizzante' with notes of wildflowers, ripe melons and honey followed by flavors of pear, nectarines and apricot.Serve chilled, Bartenura Moscato is perfect on its own as an aperitif or enjoyed with spicy entrees.

title: Vineland Estates Semi-Dry Riesling VQA
Description: Medium straw colour; delicate pear, floral, minerally, quince and pine nuts aromas; pear, quince and nutty flavours; medium-bodied, off-dry with fresh medium acidity.

title: Hob Nob Chardonnay Pays d'Oc
Description: Pale gold colour; yellow pear, nuts, minerally, spicy and honey aromas; dry, medium body; round yellow fruit flavours with toasty oak finish.

title: Cave Spring Riesling Dry VQA
Description: Pale yellow colour; fresh lime and its blossoms, starfruit and mint on the nose with nutty/waxy notes; extra dry, medium bodied, clean, citrus flavours with refreshing acidity and finish.

title: Schmitt Sohne Mosel Gold Riesling
Description: Available only in Canada, this wine comes from Germany's Mosel region where Schmitt Sohne has been making expressive, flavourful wine for over 200 years. Medium sweetness enhances floral, smoky, citrus and peach flavours, and balanced acidity ensures a lively finish. Serve with smoked meats, seafood or your favourite curry.

title: Barefoot Moscato
Description: A crowd pleaser. Delightfully perfumed and floral, soft, sweet and low in alcohol - it's easy to enjoy. Shows irresistible aromas of ripe pear, peach and orange blossom with a touch of honey and honeydew melon. The palate is sweet with balanced lemony acidity, leading to flavours of exotic fruit compote with a citrus twist.

title: Carlo Rossi California White
Description: Pale straw colour; pleasantly floral with a pear drop candy note; clean poached pear, honey and cantaloupe flavours.

title: Goats do Roam White
Description: Light lemon yellow colour; floral aromas of honey, herb and citrus; extra dry, medium-bodied with soft acidity; honey, herb and citrus flavours with a touch of spice into the medium, balanced finish.

title: Liebfraumilch Drathen Qualitatswein Rheinhessen
Description: Liebfraumilch is a semi-dry light white wine from the Rhine region of Germany. Produced mostly for export, the Liebfraumilch name derives from The Church of Our Lady Monastery in Worms, Germany. Aromas and flavours of pear, cantaloupe and a touch of minerality and spice lead to a crisp finish. Pair with curry dishes.

title: Kourtakis Apelia Moschofilero White Peloponnese IGP
Description: Clear, pale lemon; aromas of citrus, herbs with floral, minerally and mushroomy notes; extra-dry, medium in body, flavours are dominated by citrus and mineral notes, balanced acidity and a clean finish.

title: Chapoutier Belleruche CdRhone White AOC
Description: Very pale straw colour with aromas and flavours of grapefruit, pear, honey, red fruit and cantaloupe; bone dry and medium in body.

title: Cave Spring Estate Chardonnay Musqué
Description: Fermented in stainless steel and unoaked so as to maintain every nuance of the delightful aromatics of the Chardonnay Musqué grape. This is a wine of refinement and class. Floral, yes, but it also offers bright citrus, tropical fruit, peach and a hint of vanilla. Try it with green salads or shrimp pad Thai.

title: Sawmill Creek Pinot Grigio Chardonnay
Description: A refreshing blend of pinot grigio and chardonnay provide great drinking pleasure in an easy to serve format. Pale straw yellow colour. Delicate aromas of pear, melon and apple with light citrus and vanilla notes. On the palate, it is dry, light and fresh in style, with soft acidity, and flavours of apple, pear and lemon.

title: Southbrook Connect Organic White VQA
Description: The colour of straw; aromas of citrus, herbs, yeast, yellow plum and melon; extra dry with refreshing medium acidity; citrus, herbs, lees and yellow plum flavours and a refreshing finish. Vegan.

title: Brights Maria Christina White
Description: Pale straw colour; floral, marzipan and fresh pastry aromas with underlying notes of citrus fruit; light to medium bodied and dry with soft fruity flavours.

title: Henry Of Pelham Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: Bright and sunny, this refreshing white bursts with grapefruit, fig and herbal flavours with hints of nuts and cantaloupe.
By:: Henry Of Pelham Family Est. Winery

title: Francois Lurton Sauvignon Blanc Bordeaux AOC
Description: Very pale straw; forward aromas of gooseberry, chamomile and herbs, nuts and toast; light-medium body with refreshing acidity.

title: Banfi Principessa Gavia Gavi
Description: Legend suggests that Principessa Gavia, daughter of the King of the Franks, fell in love with a soldier and the two fled to northwest Italy to escape her disapproving father. The village and wine of Gavi are named after her. Refreshing citrus, peach and pear. A great sipper, or aperitif it will be a fine match for salads, seafood antipasti, or lighter fish dishes.

title: Woodbridge By Robert Mondavi Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Founder Robert Mondavi was a catalyst for the American wine industry. This fruit-forward wine is a light lemon in colour, with upfront aromas and flavours of kiwi, gooseberry, citrus and herbs. Medium-bodied with a refreshingly clean finish; perfectly suited to accompany California spring salad topped with grilled chicken.

title: G. Marquis The Silver Line Chardonnay
Description: The Stone Road Vineyard's soil warms quickly and holds heat during the day, yet cools just as quickly at night. This assists in ripening the grapes while maintaining freshness and preventing the development of unbalanced flavours making this wine possible. A wealth of buttered toast, pineapple, peach, toast and oak spice. Perfect for grilled pork or chicken.

title: J. Lohr Riverstone Chardonnay
Description: This is a super-popular Chardonnay from the coastal region of Monterey. It's bursting with banana, mango, grilled pineapple and smoke flavours. Delightful with grilled salmon steaks, butter chicken, or smoky prawns with green-mango salad.

title: Santa Carolina Chardonnay
Description: Light lemon colour; hazelnut, vanilla, yellow plum, toast and butter aromas and flavours with subdued yellow apple notes; extra dry, medium-bodied, with balanced acidity and a cleansing nutty finish.

title: Pondview Dragonfly Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: Medium-bodied with lifted citrus, nuts and biscuit flavours with a mineral streak.

title: Sawmill Creek Riesling
Description: Pale lemon colour; aromas and flavours of citrus, with light floral and berry notes and mineral and herbal hints; extra dry with balancing acidity.

title: Errazuriz Estate Series Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Pale straw in colour, this medium bodied white has fresh grassy aromas, with lots of citrus and green apple, the citrus carries through on the palate and the finish is dry and refreshing.

title: Jacob's Creek Moscato
Description: Since 1847, Jacob's Creek has been one of the leaders in Australia's Barossa Valley. This aromatic, lightly bubbly wine is brimming with floral and ripe pear aromas, with nutty, berry and citrus notes. Medium sweet and easy-drinking, with citrus, pear and tropical fruit flavours. Pour with fruit salad or light desserts.

title: Adobe Reserva Sauvignon Blanc Organic
Description: Brilliant pale yellow with a green hue; pronounced aromas of herbs, citrus, minerals, bell pepper and spice; on the palate it is light to medium bodied and fresh, with flavours of herbs, zesty lime and bell pepper on a clean and refreshing finish.

title: Henry of Pelham Estate Chardonnay
Description: Henry of Pelham is one of Ontario's most trusted and beloved of producers. This Chardonnay is always an elegant wine crafted to emphasize focus and precision. It features bold, ripe fruit with vanilla, smoke, buttered toast and a creamy, long mouthfeel. A refined example of Ontario's prowess with Chardonnay. Try this with grilled pork ribs or grilled lobster.
By:: Henry Of Pelham Family Est. Winery

title: Henry Of Pelham Riesling VQA
Description: This lovely riesling from the Speck family has the potential for aging. The pale straw colour is followed by a bouquet of grapefruit and juniper with mineral and floral notes. On the palate, it's medium-plus bodied with a light spritz and dry, all balanced by moderate acidity and fruit intensity of citrus flavours.
By:: Henry Of Pelham Family Est. Winery

title: Santa Carolina Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Sauvignon blanc continues to grow in popularity - its crisp flavours and versatility at the table have made it Ontario's go-to wine for entertaining. Lightly yeasty, grapefruit and savory aromas followed by those of green apples and herbs; ripe citrus flavours. Serve with grilled fish, seafood pasta or vegetarian dishes.

title: Chapel Hill Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Pale straw colour; floral, grapefruit, herbal and mineral aromas; medium bodied, extra dry; soft citrus and herbal flavours with fresh, medium acidity.

title: Willm Gewurztraminer Reserve Alsace
Description: Pale gold colour; intense aromas of lychee, rosewater, pear and honeydew melon; off-dry with soft but balanced acidity, light to medium-bodied; flavours of linden blossom, lychee, pear with rose petals notes; finishes dry with a long rose and grapefruit rind flavour.

title: Jacob's Creek Reserve Chardonnay Adelaide Hills
Description: Medium lemon colour; upfront aromas of vanilla, butter, toast and canned pineapple; extra dry, light to medium-bodied with balanced acidity; vanilla, butter, oak toast and pineapple flavours; medium finish.

title: Jackson-Triggs Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Pale straw colour with a lively nose of lemon and green apple with a hint of herbs; fruit character is replayed on the palate; crisp and dry, with medium body.

title: Jackson-Triggs Pinot Grigio
Description: From an award-winning winery comes this light and lively pinot grigio, offered in a range of sizes for all occasions. Pouring a pale lemon colour, look for aromas and flavours of lifted, fresh cantaloupe, ginger and spice. Moderate acidity makes this fresh, it is extra-dry on that palate with a clean finish.

title: Las Mulas Sauvignon Blanc Reserva Organic
Description: Pale yellow, with aromas reminiscent of ripe tropical fruits with touches of citrus. Silky palate with good acidity and a long finish. Enjoy as an aperitif or with fish dishes.

title: Thalia Sauvignon Blanc Vilana
Description: Clear, pale lemon; lifted aromas of citrus, mint, rising dough and mineral note; extra-dry, medium body, soft acidity and flavours of citrus, mint and fresh bread on the finish.

title: Jackson-Triggs Vidal
Description: Aromas of delicate pear, honey, honeydew melon and citric, grapefruity note. Tasty with a green salad or grilled vegetables.

title: Caliterra Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Clear pale straw colour; minerally, citrus/lime, bell pepper, berry and mint aromas; extra dry, medium body with round flavour of citrus, bell pepper and berries, moderate finish.

title: Pelee Island Blanc de Blanc VQA
Description: Straw yellow colour; fruity and floral aromas with lemon and nuts; matching medium fruit flavours, long finish, well balanced, enjoyable wine.

title: Jackson-Triggs Vidal
Description: Aromas of delicate pear, honey, honeydew melon and citric, grapefruity note. Tasty with a green salad or grilled vegetables.

title: G. Marquis The Red Line Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: Straw yellow colour; floral, citrus, smoky and nutty aromas; extra dry, medium-plus body; round citrus, smoke, nuts and fresh fig flavours with fresh finish.

title: Batasiolo Bosc D'la Rei Moscato D'Asti DOCG
Description: Pale yellow gold colour; lovely lifted fruity and savory aromas - fresh mushrooms, nutmeg with pear and honeydew melon; medium sweet, slight frizzante; balanced flavours of pear and melon, with medium length finish.

title: Yealands Sauvignon Blanc Marlborough
Description: Yealands is gaining notoriety for consistently producing quality wines at affordable prices. In the glass this straw coloured wine offers cassis, floral, gooseberry and herbal aromas; the palate is extra dry, medium-plus bodied; bright cassis and gooseberry flavours and a refreshingly clean finish.

title: Santa Carolina Reserva Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Bright, pale lemon-green colour; upfront aromas of kiwi, gooseberry, grassy with more green fruit notes; extra dry, fresh acidity and medium-bodied; flavours of kiwi, gooseberry, white pepper and lime; medium finish.

title: Beringer Main & Vine Pinot Grigio
Description: Pale lemon colour; aromas and flavours of pastry, fresh pear, with touch of minerality and floral, honeyed notes; extra dry, medium bodied with gentle acidity.

title: White House Wine Co. Vidal Moscato VQA
Description: Pale yellow with green hues; floral, mango, pear, citrus and honeydew melon aromas; off-dry; sweet fruit flavours with citrus and spice note to finish.

title: The Pavillion Chenin Blanc
Description: Clear pale lemon colour; lifted aromas of mushrooms, citrus and spice with mineral notes; extra dry, medium bodied with medium balanced acidity and flavours of mushrooms, citrus, spice and a note minerality.

title: Clean Slate Riesling Mosel
Description: The steeply-sloped banks of Germany's Mosel River are home to the world's most celebrated riesling wines. Enjoy floral, herbal, mineral, lime and melon aromas and flavours. Medium-plus bodied, dry, with bright medium acidity that balances the wine's fruit intensity. A delicious pairing with spicy Mexican or Thai dishes.

title: Flat Rock Chardonnay
Description: Ontario has seen its international reputation for quality Cool Climate Chardonnay soar and if you are still looking for somewhere to build your own opinion, you'll be hard pressed to find a sounder foundation than this Flat Rock. Buttery, bright, vibrant and fruit driven with apple, pear, mineral and a  well-integrated toast, it is rock solid.Crab legs, or grilled chicken.

title: Cave Spring Estate Riesling
Description: Cave Spring's fine Rieslings have won much international acclaim. This one, from vines that are 20+ years old, features notes of peach and grapefruit alongside floral and stony mineral flavours. Shines with turkey burgers, cassoulet or baked ham.

title: Jacob's Creek Chardonnay
Description: Produced in south-eastern Australia, this modern chardonnay pours a rich yellow colour; the bouquet showcases lifted notes of butter, vanilla, pear and mango. Generous and well rounded with soft texture on the palate and balanced with defined fruit flavours and notes of buttery oak.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Dry White
Description: Pale yellow straw; grapefruit, yellow melon and floral aromas; extra dry with soft round fruit flavours and light tropical fruit notes; easy drinking wine.

title: Two Oceans Pinot Grigio
Description: Clear and pale straw in colour this refreshing pinot grigio offers aromas of nuts, cantaloupe, and pear; the palate is light to medium bodied with balanced medium acidity and fresh flavours of melon and pear followed by a minerally, citric finish.

title: Ironstone Obsession Symphony California
Description: The symphony grape variety is an Ironstone specialty, and it thrives in California's Lodi appellation. Aromas and flavours of orange blossom, peach, pear, ginger and nutmeg. Off-dry and medium-bodied with balanced fresh acidity and a crisp, clean finish. Serve with spicy cuisine or grilled fruit.

title: Cottage Block Sauvignon Blanc Riesling VQA
Description: Lemon green gold colour; floral aromas of citrus and nuts with hints of herbs and chocolate; dry, medium bodied; citrus and nuts, wax flavours.

title: Château des Charmes Aligoté VQA
Description: Pale lemon colour; fresh and defined aromas of citrus, herbs, nuts, melon and pear; extra-dry medium body; clear and refreshing flavours of citrus, nuts, melon and pear with moderate balanced acidity and a slight hint of herbs on the finish.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Chardonnay
Description: Chardonnay is the world's most popular white wine, known for its flavours of ripe pear, hazelnuts and vanilla. Smooth and light to medium-bodied, this wine has a hint of spicy oak, and a mellow, balanced finish. Serve with roast chicken, grilled vegetables or salads.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Chardonnay
Description: Chardonnay is the world's most popular white wine, known for its flavours of ripe pear, hazelnuts and vanilla. Smooth and light to medium-bodied, this wine has a hint of spicy oak, and a mellow, balanced finish. Serve with roast chicken, grilled vegetables or salads.

title: La Vieille Ferme Luberon Blanc AOC
Description: In 1970 Jean-Pierre Perrin of the French winemaking Perrins, applied his know-how to create a tier of value, good quality wines under this label. Aromas of fresh pastry, yellow pear, peach and honey, mirrored on the extra dry, moderate acidity palate, leading to a fresh finish. Enjoy with roast chicken or soft cheeses.

title: Mezzacorona Pinot Grigio
Description: Pale straw colour; fresh, berry, cantaloupe and fruity pear nose with a touch of spice; medium body, clean and fresh with berry and melon flavours and pear and spice on the finish.

title: Casillero del Diablo Reserva Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Pale straw colour; pronounced aromas and flavours of grapefruit and spice with minerally and herbal notes; medium body, medium acidity, fresh and juicy.

title: Trius Riesling VQA
Description: Pale straw colour; floral, mint aromas with ripe pear and honey overtones; dry, crisp with evergreen, pear and honey flavours; light to medium-bodied with a balanced acidity and clean finish.

title: Santa Carolina Reserva Chardonnay
Description: Pale straw colour; lifted toasty notes with yellow plum, vanilla and hazelnut fruit; medium bodied with toasty, yellow fruit and vanilla flavours.

title: Cloudy Bay Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Sophisticated Cloudy Bay Sauvignon Blanc put New Zealand on the wine world map. It delivers intense, now-classic flavours of gooseberry, melon, lime and minerality. Pair with grilled chicken, grilled calamari, mildly spiced vegetarian dishes or crab.

title: Jackson-Triggs Chardonnay
Description: Pale straw colour; light citrus and floral aroma with berry tones; these plus nutty-smoky touches on the palate, extra dry with a touch of spice in the finish.

title: Colio Dry White
Description: Pale straw colour; delicate yeasty note with fig, pear and melon fruit on the nose; dry with soft acidity on the palate with a clean finish.

title: Colio Extra Dry White
Description: Pale yellow colour; pungent, orange blossom aromas with herbs and honey notes that carry onto the palate; fresh, dry finish

title: Cono Sur Tocornal Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Medium-straw colour; aromas of nuts, berries and citrus; these plus herbs and grapefruit flavours on the palate with a crisp dry finish.

title: Ghost Pines Winemaker's Blend Chardonnay
Description: Specialists in sourcing and blending grapes from top sites across California, Ghost Pines forgoes regional specificity when creating their wines. It's a bold and successful model that allows them to take full advantage of California's best. This Chardonnay is crisp, fresh and tangy, with pineapple, pear, peach, apple, vanilla and toast notes. Pair it with grilled lobster or creamy chicken soup.

title: Pelee Island Blanc de Blanc VQA
Description: Straw yellow colour; fruity and floral aromas with lemon and nuts; matching medium fruit flavours, long finish, well balanced, enjoyable wine.

title: Decoy Chardonnay 2018
Description: This is an appealing wine that comes at a great value. Crisp acidity keeps it balanced against a backdrop of richer brioche, toffee and vanilla-cream elements. Editors' Choice. Score - 90. (Virginie Boone, Wine Enthusiast, Aug. 1, 2020)

title: Oyster Bay Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Popular Oyster Bay hails from the Marlborough region, ground zero for classic New Zealand Sauvignon Blanc. Expect notes of expressive lime, passion fruit, kiwi fruit and fresh-cut grass. Pair with sea scallops pan-fried in butter with asparagus on the side.

title: Sawmill Creek Riesling
Description: Pale lemon colour; aromas and flavours of citrus, with light floral and berry notes and mineral and herbal hints; extra dry with balancing acidity.

title: Santa Carolina Chardonnay
Description: Light lemon colour; hazelnut, vanilla, yellow plum, toast and butter aromas and flavours with subdued yellow apple notes; extra dry, medium-bodied, with balanced acidity and a cleansing nutty finish.

title: Stoneleigh Latitude Sauvignon Blanc
Description: The Stoneleigh Vineyard is situated on the northern side of the Wairau Valley in Marlborough. The area is known locally as the 'Golden Mile' of vineyards. This is a tightly focused and vibrant wine with mouth-watering acidy, tropical fruit, grapefruit, herbs and mineral. This is ideal for lemon-and-dill herbed fish.

title: Oyster Bay Pinot Grigio
Description: Oyster Bay has long been a flag-bearer for New Zealand premium wine. Their PG is zesty and juicy with generous peach, lime, grapefruit and minerality, and falls between the Alsatian and Italian styles. Enjoy with grilled pork.

title: Sprucewood Shores Riesling VQA
Description: Pale straw colour; aromas and flavours of rising dough, white spice, mushrooms, flowers and pine nuts; light-bodied, dry with moderate balanced acidity and a balanced finish with flavours that linger.

title: Wayne Gretzky Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: Pale copper colour; lifted pear fruit on the nose with hints of cedar and citrus; ripe pear, citrus and melon fruit on the palate followed by a dry, cleansing finish.

title: Pelee Island Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: Medium yellow colour; aromas of green pear, citrus, nuts and fresh herbs; extra dry, medium bodied, with pear and citrus flavours; fresh and cleansing finish.

title: Oyster Bay Chardonnay
Description: A real crowd-pleasing Chardonnay that shows there's more to New Zealand than Sauvignon Blanc. Apple, melon, lemon and well-handled oak - a model for trendy cool-climate Chard. Oysters are an obvious match, but try with sautéed fish or grilled pork chops.

title: Kacaba Unoaked Chardonnay VQA
Description: Pale straw colour; light aromas of nuts, citrus fruit and lees; light to medium bodied and fresh on the palate with green apple and citrus notes.

title: Angels Gate Pinot Gris VQA
Description: Pale straw colour; lifted, fig and  smoke aromas with hints of pear and nuts;  extra dry and fresh with a nice balance of fruit and acidity on the palate.

title: Zimmerlin Camerino Cuvée 2015
Description: Easy, approachable and simple to match with a range of light food options: that's why this blend of four wines is such a great go-to option.

title: Rene Barbier Mediterranean White, Catalunya DO
Description: Pale straw yellow with a green tinge; floral with herbal, citrus and nutty aromas; medium body, medium refreshing acidity, medium length finish. Quite enjoyable.

title: Dunavar Pinot Grigio
Description: Pale lemon colour; moderate aromas of fresh white bread, grapefruit, green apples with a floral note; extra dry and medium bodied; flavours of citrus, apple and other tree fruit; medium finish.

title: Hardys Stamp Series Chardonnay Semillon
Description: Light golden colour; hazelnuts, vanilla, toast, mango and pear aromas; extra dry, medium body, round, balanced nuts, vanilla, mango and pear flavours with a tropical fruit finish.

title: Black Tower Rivaner
Description: Pale straw colour; floral, fragrant pear and peach aromas with citrus and spicy notes; medium sweet with floral fruit and balanced acidity.

title: Baden Gewurztraminer
Description: Pale yellow colour; floral, fresh pear and lychee aromas, with tones of mango and honey; soft yet dry fruit flavour; persistent finish.

title: Two Oceans Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Pale straw colour; quince, citrus, minerally and yeasty aromas; extra dry, medium bodied, easy drinking with soft lingering quince and citrus flavours.

title: Featherstone Four Feathers 2020
Description: A blend of four white grape varieties (Riesling, Gewürztraminer, Sauvignon Blanc and Chardonnay) that's made in an easy-to-sip style, this popular local wine is always a stunning value. It'll pair beautifully with pad Thai and spring rolls.

title: Fresh Beginnings Moscato VQA
Description: Pale gold colour; lifted aromas and flavours of orange blossoms, honey and sweet pear; dry, medium bodied with moderate acidity.

title: Bonterra Chardonnay
Description: Tropical notes of pineapple and banana plus buttercream, caramel and smoke. This is a smooth, creamy Chardonnay. Bonterra's organic practices help express the vibrancy of the fruit. Pair with grilled shrimp, chicken tourtière or lobster with butter sauce.

title: The Barber Chardonnay 2016
Description: This is a great value Chardonnay from the Yarra Valley. Loaded with white peach and citrus, there's a touch of crushed cashews just under the spiced nougat notes. The lush texture provides an ample canvas for the dried honey, peach and toasty oak flavours while a slight spiciness on the finish combines with a carefully calibrated acidity for a lovely, long finish.

title: Inniskillin Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: Pale straw colour; waxy, citrus, candy, herbs and cantaloupe aromas; dry, medium bodied with nutty, citrus fruit and melon flavours; fresh, clean finish.

title: Snowy Creek White Blend 2015
Description: This generous, South Australian all-rounder is fresh and light enough to pair with everything from maple soy pork chops to Singapore noodles. Tropical fruit aromas on the nose give way to fresh melon and apricot flavours on the palate.

title: Robert Oatley Signature Series Chardonnay
Description: Complexity and elaborate, expressive flavours are benchmarks of Margaret River Chardonnay. This one is sophisticated and approachable, suggesting intense ripe peach, pear, apple and grapefruit notes in a rich, perfectly balanced, deftly oaked frame. An excellent match for roast chicken, turkey burgers or grilled salmon.

title: Megalomaniac Local Squeeze White VQA
Description: Pale yellow colour; aromas of pine nuts, fresh quince, tobacco, mineral and citrus; dry and medium in body with crisp quince, nutty and citrus notes; medium finish.

title: Fleur Du Cap Chardonnay
Description: Pale lemon yellow colour; aromas of pear, floral note and vanilla with light citrus and toasty notes; smooth and rich with pear and citrus flavours.

title: Trapiche Astica Sauvignon Semillon
Description: Pale straw yellow colour; quince, mushrooms, spice, nuts and herbal aromas; extra dry on the palate, with quince and nutty flavours, herbal notes, medium acidity and finish.

title: Tini Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Pale straw colour; light yeasty, starfruit and grapefruit aromas and flavours with an underlying nutty and herbal notes; light to medium bodied with a clean finish.

title: Bolla Pinot Grigio Delle Venezie IGT
Description: Pale straw; fresh bread, mushrooms, spice, pear and minerally notes; extra dry, medium-bodied palate with a fresh and clean finish.

title: The Dreaming Tree Chardonnay
Description: Medium lemon colour; toast, vanilla and fig aromas with notes of hazelnuts and white melon; extra dry, with ripe fig and melon fruit flavours; round and creamy texture.

title: Boschendal 1685 Chardonnay
Description: Boschendal began making wines in 1685; a testament to South Africa's rich viticultural heritage. This is a striking wine that overdelivers at this price. It's bold and impressive, with forward ripe tropical fruit, lemon citrus and oak spice, and remains buttery and complex through to the finish. It will be great with grilled or roasted chicken.

title: Kendall-Jackson Vintner's Reserve Chardonnay
Description: One hundred percent barrel-fermented Chardonnay with the richness one wants from California. Plenty of sunny fruit and lively freshness. Creamy and round with notes of buttered toast and tropical fruits. Try with char-grilled corn on the cob, or with grilled chicken.

title: Pelee Island Lighthouse Sauvginon Blanc VQA
Description: The estate owned vineyards are located in Canada's most southerly grape growing region. The pale lemon colour contains bright aromas of fresh green pear and herbs with caramel and floral nuances. Light-plus bodied and dry on the palate with vibrant lemon medium acidity that adds balance and a clean finish.

title: Sandbanks Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: Pale lemon; refreshing lifted aromas of pear, candy, melon and citrus; extra dry, medium body with more pear and melon flavours on the palate and a mellow clean finish.

title: Pierre Sparr Gewurztraminer
Description: This is a spicy, intense wine, with energetic aromas and flavours. It's structured and textured, showing brightly articulated rose, lychee, mango, lemon, and stony mineral notes. Mouthfilling and long, it will be ideal for Thai food.

title: Winzer Krems Gruner Veltliner 13
Description: Mineral driven; pale lemon in colour with bright aromas and flavours of grapefruit, lees, white pepper, with mineral and floral overtones.

title: Calmel & Joseph Villa Blanche Chardonnay
Description: Pale lemon in colour; lifted aromas of honey, pear, cantaloupe, a touch buttery; extra-dry and medium-plus body; with the same rich flavours detected on the nose; balanced finish and length.

title: JP Azeitão White
Description: Pale lemon; lovely flavours of fresh herbs, green apple, honey, pear and peach; dry and medium bodied; clean and refreshing.

title: Laroche Viognier De La Chevaliere
Description: 100% Viognier, matured 6 months in stainless steel tanks. Great intensity of yellow berries, red fruits and honey notes. Rich with more red fruits and spices flavours supported by a soft acidity.

title: Quails' Gate Chardonnay
Description: Founded in 1956, and owned and operated by the Stewart family, Quails' Gate is one of Canada's most important family owned wineries. This Chardonnay is round and rich with tropical fruit, citrus, golden apple, pear, and mineral. Great with roast chicken or with baked fish in a lemon cream sauce.

title: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Chardonnay
Description: Deep yellow colour; aromas of fig, floral note, toasted, nutty oak and vanilla; extra dry, medium to full bodied, with nice balance of tropical fruit and oak; fresh medium acidity on the long spicy finish.

title: Nederburg Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Pale straw colour; lifted nutty and herbal aromas with spicy and citrus notes; nuts, herbs and citrus fruit flavours, well balanced with a fresh, clean finish.

title: Open Smooth White VQA
Description: Pale lemon; aromas of pear, fig, floral tone, yellow plum and pastry; the palate is off-dry and medium body with flavours of ripe stone fruit, fig and a touch of honey on a soft finish.

title: Von Hövel Schwarzhofberger QBA Feinherb 2015
Description: From a vineyard that earns its reputation by growing only Riesling grapes, this full-bodied release shows concentrated flavours. Expect ample grapefruit brightness and a tinge of saltiness to carry the finish.

title: Von Hövel Oberemmeler Hütte GG Dry 2012
Description: Exhibiting incredible finesse and a strong seam of minerality, this cool-climate Riesling is an exceptional choice. Balanced and presenting a firm body, it has a clarity of fruit flavours and whisper-soft sweetness that are sure to refresh.

title: The Foreign Affair Conspiracy Bianco 2019
Description: Your average winery doesn't make a blend of Riesling and Sauvignon Blanc enriched using the ripasso method of northern Italy, but then, The Foreign Affair isn't your average winery. Look for rich, ripe orchard fruit with hints of crunchy garden veggies and have the wine conspire with smoked fish and winter ratatouille.

title: Santa Carolina Chardonnay
Description: Light lemon colour; hazelnut, vanilla, yellow plum, toast and butter aromas and flavours with subdued yellow apple notes; extra dry, medium-bodied, with balanced acidity and a cleansing nutty finish.

title: Château des Charmes Sauvignon Blanc VQA
Description: Pale straw; intense lime & gooseberry aromas & flavours, with hints of pea pod; dry, finish is clean & refreshing.Pale straw colour; intense floral, passion fruit and waxy aromas and flavours, with hints of peach and citrus; extra dry, soft yet refreshing acidity with a clean, dry finish. Excellent Sauvignon Blanc.

title: Chloe Chardonnay
Description: Medium lemon in colour; delicate aromas of vanilla and melon with floral tones; the palate is extra-dry and medium-bodied with flavours of vanilla, melon, honey and pear with a creamy texture.

title: Pelee Island Monarch Vidal VQA
Description: Located in Canada's warmest grape growing region. Pale straw yellow with lifted aromas and flavours of melon, orange, lychee and ripe pear. It has a refreshing palate with balanced acidity. Medium-bodied and fresh with a dry finish. This is a perfect choice for weekend brunch, cold cut sandwiches or grilled shrimp skewers.

title: Pelee Island Chardonnay VQA
Description: Pale straw yellow colour; fig, stony, golden raisins, vanilla and yellow pear aromas and flavours; extra dry palate with intense and round flavours.

title: Kung Fu Girl Riesling
Description: Dry but touching on off-dry (which is why it's so good with spicy Asian cuisine), this is juicy and sleek, with citrus, lychee and peach tones. Zesty, crisp and vibrant, with a pure seam of racy acidity that keeps the sweetness perfectly balanced. Enjoy with spicy curries, ribs, or grilled shrimp appetizers dipped in a spicy sauce.

title: Brights House White
Description: Pale straw colour; subtle, savory yeast and fig aromas; medium-bodied with fresh bread and fig flavours with touch of minerality.

title: Brights House Dry White
Description: Pale straw colour; pear, yellow plum and citrus on the nose; medium-bodied with light fruit flavours and a dry finish.

title: Jackson-Triggs Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Pale straw colour with a lively nose of lemon and green apple with a hint of herbs; fruit character is replayed on the palate; crisp and dry, with medium body.

title: Jackson-Triggs Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Pale straw; floral & grassy aromas; dry, light-body, with gooseberry and citrus flavours & finish.Pale straw colour with a lively nose of lemon and green apple with a hint of herbs; fruit character is replayed on the palate; crisp and dry, with medium body.

title: Bodega Norton Barrel Select Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Greenish yellow with golden hues. Floral, gooseberry, lemon and passion fruit aromas. A grassy note adds complexity on a extra dry, medium bodied palate with a balanced medium acidity.

title: Burnt Ship Bay Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: Very pale lemon-yellow colour; light aromas of citrus, fresh pastry, yellow berries, nuts and herbs; dry, with medium body and soft acidity; crisp citrus flavours with hints of biscuits and nuts; lemony citrus flavour persists on finish.
By:: Burnt Ship Bay Estate Winery Ltd.

title: Robert Mondavi Private Selection Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Pale straw yellow colour; lifted starfruit, grapefruit, herbal and mineral aromas; quince and citrus  flavours; medium-plus body; clean fresh finish.

title: Jacob's Creek Moscato
Description: Since 1847, Jacob's Creek has been one of the leaders in Australia's Barossa Valley. This aromatic, lightly bubbly wine is brimming with floral and ripe pear aromas, with nutty, berry and citrus notes. Medium sweet and easy-drinking, with citrus, pear and tropical fruit flavours. Pour with fruit salad or light desserts.

title: Argento Seleccion Pinot Grigio
Description: Pale straw colour; peach and tropical fruit aromas; extra dry palate with medium body and crisp flavours.

title: Barefoot Pinot Grigio
Description: Extremely versatile, food-friendly and enjoyable. Pale lemon colour with floral notes and aromas of pineapple, fresh bread, white melon and peach. On the palate, this is dry, fresh and medium-bodied with flavours of pineapple, melon and peach. The finish is long with refreshing fruity tones.

title: OPI Chardonnay
Description: Clear pale lemon colour; upfront ripe pear, dried fig, caramel and nutty aromas; extra dry, with medium body and balanced medium acidity supporting flavours of ripe pear, fig and nuts; the finish is medium in length.

title: Philippe De Rothschild Chardonnay Pays d'Oc
Description: Pale straw colour; soft pear, tobacco, minerally and nutty aromas and flavours; extra dry, medium-bodied, with a touch of minerality in the finish.

title: Lindemans Bin 85 Pinot Grigio
Description: Pale straw colour; soft, fresh pear fruit aromas; dry, medium bodied, fresh and flavourful, rounded palate, balanced acidity on finish.

title: Peller Estates Family Series Chardonnay VQA
Description: Medium straw colour; vanilla, smoky oak and yellow plum/pear aromas with a hint of hazelnuts; dry, medium bodied, soft acidity, with yellow plum/pear flavours.

title: Two Oceans Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Pale straw colour; quince, citrus, minerally and yeasty aromas; extra dry, medium bodied, easy drinking with soft lingering quince and citrus flavours.

title: Sandbanks Summer White VQA
Description: Pale lemon; defined lifted aromas of citrus, lychee, spicy and herbal notes; medium sweet, medium bodied, balanced acidity and rich flavours of citrus and stone fruit that follow through from the nose.

title: Nobilo Sauvignon Blanc Marlborough
Description: The Regional Collection sauvignon blanc showcases the best of Marlborough with classic and fresh flavours. The nose is youthful with lifted grapefruit, fresh bread, herbs and spice; on the palate it is extra dry with moderate acidity and zingy citrus fruit leading the way along with herbal and savory flavours.

title: Two Oceans Moscato
Description: Clear pale lemon; very aromatic, with notes of orange blossom, pear, spice, mineral and honey; sweet, with balancing moderate acidity and medium body; flavours of blossom and ripe tree-fruit.

title: Malamatina Retsina
Description: Medium straw lemon colour; frangrant aromas of herbs, a gentle pine note, citrus and mint; bright and refreshingly dry; an attactive, subtle fresh pine gum and pine needle flavours with citrus undertones.

title: Villa Maria Private Bin Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Pale straw colour; intense aromas of grapefruit, herbs, gooseberry with a mineral streak; extra dry, medium-plus bodied, fresh acidity, and flavours of grapefruit, green gooseberry leaf and berry; clean, fresh finish.

title: Sprucewood Shores Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: Clean and fresh, with lifted grapefruit, nuts and herbal notes, embodying the true essence of a Pinot Grigio.

title: Villa Maria Private Bin Sauvignon Blanc Marlborough
Description: Pale straw colour; intense aromas of grapefruit, herbs, gooseberry with a mineral streak; extra dry, medium-plus bodied, fresh acidity, and flavours of grapefruit, green gooseberry leaf and berry; clean, fresh finish.

title: Long Weekend Wine Co.Chardonnay Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: Pale straw colour; pleasant aromas and flavours of ripe pear, nuts and citrus; extra dry and medium-bodied on the palate with balanced moderate acidity and lovely lingering fruity flavours.

title: Forward Pinot Grigio Riesling
Description: Clear pale lemon in colour; citrus, nutty and green melon are the primary aromas, with floral and mineral notes in the background; refreshing flavours of stone fruit, lemon and honeydew melon lead to a finish that is short and clean.

title: Bodacious Smooth White
Description: Bodacious Smooth White is a bestseller and customer favourite! Medium sweet, with lifted aromas and flavours of herbs, ripe pears and cantaloupe, this blend of aromatic varieties is great for entertaining, and delicious with appetizers, salads and Asian cuisine.

title: XOXO Pinot Grigio Chardonnay
Description: XOXO wines are smooth, easy to enjoy and ideal for any occasion. Pinot Grigio and Chardonnay grapes make a perfect match, with delightful flavours of fragrant fresh pear, nuts, cantaloupe and vanilla. This fresh, stylish white is great on its own, or pairs wonderfully with seafood, salads and sushi.

title: Henry Of Pelham Sauvignon Blanc VQA
Description: Pale lemon in colour, this pleasantly aromatic wine offers notes of juicy gooseberry, chamomile, lemon, herbs and wet stone that replay on the bone-dry palate.
By:: Henry Of Pelham Family Est. Winery

title: Château des Charmes St. David's Bench Vineyard Chardonnay 2016
Description: This barrel-fermented Chard is crafted in a burly Burgundian style; a notion enhanced by the year it spends ageing on the lees. It's creamy, rich and smoky, with ripe pear, apple and spice notes all framed and accented by a gorgeous touch of toast. Tangy, fresh and vibrant, this will be ideal for stuffed pork tenderloin or grilled salmon.

title: Tawse Limestone Ridge-North Estate Bottled Riesling 2017
Description: Wow! This is an intense, nervy riesling with all kinds of apple, citrus and floral (jasmin) character. It is medium weight, just off dry but so well balanced in terms of acid and sugar, with really impressive fruit intensity and drive. It is bracing and almost relentless in terms of flavour depth. There is a hint of CO2 adding to the brightness. Some grapefruity bitterness on the finish. Excellent to outstanding length. I can see some finding [it] too aggressive, but others will relish this wine. Score - 93. (David Lawrason, winealign.com, May 19, 2020)

title: Naked Grape Pinot Grigio
Description: Brilliant pale straw colour; delicate aromas of yellow pear, cantaloupe, floral note, quince and banana; extra dry and medium-bodied with balanced acidity; flavours of pears, melon and banana.

title: McGuigan Black Label Pinot Grigio
Description: McGuigan Pinot Grigio offers good varietal character with nuts, fresh bread, grapefruit, floral and spice aromas and a balanced dry palate. Relatively low in acidity and light-plus in body, the palate offers flavours of nuts and grapefruit with a pleasing touch of spice on the finish.

title: Yellow Tail Moscato
Description: Pale straw colour with a slight spritz; aromas of spring bloom, honey, apricot and juicy sweet pear; the palate is off-dry, medium bodied with flavours of blossoms, honey, apricot and pear; balanced with a refreshing finish.

title: Big House The Birdman Pinot Grigio
Description: A popular pinot grigio now available in a convenient can. The Birdman Pinot Grigio leads with hints of peaches and citrus fruits on the nose and then unfolds with flavours of grapefruit and melon before ending with a balanced quenching finish.

title: Deakin Estate Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Pale yellow in colour with aromas bread dough, floral lift and grapefruit; the palate is medium-bodied with moderate acidity and flavours of lees, grapefruit, mint and honey followed by a clean finish.

title: Hardys Stamp Series Riesling Gewurztraminer
Description: Pale straw colour; floral, nutty and berries melange with a touch of citrus and pineapple in aroma & flavour; sweetness balanced by lime citrus finish.

title: Rodney Strong Charlotte's Home Sauvignon Blanc
Description: The Charlotte's Home Sauvignon Blanc vineyard was established in 1971, and fruit from this site continues to be the basis for this wine. It's zesty and bright, with tropical fruit, lemon grass, grapefruit and honeydew melon notes. A great wine for salads, seafood or creamy goat cheese.

title: Megalomaniac Selfie VQA
Description: This offering from Megalomanic is an appealing blend of riesling, along with smaller amounts of sauvignon blanc, chardonnay musque and chardonnay. Anticipate vibrant notes of citrus, peach, perfumed flowers and apple. It's aromatic, flavourful and off-dry with a clean finish. Try with Thai cuisine or Cajun shrimp and rice.

title: Quinta Do Covao White 2016
