Description: Pouring a glass of this vibrant white blend from the Dão region in Portugal's north releases intense aromas of apple, pear, pineapple and citrus. Those fruity notes are followed by a mineral finish. Pair it with chicken or fish dishes.

title: Noble Vines Collection 446 Chardonnay 2018
Description: The '446' in this wine's name is a nod to two things: firstly, the so-called 'selection 4' Chardonnay vine, famed for its vast range of vibrant citrus, orchard and tropical fruit flavours; and secondly, the producer's Monterey vineyard block 46. Expect a complex, fruit-forward wine that'll go well with roast chicken or pork.[The Monterey International Wine Competition did not include a tasting note.] Score - Silver. (Monterey International Wine Competition, 2020)

title: Tom Gore Chardonnay 2018
Description: Crafted in an 'old school' style, this wine offers incredible value along with robust and ripe flavours. A big-shouldered, creamy California Chard with apple, vanilla and butter notes, it will drink well for another 3-5 years. Pour with oven-baked pork chops dressed with rosemary and garlic.

title: Sandbanks Riesling-Gewürztraminer VQA
Description: Medium lemon in colour with pear, peach and mango aromas on the nose; the palate is dry, medium-bodied, and offers moderate balanced acidity with flavours of pear, peach, mango and honey followed by light herbal note on a medium length finish.

title: Grand Sud Chardonnay
Description: The grapes for this wine are harvested from some of the sunniest areas of France; this imparts a creamy and soft richness. Pouring a pale lemon, look for aromas of vanilla, pear, cantaloupe, honey and nuts; the palate is extra dry, medium bodied with moderate acid carrying pear and melon flavours followed by a nutty finish.
By:: Les Grands Chais De France Sa

title: Columbia Crest Grand Estates Chardonnay
Description: From the iconic Columbia Crest, this Chardonnay offers impressively articulated apple and melon, with butterscotch and oak. A wine for grilled chicken or grilled pork chops.

title: Concha Y Toro Frontera Chardonnay
Description: Straw yellow colour; lifted, vanilla and ripe pear aromas; light flavour, light-medium body, touch of yellow plum and minerality in finish.

title: Strewn Two Vines Riesling Gewürztraminer VQA
Description: Bright straw colour; honey, citrus, smoke and herbal aromas with a hint of petrol; extra dry, medium body; honey and citrus flavours with balanced acidity and a cleansing finish.

title: 13th Street Burger Blend Riesling Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: Pale lemon colour; subtle aromas of citrus, apple, pear and a touch of spice; the palate is dry and light in body; the flavours reflect the nose with more citrus, stone fruit and a touch of honey through the mid-palate; finish is clean and juicy.

title: Yalumba Y Series Viognier
Description: Established in 1849, Yalumba is Australia's oldest family-owned winery. Clear pale straw in colour, with forward mushroomy, yeasty, floral, herbal and honey flavours. On the palate, this supple medium-bodied viognier is extra dry, and has a soft, round texture. Flavours of mushrooms, herbs and honey lead to a long finish.

title: The Ned Sauvignon Blanc
Description: The Ned is classic New Zealand-style sauvignon blanc. Clear pale lemon in colour; pronounced aromas of quince, citrus, herbs and spice; on the palate, extra-dry, with medium-minus acidity and medium-plus body; flavours of fresh quince, citrus and herbs with a mineral note.

title: Francois Lurton Fumees Blanches Sauvignon Blanc VdFrance
Description: Pale straw colour; lifted citrus, nutty and grassy aromas with a note of kiwi fruit; medium bodied; crisp citrus flavour with a medium length finish.

title: Spinelli Unoaked Chardonnay Terre Di Chieti IGT
Description: Light lemon colour; dry and medium bodied with lightly yeasty, pear and melon fruit and medium balanced acidity.

title: Casillero Del Diablo Pinot Grigio Reserva
Description: Chile's Casillero del Diablo is one of the world's leading wine brands. The Pinot Grigio Reserva is made from fruit sourced in the famed Limari Valley. Water-white in the glass, this wine has aromas of nuts, floral tone and pear, with mineral and tobacco notes. Medium in body, with nutty and fragrant fresh pear flavours.

title: Smoking Loon Pinot Grigio
Description: This California pinot grigio is versatile and food-friendly. Soft aromas of fresh bread, quince, minerality, citrus and honey. The palate is extra dry and light-plus bodied, with a balanced finish and similar fruit flavours of lees, quince, citrus and honey. Serve well-chilled on its own, or pair with light pasta dishes.

title: The Tragically Hip Ahead by a Century Chardonnay 2019
Description: Sourced from three different vineyards in Niagara with aging in 50% stainless steel and 50% new French oak barrels for 7.5 months with lees stirring. A comforting, inviting nose of ripe apple, tropical fruits, toasty vanilla bean, buttercream and spices. It has spicy bite on the palate and is backed by rich, ripe apple, lemon tart, tropical notes and a smidge of citrus zest to keep it all lively and vibrant through the core. Score - 89. (Rick VanSickle, winesinniagara.com, June 11, 2020)

title: Inniskillin Sauvignon Blanc VQA
Description: Select grapes from across the Niagara Peninsula are used to create this elegant expression of sauvignon blanc. This wine shows bright aromas of grapefruit, yellow berries, nuts and herbs. Flavourful with aromas replays of grapefruit, berries and herbs; good structure, moderate balanced acidity and good fruit on the finish.

title: Tzafona Cellars Cold Climate Unoaked Chardonnay KP
Ménage à Trois Gold Chardonnay
Description: This decadent chardonnay is layered with opulent butter, yellow plum preserve and vanilla. The palate is medium to full bodied and round with endless replays of butter and yellow plum preserve seasoned with notes of vanilla, toast and fig followed by an enduring/creamy finish.

title: Gnarly Head Chardonnay
Description: Gnarly Head's vineyards are some of the oldest, most respected vineyards in California's Lodi region. Their chardonnay has upfront aromas of fresh bread, ripe pear and smoky oak. It is very dry, with flavours of ripe pear with smoky and spicy notes contributed by oak.

title: LeftField Nelson Sauvignon Blanc
Description: The Te Awa vineyards are situated on the famed Gimblett Gravels, one of the best growing sites in the Hawke's Bay region. This wine has pronounced aromas of herbs, lime, grapefruit with minerally and smoky accents. Vibrant and refreshingly extra dry, with lively medium acidity and medium body. Superb with grilled seafood.

title: Sacred Hill Marlborough Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Cool climate winemaking methods capture maximum aroma and exuberant flavour in this New Zealand beauty. Floral, nettle and lime notes flavour the lush palate and the finish has a fresh acidity. The grapes come from the Marlborough region of New Zealand, famous for vibrant, intense sauvignon blanc.

title: Awatere River by Louis Vavasour Sauvignon Blanc 2020
Description: ***LATE ARRIVAL. PRODUCT NOT CURRENTLY AVAILABLE.***This wine is crafted to reflect the juicy, intense character of Marlborough Savvy, with exceptional vibrancy and zest underlying the purity of tangy fruit, complex herbaceous tones and refined minerality. Try it with a vegan spinach-and-artichoke pasta.
By:: The Awatere River Wine Company Limi

title: Fielding Long Weekend Wine Co. Chardonnay Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: Pale straw colour; pleasant aromas and flavours of ripe pear, nuts and citrus; extra dry and medium-bodied on the palate with balanced moderate acidity and lovely lingering fruity flavours.

title: Wolf Blass Yellow Label Chardonnay
Description: Founder Wolfgang Blass has been making wine in South Australia since 1966. This chardonnay is aged with French oak to create a balanced and generous flavour profile. Enjoy aromas and flavours of savory nuttiness and citrus, with hints of minerality and fresh mushrooms. Serve with seafood, veal tenderloin or pumpkin ravioli.

title: Robertson Winery Chenin Blanc
Description: This wine punches above its weight in the value sector by offering layers of fruit and balanced acid on a medium bodied and refreshing palate. Expect a nose that offers aromas of pear, honey and herbs and a palate that is laden with pear, honey and citrus fruit followed by a fresh finish - perfect for pairing patio side.

title: 20 Bees Sauvignon Blanc VQA
Description: Made in Niagara-on-the-Lake, in the heart of Niagara wine country, this is a fresh and lively wine that buzzes with fresh gooseberry, citrus, floral and grassy flavours. A great choice for casual entertaining, and delicious with grilled vegetables, chicken or fish.

title: Brancott Estate Marlborough Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Brancott's founder was the first to produce sauvignon blanc in Marlborough during the late 70s, a move that would change the region forever. Expect fresh fruit flavours that include floral, kiwi, herbal and citrus notes. On the palate, the vibrant core is intense with resonating flavours and pink grapefruit notes.

title: Bend In The River Riesling
Description: Pale straw hue; soft  stony, citrus and wax nose; medium body with fresh medium acidity; subtle citrus and nuts flavours; slight mineral notes on finish.

title: Burnt Ship Bay Sauvignon Blanc VQA
Description: Sited in historic Niagara-on-the-Lake, Ontario, Burnt Ship Bay Estate Winery is making delicious wines for all palates. Expect lifted aromas and flavours of grapefruit, minerality, herbs and nuts. Light and refreshing this is a perfect match for grilled salmon with rosemary potatoes and grilled vegetables.
By:: Burnt Ship Bay Estate Winery Ltd.

title: Citra Trebbiano D'Abruzzo DOC
Description: Pale straw; rather neutral aroma light body and flavour with short crisp finish

title: Strewn Chardonnay Barrel Aged VQA
Description: Pale straw; toasty, oaky, apple & tropical fruit aromas; dry, buttery, fruity & well balanced with a clean finish.Pale straw colour; vanilla, fig, citrus, buttery and pineapple aromas; buttery, fruity and well balanced with a clean finish.

title: Cave Spring Pinot Gris VQA
Description: Gentle pressing yields a wine with elegance and a range of fragrant aromas, including pear, melon, fresh fig and nuts. On the palate, extra dry; supple texture and balanced acidity combine for a soft and creamy mouthfeel. Pear and nutty notes lead to a mellow finish.

title: Woodbridge By Robert Mondavi Pinot Grigio
Description: Pale straw colour; floral, minerally, cantaloupe and citrus aromas with a hint of fresh bread; medium bodied with a fresh, citrusy finish.

title: Bodacious Smooth White
Description: Bodacious Smooth White is a bestseller and customer favourite! Medium sweet, with lifted aromas and flavours of herbs, ripe pears and cantaloupe, this blend of aromatic varieties is great for entertaining, and delicious with appetizers, salads and Asian cuisine.

title: Yellow Tail Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Yellow tail wines are made in Australia's Riverina wine region, in New South Wales. Their sauvignon blanc is zesty and juicy, with delicious herbal, spicy and citrus flavours. Serve this extra dry, light to medium-bodied wine with salads, grilled asparagus or goat cheese.

title: Big Bill Sauvignon Blanc
Description: This label honours the legendary first manager of South Africa's KWV wine company, Bill Millar. A nice expression of sauvignon blanc with pear, candied fruit and herbal, spice and citrus notes leading the way. Medium-bodied, with soft acidity; serve well-chilled with grilled shrimp or fish, light vegetable dishes or salads.

title: Negrar Garganega Verona IGT
Description: This dry garganega has aromas and flavours of yeast and lime with notes of tobacco, nuts and grapefruit.The native-to-Italy varietal has gained renown as the grape of Soave, but Cantina di Negrar in the northeast of Italy sources the best grapes possible to give excellent value in the glass.

title: Jackson-Triggs Reserve Chardonnay VQA
Description: Pale straw; oaky cedar, yellow pear, toast, vanilla and fresh fig aromas; soft, clean flavour with the fruit mirrored on the palate.

title: Casal Garcia Vinho Verde DO
Description: The best selling vinho verde worldwide. Pale colour with a light effervescence. Delicate yeasty notes, with lemon/lime, herbal, floral and nutty aromas and flavours. Dry, crisp and fresh with a clean finish. Low in alcohol and quite refreshing. Ideal as an aperitif or paired with light fish or seafood and fresh salads.

title: Julia Florista White
Description: Dedicated to Julia Florista; flower-seller, fado singer and one of Portugal's celebrated cultural figures. Fresh, easy-going, with minerally, fresh-baked pastry, herbal and citrus aromas to the fore. The palate delivers flavours of citrus and herbs, finishing with refreshing minerality. Serve with grilled fish or seafood.

title: Jackson-Triggs Reserve Series Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: The Reserve Pinot Grigio boasts lifted notes of nuts, grapefruit, cantaloupe and green pear. The palate is fresh and medium in body, with refreshing acidity and nice balance, leaving you with a delightful candied pear finish.

title: Terra do Zambujeiro White 2016
Description: Blend of 52% Arinto, 48% Antão Vaz. Hand harvested. Fermented and matured in oak barrels. The wine is full bodied and balanced by fresh acidity, with fine fruit with notes of toast and vanilla. It pairs well with seafood, grilled fish or poultry dishes.

title: Dachshund Pinot Grigio
Description: Known as grauburgunder in Germany, pinot grigio has been grown here for hundreds of years. Starting with a splendidly aromatic bouquet that leads to an intense and flavourful mouthfeel that is balanced and refreshing on the palate, the finish is pleasantly fruity and crisp.

title: Three Thieves Pinot Grigio
Description: Cold fermentation helps to preserve the freshness in this vibrant pinot grigio that has recently been awarded 'Best Buy' by the Wine Enthusiast. Layers of upfront juicy pear, canteloup and peach combine seamlessly on a fresh, mid-bodied palate making this ideal for a variety of light dishes.

title: Rymill The Yearling Sauvignon Blanc Coonawarra
Description: Australia's Coonawarra region is cool during the ripening season, and porous limestone soils provide vines with exceptional growing conditions. Aromas of spice, mushrooms and marmite with citrus and quince fruit. Vibrant and fresh on the palate, with savoury, herbaceous and minerally notes on a long finish.

title: Smoking Loon Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Smoking Loon is a hidden gem for many California wine lovers; this new addition to the lineup is sure to be welcomed by those in search of a fresh and unadorned white. Expect intriguing flavours of nuts, minerals and grapefruit on a medium palate that finishes with a soft yet supportive acidity.

title: Mission Hill Reserve Chardonnay
Description: If you haven't yet experienced the dazzling wines of BC's Okanagan Valley, this is a striking introduction. A juicy Chardonnay loaded with flavours of pear, melon and creamy toffee. Sings with pasta alfredo, grilled eggplant sandwiches or baked chicken.

title: Ruffino Lumina Pinot Grigio IGT
Description: For more than 140 years, Ruffino has been making quality wines for consumers to enjoy. Their rich history is in everything they produce. Pronounced aromas of fresh-cut lemon, gooseberry and a touch of herbs. Vibrant and fresh on the palate, with mineral notes on a clean finish.

title: Dry Creek Vineyard Fumé Blanc 2018
Description: Straw color. Aromas of passionfruit jam, honeydew melon, gooseberry, and white flowers with a satiny, vibrant, dry-yet-fruity light-to-medium body and a tingling, complex, medium-long jasmine, key lime pie with whipped cream, celery, sugar snap peas, and white pepper finish with no oak flavor. A lengthy, delicate white that is a lovely example of Sonoma's Sauvignon Blanc. Exceptional. Score - 92. (tastings.com, April 2, 2019)

title: Novas Gran Reserva Sauvignon Blanc Organic
Description: Award winning, organic wine from Chile. Pale lemon in colour and exhibits lifted aromas and flavours of herbs, lemon and grapefruit, smoke and minerality. The palate is extra dry and light to medium-bodied with supportive acidity leading to a crisp, clean finish. Enjoy with lightly herbed chicken alongside ripe mango salad.

title: Fuzion Organic Chardonnay Torrontes
Description: Vinified in Maipu, Mendoza, this Argentinian organic white wine displays sweet aromatics but is actually bone dry. Its aromas include butter, smoke, fresh fig, spice and honeysuckle and these flavours replay on the medium bodied palate framed by bright acidity. The dry finish is zesty. Pair with shrimp linguine.

title: La Petite Hitaire Blanc Cotes Du Gascogne Igp
Description: This beautifully crisp and fragrant wine is a perfect go-to for the summer months. Intensely floral with bright citrus and layers of exotic fruit on the nose; the palate is bright and crisp, with round canned stonefruit character balancing the zingy acid then finishing with finesse and freshness.

title: Lurton Piedra Negra Pinot Grigio Organic
Description: Clear straw colour; lifted, yellow berry and fruit, cantaloupe, citrus and spice aromas; extra dry, medium body; soft berry and melon flavour and medium finish.

title: Lion D'or Chardonnay 2017
Description: This wine is characterized by a limpid golden-yellow colour, fruity aromas of citrus, melon and pineapple. Rich and charming body, well-balanced flavor with pleasant acidity. Served at 8-10C, it is a perfect accompaniment to seafood, fish, white meats, as well as Asian food and Mediterranean casserole recipes

title: Ca' Bolani Aquilis DOC 2016
Description: This golden-coloured white blend from east of Venice has scents of elderberry, papaya and mint, a lemon meringue palate and a silky texture. The long finish is full of refreshing minerality and would pair particularly well with oysters or shellfish.

title: Trius Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: Situated on Niagara-on-the-Lake, Trius has been creating quality wines for over three decades. This Pinot Grigio has aromas and flavours of nuts, citrus and herbs. Balanced and refreshing on the palate with a pleasant cleansing finish.

title: Josh Cellars Chardonnay
Description: Crafted with fruit sourced from California, including Mendocino and Monterey counties. This chardonnay boasts aromas and flavours of smoky oak, fig and vanilla, with subtle floral and rye bread notes. The mouthfeel is rich and rounded with a long finish. Serve with grilled halibut alongside mashed potatoes and  vegetables.

title: Pelee Island Pinot Grigio
Description: A perfect addition when hosting, this offering has lively aromas and flavours of nuts, fresh fig, herbs and toast. Medium-bodied and fresh, it finishes with vibrant acidity and echoes the nuts and fig notes.

title: Ca' di Rajo Pinot Grigio 2019
Description: Fruit for this wine was harvested by hand and the wine underwent no malolactic conversion. It's a fresh, crisp, aromatic PG with lovely floral, citrus and white peach character. It'll be a versatile food wine. (Vintages panel, Jan. 2020)[Luca Maroni did not include a tasting note.] Score - 90. (lucamaroni.com, July 22, 2020)

title: 19 Crimes Hard Chard
Description: The striking labels of 19 crimes show creativity. It also shows in the glass with this rich chardonnay displaying a brilliant yellow colour with aromas and flavours of vanilla, hazelnuts, oatmeal, honey and pear. Medium-plus bodied and rich with a lengthy finish. Enjoy with lobster tail dipped in a lemon butter sauce.

title: Fat Bastard Chardonnay Pays d'Oc
Description: Medium straw colour; floral, fresh fig, nuts, herbal and pear aromas; dry, fig, pear and hazelnut flavours, buttery texture, well balanced with a medium-length finish.

title: Masi Modello Pinot Grigio Delle Venezie DOC
Description: Pale straw colour; some toasty aromas with fruity/floral overtones; well-balanced with a viscous, slightly oily texture

title: Fantini Chardonnay
Description: Medium gold/yellow colour; green pear, nuts and spice nose; extra dry, medium-bodied with ripe pear, nuts and citrus flavours with hint of honey on the finish; medium acidity and extra dry with a long finish.

title: Kellerei Bozen Bolzano Chardonnay 2019
Description: This wine is fermented and aged in stainless steel to preserve the purity of the most delicate floral and fruit tones. The result is a fresh, vibrant, tropical Chardonnay with a driving acidity and a bright, crisp character.

title: Las Mulas Chardonnay Reserva Organic
Description: The Miguel Torres family has been dedicated to making quality wines for decades. This certified organic chardonnay pours pale lemon and has aromas of yellow pear, melon, honey and a hint of nutty oak. Flavours of pear and white melon lead to a medium-bodied and fruity palate with a refreshingly bright and balanced finish.

title: Adesso ChardonnayD'Italia
Description: This lovely chardonnay from Italy delivers on flavour. Pale yellow colour followed by aromas of fresh bread, coffee, earth, smoke and spice. The palate is light to medium bodied and filled with rich fruit flavours, hints of smoky oak and spice. The finish is warming and harmonious.

title: Sola Nero White
Description: Pale straw colour; pleasant pear and nutty aromas with hints of herbs; soft, fruity and clean flavour with good balance on the pleasant finish.

title: Malivoire Estate Grown Chardonnay
Description: Chardonnay is this sustainable winery's specialty, and this one is superb. It sports complex baked apple, caramel and toasty oak flavours with a mineral-laced finish. Pair with fish and chips, pasta primavera or roast turkey with all the trimmings.

title: Magnotta Pinot Grigio Venture Series VQA
Description: Magnotta is a family-owned winery and one of the largest in Ontario. This pinot grigio is pale straw in colour and exhibits aromas of nuts, citrus, smoke, fig and melon. Medium-bodied this is a vibrant wine with a refreshingly clean finish.

title: Fern Walk Sauvignon Blanc VQA
Description: Fern Walk's success began in BC, quickly developing a following for making flavourful, quality wines. Niagara grown and crafted, this wine captures vibrant citrus, nutty, green berry, smoky and herbal aromas and flavours; medium-plus body yet refreshing, it finishes with snappy acidity and replays of citrus and asparagus.

title: Diabolica White VQA
Description: An imaginative blend of aromatic varieties; delicious on its own and quite versatile with food. Clear medium lemon-yellow in colour; quite forward, with aromas of lemon, fresh fig, smoke and pine nuts; extra dry, with medium body and moderate balanced acidity; flavours of lemon, fig and nuts.

title: Ruffino Il Ducale Pinot Grigio 2018
Description: Ruffino has been making wines since 1877, but this bright, airy Pinot Grigio is a newcomer to the portfolio and was first produced in 2016. It's crafted in an easy-to-like, drinkable style that delivers excellent refreshment and lift, with a touch of exotic, tropical melon. The producer suggests pairing this floral, fruity wine with spinach gnocchi or Parmigiano Reggiano.

title: Casillero del Diablo Reserva Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Pale straw colour; pronounced aromas and flavours of grapefruit and spice with minerally and herbal notes; medium body, medium acidity, fresh and juicy.

title: Blu Giovello Pinot Grigio
Description: Produced in north-eastern Italy in the region of Friuli, it's a pale-coloured, clean and refreshing wine. The bouquet opens with distinct notes of quince, fruit blossom, nuts, spice and candy. Medium-minus body and fresh on the palate with more tree fruit flavours and hints of spice that add balance to a clean finish.

title: Villa Sandi Pinot Grigio delle Venezie DOC
Description: Pale straw yellow colour; a subtle leesy/yeasty opening, followed by nutty and melon aromas with mineral overtones; extra dry, with the aromas replays on the palate to a cleansing finish.

title: XOXO Light Pinot Grigio
Description: A great choice when hosting, this wine by XOXO is lower in alcohol than most pinot grigios, with delicate lifted aromas and flavours of canteloup, honey, nuts and banana. Medium-bodied with a fresh and clean finish, it is an ideal match for seafood paella, fettuccine Alfredo with grilled chicken or as an aperitif.

title: Peller Estates Family Series Dry Riesling VQA
Description: Pale straw; quince, spice and nutty aromas; off-dry, with quince and light spice fruit.

title: Peller Estates Family Series Chardonnay VQA
Description: Medium straw; floral, apple, lemon & oak aromas; dry, crisp with green apple & pear flavours.Medium straw colour; vanilla, smoky oak and yellow plum/pear aromas with a hint of hazelnuts; dry, medium bodied, soft acidity, with yellow plum/pear flavours.

title: RedHeads Le Betard White 2017
Description: Pale yellow straw with bright, ripe fruit aromas and typical Marsanne notes of dried herbs. Young and exuberant in honeyed peachy and candied lemon notes with bright acidity and satisfying rounded creaminess. Time in oak has lent a subtle oaky wrap of cinnamon spice to the pert peach and citrus fruit.

title: RedHeads Bluebelle Chardonnay 2017
Description: Mid gold, classic Chardonnay colour, with high-note aromatics of honeysuckle blending with creamy toast. Fresh apple and peach overlaid by toasty nutty character with a taut backbone of freshness. A delicious balance and impressive length.

title: Placido Pinot Grigio Toscana IGT
Description: Pale straw colour; fresh bread, banana, pear, mango aromas with a nutty hint; clean fresh palate with banana and pear flavours and a long finish.

title: Mezzacorona Pinot Grigio
Description: Pale straw colour; fresh, berry, cantaloupe and fruity pear nose with a touch of spice; medium body, clean and fresh with berry and melon flavours and pear and spice on the finish.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Dry White
Description: Pale yellow straw; grapefruit, yellow melon and floral aromas; extra dry with soft round fruit flavours and light tropical fruit notes; easy drinking wine.

title: Louis Bernard CdRhone White AOC
Description: Pale straw colour; pear and nutmeg aromas and flavours with fresh mushrooms, honey and cantaloupe notes; extra dry, light to medium bodied, well balanced, soft supportive acidity, long lingering finish.

title: Argento Seleccion Chardonnay
Description: Brilliant yellow/gold colour; floral, fresh figs and vanilla aromas and toast and nuts in the background; extra dry, with tropical fruit flavours with some toasty oak notes; excellent intensity and length.

title: Pelee Island Late Harvest Vidal VQA
Description: Medium straw yellow colour; aromas of mango, nuts, yellow melon, pear and fresh fig; medium sweet, with soft balanced acidity and mango/melon flavours.

title: Pelee Island Monarch Vidal VQA
Description: Located in Canada's warmest grape growing region. Pale straw yellow with lifted aromas and flavours of melon, orange, lychee and ripe pear. It has a refreshing palate with balanced acidity. Medium-bodied and fresh with a dry finish. This is a perfect choice for weekend brunch, cold cut sandwiches or grilled shrimp skewers.

title: Sonoma-Cutrer Russian River Ranches Chardonnay
Description: An exquisite example of cool-climate Chardonnay, this favourite features tropical fruit, roasted hazelnut, citrus and butter. Serve with grilled salmon, Camembert with crusty bread, or stuffed pork tenderloin.

title: San Pietro Vino Bianco da Uve Passite
Description: Produced in the Veneto region, this flavourful, full-bodied white reveals ample character. Supple and satisfying, it shines with notes of honey, raisin, jam and tropical fruit. Sip it solo or pair it with white meat dishes.
By:: Tenuta San Pietro In Tassarolo Az.

title: Lindemans Bin 65 Chardonnay
Description: Lindeman's is one of Australia's leading wine brands, and the ever-popular Bin 65 remains one of their flagship wines. Enjoy upfront aromas and flavours of tropical fruit, pear and a nicely balanced note of nutty oak. Light to medium bodied, with a fresh, clean finish; a perfect partner for seafood, chicken or pasta.

title: Wolf Blass Yellow Label Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Medium straw colour; upfront aromas of gooseberry, hay, citrus and nuts; extra dry, medium bodied, well balanced, with gooseberry, fresh herbs and lime flavours.

title: Pelee Island Pinot Grigio
Description: A perfect addition when hosting, this offering has lively aromas and flavours of nuts, fresh fig, herbs and toast. Medium-bodied and fresh, it finishes with vibrant acidity and echoes the nuts and fig notes.

title: Henry of Pelham Speck Family Reserve Chardonnay 2019
Description: This a solid, well constructed, complex chardonnay that could use a year or three of bottle age. The aromas are a bit reserved at the moment but very complex with yellow fruit, custard, nutmeg, peat and mineral flinty notes. It is quite full bodied, firm and well balanced, with impressive structure and intensity. This is very good value. Score - 92. (David Lawrason, winealign.com, Oct. 30, 2020)
By:: Henry Of Pelham Family Est. Winery

title: Pelee Island Lola Gewürztraminer VQA
Description: Lola first arrived as rosé and won our hearts; now you can try the fragrant gewurztraminer which is in full bloom with aromas of jasmine, lychee, pear, herbs and mango. Medium-bodied and dry, the flavours match the nose and wrap-up seamlessly on a long, flavourful finish.

title: Babich Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Pale yellow; floral, passion fruit, citrus and herbal notes; balanced acidity with bright passion fruit and citrus flavours.

title: Monkey Bay Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Bright clean yellow straw colour; kiwi, floral and citrus aromas with hints of gooseberry and pear; extra dry, medium bodied, with the same kiwi, plus citrus and herbal flavours; good length.

title: Angels Gate Sussreserve Riesling VQA
Description: Pale lemon colour; lifted aromas of smoke, mushrooms and citrus with a wild honey note; dry, medium bodied, bright, flavours of smoke and citrus with mushrooms and honey tones.

title: Argento Seleccion Pinot Grigio
Description: Pale straw colour; peach and tropical fruit aromas; extra dry palate with medium body and crisp flavours.

title: Dragani Pinot Grigio Trebbiano IGT
Description: Very pale straw with a a upfront aromas of mint, herbs, spice and ginger. Fresh in the mouth with fresh mint, herbs, some pear and granny apple zest. Clean and fruity minerality through the finish.

title: Collavini Pinot Grigio
Description: This pinot grigio is a customer favourite, and it's easy to see why. It's pale straw, with inviting aromas of lemon, pear, and apple. The palate offers flavours of apricot, grapefruit and a hint of honey. It's light-bodied and crisp, with a palate-cleansing finish. Pair with mushroom risotto or grilled shrimp.

title: Creekside Sauvignon Blanc VQA
Description: Pale lemon colour; intense aromas of grapefruit and gooseberry with mineral and herbal streaks; tangy guava flavours with a zesty grapefruit finish.

title: Masi Masianco Pinot Grigio
Description: Made using a blend of freshly-harvested pinot grigio and semi-dried verduzzo grapes. Enjoy floral aromas and flavours of citrus and nuts with mineral and honeyed notes. The wine is medium bodied with soft acidity and clean finish. Serve with hors d'oeuvres, fish or white meats.

title: Jackson-Triggs Pinot Grigio
Description: From an award-winning winery comes this light and lively pinot grigio, offered in a range of sizes for all occasions. Pouring a pale lemon colour, look for aromas and flavours of lifted, fresh cantaloupe, ginger and spice. Moderate acidity makes this fresh, it is extra-dry on that palate with a clean finish.

title: Pelee Island Pinot Grigio
Description: A perfect addition when hosting, this offering has lively aromas and flavours of nuts, fresh fig, herbs and toast. Medium-bodied and fresh, it finishes with vibrant acidity and echoes the nuts and fig notes.

title: Relax Riesling, Mosel
Description: Light green straw colour; aromas of tangerine, peach, white spice and black slate, with light floral tones; off-dry, medium-plus bodied, with balanced citrus acidity and tangerine and peach flavours.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Sauvignon Blanc
Description: A crisp, easy drinking white in an easy to serve box. In the glass, it's a pale, lemon green colour. On the nose the wine exhibits, forward aromas of grapefruit, herb, lemon and melon with light tropical, pear and grassy notes. The palate is dry, light-bodied and crisp with light peach, apple, melon and citrus flavours.

title: Road Vineyard Chardonnay 2016
Description: This crowd-pleasing dry Chardonnay has juicy notes of baked pear, nectarine, vanilla and biscuit, all rolled up in a spicy, fragrant nose. The long crème brûlée finish comes as a welcome surprise. Try it with a cheese tray.

title: Yellow Tail Chardonnay
Description: From Australia's largest family-owned wine company, a wine that's easy to drink and to understand. Aromas of shortbread, yellow pear, floral note, nuts and ginger. On the palate, it is extra dry and medium-bodied, with notes of pastry, pear and nuts leading to a clean finish. Serve with roast chicken or creamy pasta.

title: Open Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: Open Wines are known for making crowd-pleasing wines. This pinot grigio has aromas and flavours of berries, citrus, fresh fig, banana and light pear. Medium-bodied and fresh on the palate with balanced, clean acidity and a dry finish, this wine is perfect for seafood salad, roasted chicken or as a starter.

title: Jackson-Triggs Reserve Crisp & Lively White VQA
Description: From award winning winery Jackson-Triggs, this offering is a blended wine with aromas of pear, honey, yellow melon, herbs and chocolate. Flavours of pear and melon are supported by soft, balanced acidity. It is medium-bodied with a balanced finish and a great match for spicy ginger chicken over rice.

title: Torrevento Matervitae Falanghina Puglia IGT
Description: The Torrevento Estate in southern Italy's Puglia focuses on cultivating the best local grape varieties to make their wines. This falanghina's aromas and flavours reflect notes of grapefruit, herbs, juniper and a floral tone. The finish is fresh and lively. A wonderful pairing for pasta in cream sauce, seafood or appetizers.

title: Woodbridge By Robert Mondavi Chardonnay
Description: The colour is a bright pale lemon; aromas of ripe pear and buttered toast are joined by hints of spicy vanilla; the wine is extra dry and medium-bodied with balanced acidity framing notes  of ripe pear, toast and vanilla; a medium length finish, with honey and toasted oak notes balanced by lemony acidity.

title: Longshot Pinot Grigio
Description: This light and crisp pinot grigio from Longshot Wine is made by winemaker Beth Liston. Expect fresh aromas and flavours of yellow pear, banana, fresh bread, white blossoms and citrus that lead to a refreshing mellow finish. Serve with grilled white fish over a bed of rice and sautéed vegetables.

title: Jacob's Creek Double Barrel Chardonnay
Description: This wine undergoes a unique process of fermenting half the juice in whiskey barrel then maturing it in a wine barrel and treating the other half in the reverse way. The batches are blended resulting in aromas and flavours of nuts, spiced oatmeal, underbrush, mango and vanilla with a lemony finish. Pair with pork or salmon.

title: Jacob's Creek Pinot Grigio
Description: Legendary in South Eastern Australia, Jacob's Creek is committed to sustainable wine-growing. This is a modern expression of pinot grigio. Enjoy subtle quince, floral, pear and honey notes; it is light-meidum bodied and dry with balanced acidity. Serve with seared tuna, creamy pasta, salads, shellfish or roast chicken.

title: Smoking Loon Chardonnay
Description: With good balance, creamy texture and forward flavours, this is a crowd-pleaser. Experience aromas of citrus blossom, toast, pear, vanilla and honey. The palate is dry, with medium body and flavours of toast and pear, with vanilla and buttery accents. Serve with vegetarian pizza, creamy pasta or roast chicken.

title: Alario Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Made by Viña Carmen, one of Chile's most recognized wineries, this sauvignon blanc over-delivers with lovely aromas and flavours of grapefruit, freshly cut grass, kiwi, gooseberry and chamomile. It is light to medium-bodied, extra dry, with a refreshingly balanced finish. Serve it as an aperitif or with grilled white fish.

title: Frisky Beaver White VQA
Description: A vibrant, crowd-pleasing blend from Ontario. Clear pale lemon; aromas of lemon, smoke, nuts, spice and herbs; extra dry, with a medium body and acidity supporting flavours of citrus, pine nuts, spice and herbs; a fresh, balanced finish. Great on its own or paired to appetizers and mildly spiced dishes.

title: Sandbanks Smugglers White VQA
Description: Crowd-pleasing, aromatic white that's locally produced. Exhibits aromas of pear, wild flowers, white pepper, yellow melon and fresh fig. In the mouth, it's dry, medium-plus body yet refreshing with a smooth palate and flavors of pear, spice, melon and fig. Enjoy on its own or with seafood and Asian cuisine.

title: Lindemans Bin 85 Pinot Grigio
Description: Pale straw colour; soft, fresh pear fruit aromas; dry, medium bodied, fresh and flavourful, rounded palate, balanced acidity on finish.

title: Ciao Pinot Grigio Organic Carton
Description: A lovely, easy-drinking wine available in a lightweight, environmentally friendly package. Youthful, light straw colour. Fruity yellow pear and white melon on the nose with bright floral and mineral overtones. The palate is fresh and focused with appealing flavours of pear and melon and lightly spicy/minerally notes.

title: Voga Pinot Grigio IGT
Description: Pale straw colour; lifted aromas and flavours of nuts, sourdough bread and citrus fruit; extra dry, light to medium weight with soft acidity.

title: Sterling Vintner's Collection Chardonnay
Description: Medium deep yellow straw colour; upfront aromas and flavours of pear, oaky vanilla and cantaloupe; extra dry, medium bodied, well balanced with good length.

title: Vineland Estates Unoaked Chardonnay VQA
Description: Bright yellow colour; aromas of yellow plum, citrus, oatmeal, nuts and herbs; extra dry, medium bodied, with medium balanced acidity and a long fresh finish.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Pinot Grigio
Description: Easy drinking, refreshing white wine, sourced from vineyards in Canada and around the world. Shows aromas of cantaloupe, yellow berries and pear with a hint of chocolate. Extra dry, medium-bodied with refreshing melon, berries and pear flavours. Perfect for casual sipping or pair with light fare, salads and appetizers.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Pinot Grigio
Description: Easy drinking, refreshing white wine, sourced from vineyards in Canada and around the world. Shows aromas of cantaloupe, yellow berries and pear with a hint of chocolate. Extra dry, medium-bodied with refreshing melon, berries and pear flavours. Perfect for casual sipping or pair with light fare, salads and appetizers.

title: Ora Villa Ginetti Velletri DOP
Description: Pale straw colour; light aromas of biscuit, pear, nutty and floral notes; extra dry, light-plus body; pear and lemon flavours.

title: Altoona Hills Chardonnay KPM
Description: Available at select VINTAGES locations.Creamy with apple, lime and peach. Roasted chicken or grilled salmon.

title: Branco Quinta da Escusa 2016
Description: 'A 65/35 blend of Arinto and Moscatel, unoaked and coming in at 12.5% alcohol. This is a pleasing young Branco, with good freshness and some aromatic liveliness as well. It has reasonable concentration for the style and a tasty, dry finish with a little tension. It's nicely done. Just drink it young. It's worth leaning up on it for the moment. There were 6,900 bottles produced. Score 88, eRobertParker.com, June 2018'
By:: Romana Vini - Vinhos E Culturas, Ld

title: F White 2016
Description: Montreal restaurateur Carlos Ferreira owns the Portuguese vineyard that produces this fresh white. The grapes grow beautifully in the climate of cold nights and very hot, dry days, contributing to the wine's floral aromas, citrus influences and strong mineral notes. Enjoy it with smoked salmon.

title: Pitchfork Semillion 2017
Description: Intensely flavoured, pristine fruit with a clean and zippy palate. Fresh fruit flavours of lemon, passion fruit and pineapple. The palate is long and lingering with a tight acidic backbone and clean dry finish.

title: Teal Lake Chardonnay KPM
Description: Available at select VINTAGES locations.Apple, grapefruit, melon and gentle toast. Try with planked salmon.

title: Louis Jadot Chardonnay Bourgogne
Description: Chardonnay has travelled the world, but it's at its best in its true home: Burgundy. This expertly crafted version delivers yellow apple, citrus and lime zest with a kiss of oak. Enjoy with chicken in a mushroom sauce, trout with tarragon butter or turkey.

title: La Crema Sonoma Coast Chardonnay
Description: Cooling ocean breezes and morning fogs have helped the Sonoma Coast become one of the world's premier appellations for Chardonnay. This one is toasty and generous with juicy apple and pear, a hint of citrus and a mineral undertone. Perfect for grilled pork chops or roast chicken.

title: Castello della Sala Bramìto Chardonnay
Description: Produced by Antinori (of Tuscany fame), this Chardonnay comes from high-altitude vineyards in Umbria. It's fresh, elegant and impressive, with citrus and melon aromas and a characterful minerality. A perfect choice for seafood.

title: Three Thieves Chardonnay
Description: Great value chardonnay that delivers tons of flavour for the price. It exhibits toasty aromas of smoke, vanilla, and ripe fig with rich, nutty notes. The palate is soft, rich and creamy, with flavours of fig, vanilla and hazelnuts on a well-balanced finish. Great with bbq white meats.

title: Lindeman's Pinot Grigio
Description: A flavourful and satisfying pinot grigio from the iconic Lindman's winery. This exhibits lifted aromas and flavours of fresh pear, lemon and green apple with floral notes and hints of spice and tropical fruit. Now available in an easy to chill and easy to serve can. Great on its own or with light meats, salads and seafood.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Pinot Grigio
Description: Easy drinking, refreshing white wine, sourced from vineyards in Canada and around the world. Shows aromas of cantaloupe, yellow berries and pear with a hint of chocolate. Extra dry, medium-bodied with refreshing melon, berries and pear flavours. Perfect for casual sipping or pair with light fare, salads and appetizers.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Crisp, easy drinking white in an easy to serve box. It's a pale, lemon green colour. Shows forward aromas of grapefruit, floral note, spice, herbs, cantaloupe and green apple. The palate is extra dry, medium-bodied and bright with grapefruit, herbs and melon flavours. Pair with lighter herb-based dishes and salads.

title: Les Deux Cedres Domaine D'Arton 2016
Description: Fresh light bouquet with fine and delicate hints of white flowers and pineapple. Undertones of lemon and Muscat. Rounded, full of flavour, refreshing and enhanced on the palate by notes of Muscat. Pairs well with Asian and Indian dishes, and pancakes.

title: Ohh! Poitou Sauvignon Blanc 2019
Description: (Translated from the German) Bouquet of black currant, some lime. On the palate robust notes of currant and lime with firm acidity. Straightforward Sauvignon Blanc with a fresh finish. Ideal with seafood and fish. Score - 89. (Falstaff Wine Guide, Feb. 18, 2020)

title: Semeli Mantinia Nassiakos 2016
Description: Pretty, yellow-green in colour, the wine displays the classic Moschofilero aromas with intense lemon freshness and long, rose petal finish. Dry with a tangy crispness it is a wine well-suited to all kinds of fresh shellfish: dressed crab, steamed clams, boiled lobster or a simple selection of meze.

title: Santa Margherita Impronta del Fondatore Pinot Grigio 2018
Description: The 2018 Santa Margherita Impronta del Fondatore Pinot Grigio shines a pretty, silvery-straw colour. It exudes gentle scents of crushed stones, lemon zest, and pear. And the attack tastes vivid and cool - a well-toned rush of lemon, wet stones and raw nut with a resonant finish. Score - 91. (Carolyn Evans Hammond, thestar.com, Dec. 19, 2019)

title: Pepperwood Grove Sauvignon Blanc
Description: A wine that delivers great drinking pleasure at a wonderful price. In the glass, it shows aromas and flavours of green pear, chamomile and gooseberry, followed by notes of fresh fig and grapefruit. The finish is clean and refreshing. A great match to delicate herb-based dishes and salads.

title: Pascual Toso Chardonnay
Description: Wine experts agree that this chardonnay from Argentina delivers great value. Expect aromas and flavours of fresh pear, apple, mango and spice with toasted oak tones. The palate is medium bodied and rich with balanced acidity and notes of tropical fruit and vanilla on the finish. Pairs with seafood or poultry in cream sauce.

title: Pelee Island Lola Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: A worthy addition to the acclaimed Lola series of wines from Pelee Island Winery. This white is crisp and refreshing with lemon-lime, fresh melon and floral aroma followed by green apple, pear, and citrus flavours on the finish. Great on its own or paired with light seafood and fish dishes, poultry or pork.

title: Quadrus White 2019
Description: Quadrus Vineyard sits on a terraced hillside hewn of schist and set above the Douro River at an altitude of 650 metres above sea level. This wine blends local white wine grapes - including aromatic Côdega de Larinho, vivacious Rabigato and robust Viosinho - to create a sleek, crisp evocation of spring blossoms, lemon, apple, peach and honey. Savour with seafood salad or smoked trout.

title: Queenston Mile Barrel Fermented Chardonnay 2017
Description: A delicious medium-plus-bodied Chardonnay with ripe pear, apple pie, butterscotch, dried pineapple, lemon cream and toasty oak spice flavours silky smooth on the palate. Great acidity for food. Pair with roast chicken. Drink: 2020-2023. Score - 90. (nataliemaclean.com, June 9, 2020)

title: Collavini Pinot Grigio
Description: This pinot grigio is a customer favourite, and it's easy to see why. It's pale straw, with inviting aromas of lemon, pear, and apple. The palate offers flavours of apricot, grapefruit and a hint of honey. It's light-bodied and crisp, with a palate-cleansing finish. Pair with mushroom risotto or grilled shrimp.

title: Yellow Tail Pinot Grigio
Description: Pale straw colour; aromas of nuts, floral note, spice, mushrooms and herbs; dry, medium bodied, with mellow acidity, and delicate flavours of herbs and nuts.

title: Domaine Dampt Chablis Passover 2017
Description: Light greeny-gold colour. Fresh, lively and mineral nose. Notes of lime-flower, mint, and acacia. On the palate, these aromas retain their freshness for an extended period. Perky and full of juice, the attack is intense. Long and likeable persistence leads to a smooth and serene finish. Very dry and impeccably delicate.

title: Villa Maria Wairau Valley Reserve Sauvignon Blanc 2019
Description: An authoritative wine, it is typically ripe and zingy, with impressive weight and length of flavour, and tends to be fuller in body, less herbaceous and rounder than its Clifford Bay stablemate (above). The contributing vineyards vary from vintage to vintage, but Peter and Deborah Jackson's warm, stony vineyard in the heart of the valley has long been a key source of grapes, and sometimes a small part of the blend is barrel-fermented, to enhance its complexity and texture. The 2019 vintage (5*) was handled entirely in tanks. Weighty, it is highly concentrated, with rich, well-ripened tropical-fruit flavours, fresh, dry (3.2 grams/litre of residual sugar), crisp and long. Value for Money. Score - 5 Stars (out of 5). (michaelcooper.co.nz, 2020)

title: Parlez Vous Sauvignon Blanc, IGP Loire
Wieninger Wiener Gemischter Satz Nussberg 2017
Description: 91 points Wine Advocate '...Opens with an intense and ripe but deep, fresh and beautifully mineral bouquet of white ripe fruits intermixed with crushed salt. Full-bodied and dense on the palate, this Nussberg is...pretty juicy and, perhaps, more what you expect from an Austrian white wine. Fine tannins here that give this more creamy-textured wine good aging potential.'

title: Oggi Botter Pinot Grigio DOC
Description: The freshness and zing of pinot grigio from Northern Italy give Oggi its light and charming, crowd-pleasing character.  Delicate aromas of lees - mushrooms and bread, lead to minerally, banana and nuts flavours. The finish is light and fresh. Serve as an aperitif or pair with garlic and chili prawns or grilled mussels.

title: Cantina Bolzano Kleinstein Chardonnay 2018
Description: This Chardonnay was fermented in both stainless steel and French barriques. The resulting wine will offer tropical banana notes alongside passion fruit, honeydew melon, and a pure mineral tone. An elegant, fresh wine ideal for light appetizers.

title: Bodacious Pinot Grigio
Description: Bodacious wines are gaining a following for their bold, yet smooth character. Lifted aromas of quince, herbs, spice and green apple. The palate is dry, with balanced acidity and medium body. Serve well-chilled as a patio sipper, or pair with garden salads, appetizers and light cuisine.

title: Château Des Charmes Atelier White VQA
Description: A delightful blend of riesling, gewurztraminer and auxerrois. This displays vibrant aromas and flavours of lime, perfumed floral notes, nuts, pear and melon. On the palate, this is dry, light-plus and fresh with balanced acidity on the finish. Great on its own or paired with white fish or spicy Thai dishes.

title: Serenity by Lakeview Cellars Sauvignon Blanc VQA
Description: A gold medal winner at the 2019 All Canadian Wine Championships. Quite aromatic, showing lifted aromas and flavours of yellow berries and plum, lime zest and pear. The palate is extra dry with moderate, balanced acidity on the refreshing finish. Pair with goat cheese, vegetables or herb seasoned white meats.

title: Toro Bravo Verdejo Sauvignon Blanc DO La Mancha
Description: This zesty Spanish blend ticks all the boxes for white wine enjoyment. The verdejo brings texture to the blend while the sauvignon blanc supplies fruit and acidity. Look for aromas and flavours of citrus - graprefruit, with hints of herbs, nuts and lime zest and a soft, balanced finish. Pair with pork, fish or tapas.

title: Te Henga Sauvignon Blanc Marlborough
Description: New Zealand's Marlborough region burst on the wine scene in the 1980s with is vibrant style of sauvignon blanc. Te Henga follows suit with intense aromas and flavours of lime blossoms, kiwi, herbs and a graprefruit hint ending with a lifted, refreshing finish.  Enjoy with cedar-planked salmon, mussels or grilled vegetables.

title: Asyrtiko White 2018
Description: Vibrant yellow green in colour with aromas of fresh fruits, pleasant tones of citrus fruits, freshness, and a fairly long finish.
By:: G. Tsimpidis And Co. Monemvasia Win

title: Kastropolitia White
Description: Light gold in colour with notes of flower, apple, and pear on the nose. On the palate crisp with a long finish.
By:: G. Tsimpidis And Co. Monemvasia Win

title: Icellars Estate Winery Chardonnay 2017
Description: Made from 100% estate grapes, fermented in barrel and aged 12 months in French oak.

title: Adamo Estate Chardonnay 2017
Description: Harvested by hand from the winery's estate vineyard, fermented in French oak and matured in barrel for 10 months. Drink through 2028.

title: Skipping Stone White VQA
Description: This label is attractive and functional too: it's temperature-sensitive and turns blue when perfectly chilled. A vidal based wine brimming with floral, fresh fig, pear and citrus notes. The palate is medium bodied, fruity and refreshing with soft acidity and a gentle spritz. Perfect for sipping on the patio with friends.

title: McGuigan Black Label Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Award-winning McGuigan Wines is one of the pillars of Australian wine. This full-flavoured savvy displays the key hallmark notes that wine enthusiasts expect of this variety. Expect upfront aromas and flavours of kiwi, nuts, citrus and toast. Pair with grilled seafood, salads or soft cheeses.

title: Bocchino Giuseppe Chardonnay Elya Piemonte DOC 2018
Description: Intense straw yellow in colour with greenish hues and a floral bouquet. This wine is extremely fruity, fresh with aromas that recall tropical fruits. Pair with seafood hors d'oeuvre, risotto, and fish. Also great as an aperitif.

title: Black Cellar Chardonnay
Description: Great wine from an all-Canadian company. Shows aromas of fresh fig, toast, yellow plum with floral and vanilla notes. The palate is extra dry, medium bodied and smooth. Expect flavours of fig, toast, plum and vanilla on a long refreshing finish. Serve on its own or with salmon.

title: Türk Ried Obere Kremser Sandgrube Reserve Grüner Veltliner 2017
Description: Zest, pear, miso, pepper and fennel seed are all hinted at on the nose and appear inside a lovely, zesty frame on the concentrated palate. Yeasty texture amplifies the savoriness of the herb and miso notes, but lemon zest provides a lovely, full-flavored and refreshing finish. Score - 93. (Anne Krebiehl, MW, Wine Enthusiast, March 1, 2019)

title: The Audacity of Thomas G. Bright Chardonnay VQA
Description: In 1874, Thomas G Bright dared to dream that a Niagara area winery could flourish and grow. Arterra Wines honours their pioneer with this golden-hued chardonnay. Notes of citrus, toast and vanilla with nuances of pear and fresh fig. Medium-bodied and rich with a long finish. Enjoy with lobster bisque or roasted chicken.

title: Viña Maipo Sauvignon Blanc Chardonnay
Description: Chilean wines offer tremendous value. This light, crisp white aged in stainless steel to preserve its fresh fruit characteristics, is poised to be a patio wine extraordinaire. Aromas and flavours of citrus, peach and apple finish with refreshing, crisp acidity. Pair with grilled fish, chicken kebabs or a fresh summer salad.

title: The Kitchen Zinc 2017
Description: On both the nose and palate, this complex white blend of six grape varieties gives off vibrant notes of gooseberry, wheat grass, lemon, key lime, and pineapple; all of which are accented with beautiful floral attributes and a delicate minerality; with fruit flavours persisting throughout the finish.

title: Lake Sonoma Chardonnay 2018
Description: The cooler Russian River Valley has imparted some acid driven levity and brightness, yet there is still considerable ripeness with peach/apricot fruit, some orange blossom and moderate oak spice. It is medium-full bodied, almost creamy in texture with moderate alcohol. The balance is very good here. Could be a dram drier but this is solid. Very good to excellent length. Score - 89. (David Lawrason, winealign.com, June 5, 2020)

title: Fishbone Premium Black Label Sauvignon Blanc 2018
Description: 'From a single vineyard in Wilyabrup, hand-picked, cool-fermented, matured on lees for 8 months. There's some high quality fruit here that was happy to bypass oak, simply offering lime and Meyer lemon with bright acidity. James Halliday Wine Companion - Silver 93 Points

title: Fishbone Chardonnay 2017
Description: 'A splash of Margaret River semillon thrown in with the Geographe chardonnay here. Light oak maturation. Simple peachy varietal character with a touch of vanilla courtesy of the oak. A hint of sweetness suggests serving well chilled.' Steven Creber - James Halliday Wine Companion 2020 - Bronze 87 Points

title: Fishbone Premium Black Label Semillion 2018
Description: 'Hand-picked, 50% fermented and matured in new and used French hogsheads, 50% in stainless steel. The approach has worked particularly well, fresh and crisp lemon tingle and subtle but effective oak providing texture and structure. A very attractive wine, deserving its price - great now, great later.' James Halliday Wine Companion 2020 - Gold 95 Points

title: Fishbone Sweet Lips 2017
Description: Pale straw with lime green rim with a fragrant citrus and apple blossom nose. Sweet and crisp with natural acidity and intense ripe pear fruit flavours from start to finish.

title: Tom of Finland Freestanding White 2018
Description: The label depicts Tom of Finland's artwork, showcasing a wine that is full of flavour and character. Aromas of green apple and soft vanilla that tantalize the senses to full flavors of fresh peaches and tropical fruits that finish creamy with some vanilla oak undertones.

title: Harvey River Estate Chardonnay 2017
Description: Deep straw with faint green edge and aromas of pear, citrus fruits, and vanilla toasted oak. Off dry on the palate and striking natural acid backbone supports this delicately balanced wine. The lemon citrus fruit and mild toasted oak persists from start to a drying finish. Drink over next 5 years.

title: Harvey River Estate Sauvignon Blanc 2018
Description: Pale straw with a faint lime green rim and aromas of grapefruit and lime. This wine is off-dry with striking natural acid underlying green apple and lime fruits.

title: Nostos Vidiano White 2018
Description: Bright intense lemon-green in colour with aromas of ripe fruits, honeycomb and dried flowers. On the palate, mineral notes and citrus flavours. Medium body, with a long finish and mineral (salty) aftertaste. Pair with light fish, oysters, seafood and poultry in white sauces.

title: Nostos Assyrtiko White 2018
Description: Bright, light lemon-green colour with aromas of apple, pear and lychee. Mineral and herbaceous. Dense, full-bodied, balanced acidity and tannins. Best served with seafood on the grill, steamed mussels and raw fish.

title: Domaine Jacques Tissot Arbois Vin Jaune 2011
Description: A blend from three of the Domaine's different terroirs: En Sauvagny, En Mailloche and Les Bruyères. Strikingly deep golden yellow in colour. An exceedingly intense and aromatic nose with distinctive notes of walnuts, almonds and caramel. Full and powerful on the palate with pronounced, long-lasting flavours of fresh walnuts, curry, and nutmeg.

title: Stormy Bay Sauvignon Blanc
Description: A tasty sauvignon blanc from South Africa made from select, hand-harvested grapes. Vibrant aromas and flavours of gooseberry, quince, citrus and white melon. The palate is fresh and clean with fleshy gooseberry and quince fruit on the zesty finish. Great on its own or matched to grilled seafood and green salads.

title: Bar Dog Chardonnay
Description: Named in honour of faithful hounds everywhere, Bar Dog offers a well-balanced, refreshing chardonnay. Its aromas and flavours of lifted ripe pineapple fruit, followed by notes of nuts, honey and citrus lead to a fresh finish. Pair with roast chicken, grilled pork chops or vegetarian fare and enjoy with Spot at your side.

title: Kew Vineyards Pinot Grigio 2017
Description: The grapes for this 2017 Pinot Grigio were harvested early in the season to lock in the high acidity that helps offset and balance the ripe fruit tones. The winemaker says this dry PG is a great everyday wine, with grapefruit citrus, honeydew, tropical fruit and a fresh acidity. Try it with Mediterranean-style cod.

title: Team Canada White VQA
Description: Official wine supplier and sponsor for the Canadian Olympic Committee. This blend of gewurztraminer, pinot grigio and riesling show attractive aromas of nuts, citrus, honeydew melon, vanilla and pear. The palate is dry with moderate acidity. Serve with ham, pork or chicken with fruit compote.

title: Ramos Pinto Quintas Branco 2018
Description: Clean and bright, very pale with light gold reflections. This white blend is tropical and balanced and pairs perfectly with chicken and turkey.

title: Vidiano White 2018
Description: Vidiano, a Cretan varietal is light yellow in colour with notes of quince, pear, citrus and almonds. Nice acidity, velvety texture and noticeable aftertaste. Pair with seafood, fish, pasta with light sauces and grilled vegetables.

title: Carabella Estate Pinot Gris 2017
Description: This 20th anniversary release is a zippy, sassy fruit bomb of a wine. Apple cider, a squirt of grapefruit, and plenty of juicy acidity push the flavors forward and keep the mouthfeel fresh and lively. Drink now-2020. Editors' Choice.  Score - 91. (Paul Gregutt, Wine Enthusiast, Feb. 1, 2019)

title: Schiopetto Pinot Bianco Collio DOC 2017
Description: Aromas of Granny Smith apple, white grapefruit and white spring flower carry over to the elegant full-bodied palate along with a ginger note. It's balanced, with bright acidity that lifts the juicy finish.

title: Sand Point Chardonnay
Description: Twin brothers Brad and Randall Lange are fourth generation California winegrape farmers. Their commitment to the environment is embodied in expressive, well-made wines. Their vibrant and rich Chardonnay is brimming with tropical fruit flavour, and hints of toasty oak and vanilla. Pair with fish cakes or eggs benedict.

title: F.X.Pichler Ried Steinertal Riesling Smaragd 2017
Description: 94 points Wine Advocate 'The 2017 Ried Steinertal Riesling Smaragd is intense and flinty on the dark and stony, very flinty and coolish nose with its concentrated white peach and lime aromas. Full-bodied, sharp, super pure and mineral on the palate, this is a full-bodied, tight, fresh and serious wine with a long and tensioned but still terribly young finish. Great complexity and tension! One of the finest Rieslings from the Danube River in 2017.'

title: Weingut Von Hövel Scharzhofberger Kabinett VDP GL Off Dry 2018
Description: A true Scharzhofberg Riesling with a grip. Full bodied and closed. Grapefruit dominates, supported by a distinctive minerality.

title: Mercouri Foloi 2018
Description: 90% Roditis 10% Viognier. Crystal clear yellow-green colour. Delicate bouquet, scent of citrus flowers & fruits. Generous, fresh taste, lingering.

title: Curtefranca Bianco Vigna Bosco Alto 2013
Description: Clear and brilliant with a golden yellow colour.  Ample nose characterized by delicate hints of vanilla and toasted wood.  Well balanced and smooth to the palate with a complex, robust structure supported by good acidity and a scent of ripe exotic fruit.

title: Tement Weissburgunder Südsteiermark 2018
Description: A very faint but pure note of ripe lemon plays on the nose of this wine. The palate still has some slight fizz from the ferment but displays the same lovely lemon note and adds green apple. It's light, dry, fresh and subtle, with a zingy, long and clean finish.

title: Tement Hochkittenberg Morillon 2015
Description: 90-91 points Wine Advocate 'From a chalk-free schist conglomerate in the Sausal, the intensely lime colored 2015 Hochkittenberg Terrassen Morillon (aka Chardonnay, blended with a kiss of Riesling and Sauvignon Blanc) is clear, intense and flinty.

title: Da Dina Aguiar White 2018
Description: Presents a citric colour and a brightness on its clarity. Its acidity is persistent and its dry body provides an elegant balance. The finish is long, fresh, and fruity. Should be ocnsumed at a temperature of 10 to 12 C. 2650 units were bottled.

title: Unwined Smooth White
Description: This exciting new brand by Colio is a crowd-pleaser. It offers simplicity and great taste that is easy to understand and enjoy. Refreshing and fruity with aromas and flavours of yellow plum, herbs, pastry and pear. Dry with a hint of sweetness that balances nicely with soft acidity. Pairs well with salty snacks or tacos.

title: Chivaryon White Wine Kosher 2018
Description: A vibrant honey coloured wine with lemon and pineapple notes. Lovely minerality and hints of fresh green apple on the palate. Fresh and clean finish.

title: Tinhof Golden ERD Neuburger 2016
Description: Russet pear peel, hay flower, spruce and wet earth subtly combine into an intriguing, appetizing nose. The palate comes in with an unexpected but delightful lemon brightness that highlights that aromatic edge of conifer.

title: Tinhof Neuburger 2017
Description: Overtones of short crust pastry and fruitiness are reminiscent of apple pie on this nutty, textured and sunny Austrian original. This Neuburger's major focus is on freshness and verve. It has a pleasantly fruity, ripe but refreshing body with lip-smacking freshness.

title: Monte do Zambujeiro White Alentejo 2017
Description: This is an equal blend of Arinto and Antão Vaz, unoaked. Punching above its weight, this shows good mid-palate depth and a crisp, fresh finish laced with citrus and pear. It is a good wine to pair with those foods that can use a clean white with acidity.

title: Tinhof Leithaberg Weissburgunder 2017
Description: 93 points Wine Enthusiast 'Very ripe notes of juicy yellow pear have a creamy, earthy element on the nose. Their creaminess continues on the full-fruited but fresh palate. It is that lactic roundness that lingers. The finish reveals a pleasant pithiness that will stand this in good stead.'

title: Monte Mar White
Description: Cristal clear wine with a light citrus yellow hue. The bouquet reveals fresh notes of tropical and citrus fruit, confirmed in a well-balanced mouthfeel, where a vibrant and refreshing acidity bond with some residual sugar resulting in an attractive and elegant wine.

title: The Magic Box Wondrous Chardonnay
Description: Magic Box wines come from a place 'where sipping is believing,' also known as Casella Family Brands. This wonder from down under boasts aromas of vanilla, toast, fresh fig, pear and citrus, flavours of ripe fruit, vanilla and toast and a clean, refreshing finish. Enjoy with grilled seafood, chicken and creamy pasta dishes.

title: Guyot Moscatel Galego 2018
Description: Hand harvest coming from a schist and granite vineyard in high altitude. Bouquet of flowers, lemon zest and boxwood. Elegant and energetic with laser beam acidity and a great light refreshing finish that lingers on the palate.
By:: Aguiar De Morais Vaz + Olazabal Fer

title: Arenae White 2017
Description: Made from very old Malvasia de Colares vines. Aromas of meyer lemon and lime with mineral notes. Palate is dry and fresh, with mineral and salt notes that compliment the citrus with great length on the finish.

title: Sterling Vineyards Chardonnay
Description: Bottled in 375 ml aluminum cans, this portable chardonnay's grapes are sourced from vineyards along California's Central Coast. Discover aromas and flavours of toast, butter, yellow plum and vanilla that continue to a fresh, clean finish. Enjoy with grilled chicken, seafood, light pasta or packed with a picnic lunch.

title: Rapaura Bull Paddock Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc 2018
Description: 95 pts Bob Campbell; 92 pts DWWA 2019. Bold and fresh aromas of freshly crushed blackcurrant leaf, citrus notes of grapefruit and lime with some underlying boxwood notes. The palate is rich with generous tropical fruits and a crunchy oyster shell minerality that underpins the wine. This is complemented by an attractive, ripe acidity and racy finish.

title: Reservoir Vineyard Marlborough 2017
Description: 94 pts Bob Campbell. Just over 7000 individually numbered bottles produced of this exceptional Pinot Noir. Gorgeous red and black fruit mix on the nose; black cherries, plums and currants. Medium-deep ruby colour, just starting to mature to brick red at the edges. Somewhat muscular Pinot Noir, broad on the palate - but still elegant and showy with its long, flavoursome finish.

title: Or Haganuz Amuka Gewurtztraminer Kosher 2017
Description: The floral and tropical nose explodes out of the glass on this Gewurtz. Great acidity balances it out. Crisp, dry and full of personality.

title: Baron Herzog Pinot Grigio Kosher 2018
Description: Characterized by a perfect balance of acidity and fresh, fruity aromas, it has wonderful perfume notes on the nose, followed by lemon, melon and notes of other tropical and citrus fruits. Wine is light bodied, but well balanced bringing a refreshing fusion of sugars and dryness.

title: Prince Chardonnay PGI Peloponnese 2017
Description: A pale honey coloured wine, vibrant ripe with a slightly oaky flavour with notes of pear and pineapple. Creamy and full bodied with a long finish. Serve with pasta, white meat, seafood and grilled fish.

title: Degenfeld Szamorodni Sweet 2013
Description: Straw coloured. On the nose it is complex, spicy, with a hint of watermelon and pineapple. A great dessert wine, that lingers long.

title: Prelude Chardonnay 2017
Description: An elegant, vibrant and fragrant nose with lemon, lime and pear in the foreground. Notes of peach blossom and subtle jasmine create lift and combines with cardamom pod, almond meal and roasted cashew. The palate has immense purity, with power and persistence.

title: Oenomeio
Description: Fresh aromas of Muscat followed by undertones of honey and candied lemon characterize this sweet, lively white wine with a long, sweet aftertaste. Serve with sweet and sour sauces, finger food, sweets, dry fruits, nuts or on its own as an aperitif.

title: Chateau Changyu Moser XV Blanc 2018
Description: The colour comes with a hue of rose, just a touch to indicate the provenance. Surprisingly peachy on the nose with a cornucopia of floral aromas - it certainly enlarges the spectrum of the fragrance in the wine. On the palate it offers a stunning lusciousness of peach and exotic fruits with a hint of violet. The vibrancy comes from its perfectly embedded acidity. A long and rewarding finish.

title: Kacaba Barrel Fermented Chardonnay 2017
Description: Small-batch, precision winemaking is the cornerstone of Kacaba's approach. This Chardonnay is floral, with suggestions of bruised apple, ginger spice and vanilla along with a buttery, creamy texture and a round, long finish. A good option for pork chops or barbecued chicken. (Vintages panel, March 2019)

title: Vinha da Urze White 2017
Description: This wine is delicious, fruity and creamy. It has a crisp, fresh feel, light and bright while also full of ripe white fruits, apples and pears. Drink now.

title: Oberkircher Winzer Rivaner Feinherb QbA 2018
Description: Delicate aromas of apple and citrus. Juicy freshness with a slight note of nutmeg. This lively and refreshing wine is the perfect partner for the porch.

title: Chateau Sigalas-Rabaud Sauternes 2004
Description: An intense, concentrated wine, opulently smooth, with rich peach and pineapple freshness sweetened by maple syrup and spice. It's deliciously rich, lingering for a long time in the mouth. The wine is aged in an average of 33% new, French oak barrels for a minimum of 18 months before bottling. The mouth is intense, wide and reveals in finale a nice balance thanks to the touch of acidity. WE 91 Pts

title: Chateau Sigalas-Rabaud N5 de Sigalas Sans Souffre 2017
Description: According to the traditional method in Sauternes, the slightly over-ripe grapes are carefully picked by hand. The first nose is complex and elegant. It reveals a lovely aromatic expression with citrus notes, exotic fruits and white flowers. The palate is sweet, greedy and really fresh with pink grapefruit for an easy to drink wine. The balance between fruits, natural sugar and liveliness contribute to an ample and harmonious wine.

title: Nadim Sauvignon Blanc 2018
Description: Medium-bodied with rich aromas of citrus and green apple. This wine exhibits complex flavors of grapefruit and pineapple with a refreshing and lingering finish.

title: Domaine Dampt Bourgogne Tonnerre KP 2017
Description: Yellow colour with hints of green. The nose is lightly smoky and mineral with aromas of brioche and fresh caramel. Then appears aromas of Anis and mixed citrus fruits like lemon and tangerine. Smooth in the mouth with green notes first and riper fruits later. Very lively acidity that will allow you to keep this wine for a few more years.

title: Comuna Chardonnay Pinot Grigio
Description: Comuna is an area in Argentina where the Tango originated. This fragrant blend will sweep you off your feet, with its aromas and flavours of citrus, quince, vanilla, mushrooms and yellow pear. Fresh and clean on the palate with lifted citrus and quince notes on the finish. A crowd-pleasing blend.

title: Canyon Road Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Canyon Road uses fruit from central and northern coastal regions of California, and crafts wines that deliver freshness and remarkable value. This food-friendly sauvignon blanc is medium bodied with lifted notes of grapefruit, herbs and quince. Serve at your next gathering with spinach salad, sushi or grilled vegetables.

title: Los Cardos Doña Paula Sauvignon Blanc
Description: The grapes were grown in renowned vineyards using sustainable agriculture practices. Light green with bright aromas and flavours of fresh citrus, herbs, kiwi, lees and yellow berry. Medium bodied and fresh on the palate with green fruit and mineral-like notes on the cleansing finish. A great 'house' white.

title: Gato Negro Chardonnay
Description: Well-priced and delicious chardonnay from Chile's central valley. Pale gold with aromas of yellow plum, mineral and citrus leading to added  flavours of herbs and nutty oak. Soft and buttery on the palate with fresh plum and citrus tones on the clean and balanced finish. Try with bbq white meat, or rich fish.

title: Stina Posip 2018
Description: Posip is a white wine of glossy yellow colour with some green hue tones. On the nose, it reveals ripe citrus, apricots and the sea. The mouth is filling with a firm taste of ripe citrus, hints of apricot, wet stone and flint with a nice grip in the middle. The finish is medium to long with a minerally saline signature. Great with seafood!!
By:: Jako Vino D.O.O. Operating As Stina

title: Sigalas Aidani PGI 2018
Description: Aromatic, with hints of tropical fruit, flower blossom and herbs. In the after-taste, minerality is evident, as a result of Santorini's unique terroir.

title: Herdade dos Veros Selection White 2018
Description: Citrus colour; good aromatic intensity, fresh and rich with ripe quality fruit and traces of pineapple and passion fruit; good structure, body and creaminess, all combined in harmony with some cool acidity, in long and lively finale.

title: Zaphy Organic Chardonnay
Description: 100% organic chardonnay from Mendoza in Argentina. In the glass, its light yellow-green colour leads to intense aromas and flavours of ripe pear, yellow flowers, fresh fig and honey. The palate is bright and fresh, with a lingering finish. Match to roast chicken, pan-seared salmon with citrus butter or scallop ceviche.

title: Fish Hoek Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Straw colour with hints of green; floral, kiwi, gooseberry, citrus and grassy aromas; extra dry, medium body; fresh kiwi, gooseberry and citrus flavours, well balanced.

title: Alvarinho Reserva 2017
Description: Comes from a selection of the best Alvarinho grapes of the property. Aroma of passion fruit, orange blossom and peach. Palate is dry and full with tons of tropical fruits and mineral notes with great structure and a long finish.

title: Tzivanis White Selection Arma-Chariot 2018
Description: A gentle, yellow-green colour of remarkable clarity. Wine with a powerful aroma of exotic fruit, peach and citrus. A rich, cool and beautifully balanced flavour, pleasant acidity and a lasting, fragrant aftertaste.

title: 8 Winds Athiri Sterea Ellada Organic 2018
Description: This charismatic Athiri is one of the most ancient of Greek grape varieties. It offers to us a particular organic wine with bright colour, perfumes of peach and wild flowers with a balanced and refreshing finish.

title: Macanita Folgasão Dos Dois! 2018
Description: This is made from 100% Falgasão in the Douro. It's a mineral driven white, with a fresh nose and a touch of citrus. It's crisp and clean, perfect with lighter fare or on it's own.

title: Kyklos White Selection Organic 2018
Description: Elegant organic wine with bright colour, wild flowers and peach aromas, opulent mouth and charming finish.

title: Calamus Ball's Falls White 2017
Description: With so many superb white grapes produced here, it should be no shock that Ontario is home to a wealth of impressive, characterful white blends. This one is Riesling, Pinot Gris and Gewurztraminer, and you can expect it to be aromatic and fresh with tangy apple and pear. This will be great with seafood appetizers.

title: Collato Verdiso Colli Trevigiani IGP 2017
Description: The wine appears straw yellow, with greenish highlights that testify to the wine's notable crispness. On the nose, ample notes of stylish pear and apple meld into fragrant just-mown hay. In the mouth, a very forceful acidic grip predominates over the other components, combining with the palate's elegant leanness and full-flavoured sapidity to ensure a truly nonpareil ageability. The pleasureableness and overall cleanness of the palate make this an ideal aperitif wine and a delicious companion to a wide range of freshwater fish dishes, summertime savoury pies, and goat and ewe's milk cheeses.

title: Techni Alipias White 2019
Description: Bright greenish-white colour, nose with aromas of citrus and characteristic notes of mango and flower scents on the nose. Mouth feel fruity, juicy, cool and soft, easy-to-drink, long aftertaste and aromatic.

title: Saints Hills Posh South Dalmatia 2018
Description: Clear golden colour. First nose is dominated by aromas of fresh ripe apricot, and mango. Secondary aromas on the nose are lemon and lime (even lemon zest), honey and dry figs. Palate is complex and layered with aromas of ripe fruit, peaches, apricot and some pineapple. Finish is very long, with specific bitter-sweet aftertaste.

title: Cabeca de Burro Reserva White 2018
Description: A wine with an excellent aroma. Serve with seafood, grilled fresh fish, white meats or simply as an aperitif.

title: Salwey GbR RS Weissburgunder VDP Ortswein 2017
Description: Subtle aromas of citrus and green apple on the nose. An elegant wine with lively acidity. This 2017 vintage has excellent aging potential.

title: The Beachhouse Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Pale straw colour; grass, citrus aromas with light smoky, savory touches; dry, medium body; flavours match the aromas, with balanced, clean finish.

title: DogRidge THE PUP Chardonnay 2018
Description: This un-oaked wine reminds me of freshly cut pears and crisp green apples. It's light and fruity, with a crisp, fresh, and lively finish.

title: Wagner Dry Riesling 2017
Description: This dry Riesling is an outstanding food wine, fresh and full-bodied with restrained fruit and lively acidity and a smooth, beautifully balanced finish. A perfect accompaniment for seafood, chicken and other light meals. 90 points Wine Enthusiast + 93 points Critics Challenge International Wine Comp. 2019

title: The Wanted Chard Chardonnay
Description: Fermented first in stainless steel then transferred to oak barrels to finish the fermentation. The wine ages in barrel for a further five to six months, adding complexity and richness. Notes of toast, nuts, yellow plum and vanilla blend in this soft and round chardonnay. Serve with wood-fire roasted chicken or grilled fish.

title: Quinta Nova Grainha White Reserva 2018
