Description: 87-89 Wine Advocate '... 30% each of Gouveio and Viosinho with 40% Rabigato, all aged for eight months in 30% new oak... Seeming rather light this year, it is pretty similar in style to past years, but this might be a little more delicate than some. It handles the wood well and has a fairly perky feel.'
By:: Quinta Nova De Nossa Senhora D

title: Hosmer Chardonnay 2017
Description: Hosmer family has been making award-winning wines in the Finger Lakes, New York for over 30 years at their family winery. Their 2017 Hosmer Chardonnay is highly aromatic with flavours of Meyer lemon, coriander and lime blossoms on the nose. The palate is bright with smooth flavours of fresh honeysuckle and pineapple.

title: Stone Hills 2019
Description: The fruity character of Chardonnay blends with aromas of banana, apple, pear and is getting married with more mature characters of peach, apricot and orange aromas of Malagouzia variety. The acidity of Chardonnay balances the soft and pleasant body of Malagouzia. A fragile balance that creates a well-balanced and delicate wine.

title: Quinta Nova Mirabilis Grande Reserva Branco 2018
Description: 92-94 Wine Advocate '...mostly a field blend from old vines with 20% Gouveio aged for nine months in new oak (mostly French with 10% Hungarian)...A bit delicate this year, it was still impressive for its long finish, purity (even with the oak) and grip. This should age well, as it seems a bit fresher than normal, if also a bit more delicate than normal...The structure is great but expect to see better integration of the fruit and structure.'
By:: Quinta Nova De Nossa Senhora D

title: Anemos White 2018
Description: A fruity wine with aromas and flavours of fresh fruits: apples, bananas, pears, pineapple and lemon blossoms. Pleasant and balanced wine with light body, refreshing acidity and fruity aftertaste.

title: Rapariga Da Quinta Branco 2018
Description: Twelve months of aging in French oak barrels imparts toasty wood flavours to this red blend from Portugals Alentejo region. Savour the rich fruit aromas and soft tannins with traditional Mediterranean meat and pasta dishes.

title: Terras do Po Branco 2018
Description: A fruity white wine with light-green tints, reminiscent of citrus and tropical fruit. Its excellent level of acidity makes this a fresh wine. Fresh, very pleasant, with a fruity end note.

title: Ermelinda Sauvignon Blanc 2018
Description: A green-tinted white wine with an intense aroma, notes of tropical fruit and a floral touch. Elegant and refreshing on the palate, with good acidity. A pleasant, long-lasting final note.

title: Vino da uve Moscato Appassite-Re d'Autun
Description: Made with 100% Moscato Bianco di Canelli. Intense golden yellow in colour with very aromatic, marked notes of ripe grapes and nutmeg, hints of sage and orange flowers. Full, fills the mouth, sweet, velvety, soft and warm on the palate.Serve with desserts of all kinds, pastries and ripe cheeses or on its own.

title: Pelee Island Lola Chardonnay VQA
Description: Lola first arrived as a rosé and won our hearts; now you can try their food-friendly chardonnay. It has appealing notes of apple, melon, citrus and spice. This wine is aromatic and flavourful with a long-lasting finish. Pair it with grilled halibut over a bed of rice, or a soft cheese plate with crackers and grapes.

title: Villa Maria Private Bin Chardonnay East Coast
Description: Villa Maria is New Zealand's most awarded winery, and fully committed to sustainability. This is a fruit-forward chardonnay with notable balance and freshness. Fresh fig, smoke, vanilla, pear and nutty flavours enhanced by a creamy texture on a medium-plus body. Enjoy with seafood, creamy pasta dishes or with appetizers.

title: Stel + Mar Premium White Wine
Description: Was: $4.95 Stel+Mar is a hip Canadian-owned company that is offering premium-quality wine in a convenient, fully recyclable can. Premium White is an un-oaked chardonnay from Mendocino, California, brimming with ripe orchard fruit and lively citrusy flavours; chill and serve with your favourite casual fare.

title: Schiopetto Sauvignon Collio DOC 2018
Description: The Sauvignon of Collio by Schiopetto is a white wine with a rich, aromatic and elegant profile, aged in steel for at least 8 months. The nose reveals a great variety of scents, including notes of mint, citrus and tropical fruit. On the palate it is perfectly balanced thanks to the mineral freshness.

title: Matua Hawke's Bay Sauvingon Blanc
Description: Award-winning wine, crafted off the beaten path in Hawke's Bay. Brimming with lifted aromas and flavours of spice, grapefruit, smoke and herbs. The palate is fresh and clean with balanced acidity and notes of citrus and herbs on the finish. Try with light seafood and herbed fish dishes.

title: Just Roberto Chardonnay 2018
Description: Straw yellow, brilliant, with evident greenish reflections. Intense, fresh and fruity, with a hint of tropical fruit and green apple. Harmonious, soft, fresh with good body and persistence.

title: Riunite Moscato D'Oro
Description: For decades Riunite has been one of North America's most popular imported wine brands. This lightly sparkling wine, made from Moscato grape, is medium-sweet, lightly fizzy and brimming with orange blossom, pear and peach flavours. Light carbonation and low alcohol make this the ideal aperitif or partner for casual cuisine.

title: Dionysos White
Description: Gold yellow in colour with pleasantly fruity aromas, singling out a harmonic note of jasmine. Cool animation with nice, rich structure, balanced acidity and clean finish. A wine with a friendly personality.

title: Castel Sallegg Pinot Grigio 2018
Description: Typical bright yellow colour with light greenish reflexes. Pleasant scent of apricot, ripe Mirabelle and a delicate underlying minerality. Juicy and fresh on the palate with light, green and fruity elements of lemon peel.

title: Castel Sallegg Moscato Giallo 2018
Description: Pale yellow with sparkling greenish reflexes and the typical fragrance of a Moscato Giallo. Hints of green apple and biscuit, orange blossom, discrete notes of citrus and mango. Juicy and aromatic on the palate with a delicate acidity and strong fruity and floral notes in the finish.

title: Castel Sallegg Pinot Bianco 2018
Description: Pale yellow colour with light greenish reflexes. Seductive, fresh aroma reminiscent of citrus, fresh hazelnuts and ripe apples with underlying notes of elderflower and pineapple. Clean and fresh on the palate, with a well-balanced acidity, pleasant structure and lingering finish in the mouth.

title: Matteo Bianco
Description: The Bianco version of Matteo is a Trebbiano-based blend with other white varieties from the beautiful Abruzzo region in central Italy. This wine presents a fresh, floral, spice and grapefruit character with its clean texture and clear fruit flavours. Great value, and a food-friendly alternative to Pinot Grigio.

title: Casal Cordeiro White 2018
Description: Citrus green in colour, this wine is intense and very elegant. Notes of citrus fruits, lychees and mineral nuances. Dry, good mouth volume and a fresh and enveloping acidity with a long finish.

title: Quinta D'Amares Loureiro 2019
Description: Citrus, with lemon nuances. Young varietal aroma, fruity with floral notes. Harmonious, balanced acidity and minerality.

title: Quinta D'Amares Loureiro - Arinto 2019
Description: Citrus with lemon nuances. Young and balanced, soft aroma, marked by fresh fruit and floral nests. Fresh, vibrant, full bodied and harmonious.

title: Provolo Soave Veneto DOC
Description: Soave is one of the great wines of Italy's Veneto region. Made from the garganega grape variety, it has delicate citrus, floral and nutty aromas. On the palate, it is velvety smooth, with flavours of grapefruit, nuts and yellow plum. Serve on its own as an aperitif, or pair with appetizers, sushi or grilled vegetables.

title: Barefoot Moscato
Description: A crowd pleaser. Delightfully perfumed and floral, soft, sweet and low in alcohol - it's easy to enjoy. Shows irresistible aromas of ripe pear, peach and orange blossom with a touch of honey and honeydew melon. The palate is sweet with balanced lemony acidity, leading to flavours of exotic fruit compote with a citrus twist.

title: Trinity Oaks Chardonnay
Description: Partnering with Trees for the Future, a nonprofit that's planted over 180 million trees, Trinity Oaks plants one tree per bottle purchased. The grapes come from sustainably farmed vineyards. Its juicy citrus and pear flavours, hints of oak toast and vanilla and silky finish pair nicely with chicken pot pie or creamy pasta.

title: Casa Ermelinda Freitas Pinot Noir Reserva 2017
Description: A ruby-coloured wine with the fruity aroma of ripe fruit and the typical Pinot Noir sweetness, well integrated with wood. It's round and full in the mouth with a rich, persistent and elegant finish.

title: Casa Ermelinda Freitas Alvarinho 2018
Description: A green-tinted white wine with an intense aroma, notes of tropical fruit and floral and citrus hints. Elegant and refreshing on the palate, with good acidity. A pleasant, long-lasting final note.

title: Ashkar Chardonnay 2019
Description: The Chardonnay grapes were picked from a mature vineyard lying at the foot of Mount Miron in the Upper Galilee. Our full bodied Chardonnay offers delicate yet bright aromatics and flavours of green apple, lemongrass and honey.

title: Barberani Moscato Passito Umberia 2015
Description: Dense moscatel-raisin and bitter orange-marmalade character neatly fills the opulent yet fresh palate, the sweetness very well judged at the long and surprisingly elegant finish.

title: Ashkar Sauvignon Blanc 2019
Description: This elegant and fresh wine is characterized with the flavours of citrus fruit, grassy notes, minerals and hints of sweet sourness on the palate.

title: Thema White 2019
Description: It has a light yellow-green colour. Complex nose beginning with intense aromas of exotic fruits and citron, continuing with compounding hints of white pepper and minerality. Well balanced and richly flavoured in mouth with pleasing freshness. Clean and fruity aftertaste finishing with the characteristic crispness of Assyrtiko, which offers a strong earthy character to this wine. Ideal complement for seafood, fish and salads.

title: Farmhouse California White
Description: Farmhouse Wines are part of the Cline portfolio of wines from Sonoma, California. Made from a blend of noble white varieties including viognier, rousanne, marsanne and riesling. The character of each comes together to deliver wonderful lifted aromas and fig, herbs, honey and melon flavours. Superb with seafood or salads.

title: Skouras Armyra 2019
Description: Made from Chardonnay 95% and Malagouzia 5% and grown at 200 feet altitude. Seventy per cent fermented in stainless steel vats and 30% fermented and aged in new French barriques for 6 months. Short skin contact, full malolactic fermentation in barriques and batonnage. The colour is green-yellow with a few greenish hues. The nose opens with aromas of ripe peach, tropical fruit such as pineapple and hints of lemon. Aromas of butter, bread and caramel follow. The mouth is rich and smooth, with flavours similar to those on the nose and balanced by crisp acidity. The finish is long, complex, and with constant evolution.

title: Ekkum 2019
Description: Clear, lemon colour in appearance, this wine has a pronounced intensity with aromas of flowers and fruit. On the palate dry, medium acidity, pronounced intensity, refreshing, with a long finish.
By:: Casa Vinicola Cuomo Di Cuomo Giovan

title: LUPUS Trebbiano d'Abruzzo DOC 2018
Description: Bright straw yellow wine with a bouquet of tropical fruit, yellow fruits and fine nuances of broom and wild flowers. A penetrating minerality gives the wine a slight pungency with a touch of salty pleasure, vivacity and elegance. Its clean freshness and acidity are mixed with good structure, persistence, and great roundness.

title: Frey-Sohler Riesling Rittersberg Organic 2016
Description: This Riesling has a beautiful robe with gold reflections. It is floral, delicate, well-balanced with a dry minerality and elegant bouquet. It is recognized as one of the finest white varietals.

title: Frey-Sohler Rittersberg 2017
Description: The Frey-Sohler estate has evolved through several generations, all intimately linked with the village and the wines of Alsace. Exceptional wine that comes from 35 year old vines located on dry, sandy soil. Rittersberg terroir is made of granitic and shallow soil that gives the minerality, the acidity and the complexity to some of the greatest wines of the region. This blend of Riesling, Pinot Gris and Gewurztraminer offers a bright yellow colour. Intense aromas of sous-bois, it's a perfectly balanced wine that can be paired with blue cheese or spicy dishes.

title: Di Berardino Trebbiano D'Abruzzo Fonteamonte DOC 2019
Description: Pale yellow colour with small green reflections, at nose it shows intense fruity notes of pear, peach and tropical fruits. It is balanced on the palate, fresh and persistent, with good structure. Perfect for poultry dishes, sushi and fish appetizers.

title: Heraion 2019
Description: Clear, lemon in colour with aromas of fruits and mineral. On the palate, dry-medium acidity, refreshing, with pronounced intensity and a long finish.
By:: Casa Vinicola Cuomo Di Cuomo Giovan

title: Frey-Sohler Gewurztraminer Late Harvest 2017
Description: The Frey-Sohler estate has evolved through several generations, all intimately linked with the village and the wines of Alsace. Intense golden-yellow hue. Aromas of exotic fruits and honey and a full and unctuous palate wrapped within a dazzling sweet-acidic balance!

title: Louis Chenu Bourgogne Blanc 2018
Description: Barrel fermented and from a 2 hectare plot that contains about 10% Pinot Blanc. Some depth on the nose. This is a wine that really expands on the palate, providing lots of savoury flavour as it heads for the finish. Very well balanced, and would be an excellent match with food.

title: Louis Chenu Aligote Organic 2018
Description: Fresh, clean and minerally with beautifully pure ripeness of fruit. Aware of the importance of respecting the vineyard, the Chenu sisters are constantly striving to improve the quality of their wines and the vines are organically tended since 2006.

title: Josh Cellars Pinot Grigio
Description: Josh Cellars is a renowned brand created to celebrate the founder's father. This delicious California Pinot Grigio is a new addition to their range of wines. It's fresh and bright, with flavours of quince, yellow berries backed up by hints of nuts and fresh bread. Sip on its own, or pair with grilled chicken or fish.

title: Domaine Jean Monnier Meursault Vieilles Vignes 2017
Description: A family domaine since 1720. A smoky nose consists of petrol, apple and pear notes that are trimmed in subtle wood nuances. There is exceptionally good richness and impressive power to the mouth coating and medium-bodied flavours that deliver excellent length on the clean, dry and citrus finish.

title: Celler Credo Volaina 2018
Description: La Volaina is the result of an initiative launched by Celler Credo together with Museo de Ciencias Naturales de Granollers with the aim of researching and sharing the importance of butterflies (Volainas). For this, the Parellada variety is grown in fully ecological vineyards in the town of Pla de Manlleu, one of the highest altitude areas of the Penedès region (500 metres above sea level). The harvest is carried out manually and transported in small boxes. La Volaina 2018 is an aromatic white wine with floral and white fruit notes and citrus highlights on the nose. On the palate it is fresh and light with persistent nuances of the fruit.

title: Rolet Cotes du Jura Chardonnay 2015
Description: Very dry and steely, this offers crisp acidity plus butter and wood flavours that bring out citrus as well as white peach fruits.

title: Deiss Riesling 2017
Description: Lemony, mineral and focused white with aromas of citrus, white florals, lemon marmalade, pineapple and white peach. Sweetness on the palate is balanced off by a tart, crisp acidity, finishing with a lingering honeyed sweetness. Clear and elegant.

title: Deiss Huebuhl La Ou Pousse la Haie 2015
Description: From a field blend of different Pinot varieties on heavy and humid clay soils this is a rich, sweet, super ripe and very well-structured wine with a lingering fruit expression, a deep and piquant acidity, and very good tannin structure. Showing off an aromatic bouquet of very ripe and overripe fruits (pears, peaches) along with earthy/mineral flavours, as well as a good portion of botrytis (which is a natural appearance in this terroir that would be declassified if there was no botrytis).

title: Deiss Grand Cru Schoenenbourg 2014
Description: This field blend comes from the singular marls, gypsum, and sandstone of Schoenenbourg, providing a firm structure and ample minerality to support the honeyed, Noble Rot sweetness of the grapes. Powerful with citrus, honey, and light smoke, with an incredible length.

title: Wieninger Chardonnay Select 2017
Description: 95-97 points Falstaff 'This opens with attractive peach fruit highlighted by a touch of nougat. It's complex, focused, with crisp acidity, lots of minerality, and a long finish. Good aging potential.'

title: Eradus Pinot Gris 2019
Description: Made with 100% Pinot Gris from the Brêloft vineyard in the Awatere Valley, Marlborough. Low cropping vines with high leaf to fruit ratios enable the winery to create ripeness, concentration and complexity. This is rich yet refined, opulent yet beautifully defined. The bouquet is filled with ripe pear, mango, citrus and potpourri then the succulent and textured palate flows to a gratifying finish. This wine pairs very well with spicy paella or pan fried scallops.

title: Wieninger Gemis Satz Bisamberg 2018
Description: 93 points Wine Enthusiast 'Hay flowers, a flinty whiff of reduction and fresh apple on the nose promise freshness. The concentrated palate honors this promise with lovely tart but ripe apple as well as ripe lemon framing delightful notes of stone fruit. Stony, earthy notions echo in the background, while tart apple takes center stage. The finish is dry, fresh and very appetizing.'

title: School House Vineyard Chardonnay 2015
Description: Aromas of lemon cream, hazelnuts, stone fruit and minerals. Lively fresh palate frame the creamy, nutty fruit, perfect balance with a long lingering finish.

title: Fragospito White 2019
Description: Made with 50% Malvasia di Candia, 50% Moscato Spinas this bright-yellow colour wine has intense aromas of jasmine, lemon and melon. Dry, aromatic and medium acidity, it pairs well with fresh salads, spinach or cheese pies, shellfish, and white meats. Greek Wine Awards 2015 - Silver medal (2014 vintage)

title: Principino Bianco 2018
Description: Straw yellow in colour with greenish highlights, elegant and delicate in its aromas of fresh fruit, lemon, oranges and grapefruit. The flavours are balanced with a savoury finish and aftertaste. Great with salads and seafoods.

title: Muros Antigos Escolha 2019
Description: Well balanced wine, full of citrus notes of grapefruit and lemon, delicate floral notes. At the same time light and intense, full of freshness and flavour.

title: Wieninger Chardonnay Classic 2018
Description: 91 points Falstaff 'This opens with delicate notes of apple, peach, and a hint of honey blossom. It's medium bodied with fresh acidity, and a lively finish.'

title: Open Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: Open Wines are known for making crowd-pleasing wines. This pinot grigio has aromas and flavours of berries, citrus, fresh fig, banana and light pear. Medium-bodied and fresh on the palate with balanced, clean acidity and a dry finish, this wine is perfect for seafood salad, roasted chicken or as a starter.

title: Vincent Latour Meursault Charmes 1er Cru 2017
Description: Allen Meadows in Burghound describes it as follows: 90-93 & Outstanding... Here too there is good volume and mid-palate density along with a finer mouth feel if not the same power and muscle coming up on the ever-so-mildly sweet finish. This needs to develop more depth to achieve the upper end of my projected range but the structure is such that it should. Drink 2027+

title: Domaine Pinte Chardonnay 2018
Description: Manual vintage, soft pressing, alcoholic fermentation in stainless steel tanks with native yeasts, malolactic fermentation. Soft textured and well-structured wine.
By:: Societe Viticole Du Domaine De La P

title: Domaine Pinte Savagnin 2016
Description: Vinified in steel with only indigenous yeasts and aged in barriques for 3 years. It shines with a golden yellow glass and exudes aromas of ripe tropical fruit and sweet spices. Well structured, with a long finish. Average 50 year old vines, from blue marl soils. Organic, biodynamic farming. Vegan friendly.
By:: Societe Viticole Du Domaine De La P

title: Domaine Pinte Arbois Vin Jaune 2009
Description: A brilliant yellow colour. On the nose, the bouquet is powerful and complex, offering the typical notes of Vin Jaune: walnut, hazelnut, almond, anis, curry and spices. On the palate, the attack is generous and powerful. There is a good freshness and an exceptional length with a beautiful aromatic complexity.
By:: Societe Viticole Du Domaine De La P

title: Vincent Latour Meursault Poruzots 1er Cru 2017
Description: Allen Meadows in Burghound describes it as follows: 91-93 & Outstanding... there is excellent density and power to the broad-shouldered flavors that possess an abundance of sappy dry extract that also serves to buffer the moderately firm acid spine shaping the highly complex bitter lemon-inflected finish where a suggestion of the exotic appears. This is a classic Poruzots of muscle and robust power that should age well. Drink 2025+

title: Aromo Barrel Selection Chardonnay 2019
Description: Expect a zesty, balanced, vibrant Chardonnay, with tropical fruit spanning the flavour spectrum alongside oak and a steely, refined minerality.

title: Bougrier Vouvray Chenin Blanc AOP 2019
Description: Very rich aromas with expressive flavours of pear and honey. Refreshing and enjoyable to drink on any occasion. Enjoy with seafood and lighter fare.

title: Theopetra Estate White 2019
Description: Organic wine made from Greek varieties Malagouzia and Assyrtiko. Bright lemon-green colour, fresh aromas of pineapple, mango, tangerine and peach, sweet aromas of biscuit and hints of fresh mint. Pairs well with fish and seafood, salads, white meat, fruits or simply on its own.

title: Alento Reserva White 2018
Description: Produced entirely with the Portuguese grapes Arinto and Antao Vaz, this wine has a citrine colour and citrine flavours with good minerality, well integrated with some oaky flavours. In the palate show good volume with good minerality and a well integrated acidity, that gives a freshness unusual in a warm climate region. Long aftertaste.

title: Domaine Ratte Naturé 2018
Description: Naturé is an old name for Savagnin. From plots planted on blue and gray marl soil. The grapes are harvested late and by hand. Long and delicate pressing, natural fermentation and bottling without filtration. Very aromatic palette, dominated by fresh cut flowers.

title: Giglio ALTAIR Bianco IGP Biologico 2019
Description: Straw yellow with greenish hues in colour. Intense on the palate with notes of citrus and exotic fruits. Pleasant with good flavour and hints of Sicily.
By:: Cantine Giglio Sas Di Giglio Tommas

title: 2018 BARACIJA MALVAZIJA
Description: Dreamy golden yellow. Aromas of ripe yellow-green fruits, flowers and Mediterranean herbs appear on the nose. The aromas are enhanced on the palate: pears, apples, apricots, elderberries, sage and a slight hint of vanilla and honey emerge. Great minerality and freshness with a medium body.

title: Zimmerlin Grauburgunder Dry 2018
Description: Intensive aroma of melon, yellow pear and hint of roasted nuts. Well balanced acidity. Perfect with white poultry and fish.

title: Calcu Reserva Especial Sauvignon Blanc/Semillon 2019
Description: This white blend has a pale olive green colour. Many layers of citric and tropical aromas such as pink grapefruits and mangoes come together to accomplish an expressive and aromatic wine. On the palate the highlight is the freshness of the Sauvignon Blanc and the complexity of the Semillon. The Sauvignon Blanc delivers freshness and smooth tropical notes, while the Semillon conveys citric hints and structure. Rodrigo Romero, Calcu Winemaker.

title: Encostas do Peso Douro White 2017
Description: 87 pts Wine Enthusiast - Yellow golden colour. A complex aroma, fresh and with an intense aroma of Moscatel variety. Good structure in the mouth and excellent balance between acidity and sweetness. End of mouth long and persistent.

title: Cabeca de Burro Reserva White 2017
Description: White wine of delicate aroma. Enjoy as an aperitif or with seafood, grilled fresh fish, or white meats.

title: ESTREIA Loureiro Grande Escolha 2019
Description: Crafted from a rigorous selection of the most celebrated white grape variety of the region, this wine is characterized by a complex bouquet of white fruits, apricot and citrus with fresh herbal notes. Light, fruity and floral it is truly a great choice!

title: ESTREIA White Vinho Verde DOC 2019
Description: A blend of different grape varieties of the Vinho Verde region. Vibrant citrus and tropical fruit aromas. Aromatic, smooth and harmonious with refreshing sparkling mouthfeel.

title: XOXO PINOT GRIGIO CHARDONNAY
Description: XOXO wines are smooth, easy to enjoy and ideal for any occasion. Pinot Grigio and Chardonnay grapes make a perfect match, with delightful flavours of fragrant fresh pear, nuts, cantaloupe and vanilla. This fresh, stylish white is great on its own, or pairs wonderfully with seafood, salads and sushi.

title: ESTREIA Alvarinho Loureiro 2019
Description: Made with Alvarinho and Loureiro grapes, this wine displays aromas of tropical fruits with citrus notes. Fresh with floral nuances, it dazzles and captivates through its minerality, complexity, balance and persistence.

title: Tavernello Pinot Bianco Famoso
Description: This great-value white from Italy's number one brand is a blend of Pinot Bianco and the rare Famoso grape variety. Its perfumed aromas of biscuit, pear and melon are complemented by floral and nutty tones, followed by a clean and refreshing finish. Great on its own or paired with white-sauced pasta, fish or light seafood.

title: Villa Blanche Sauvignon Blanc 2019
Description: Glimmering with greenish reflections. An expressive, elegant nose with notes of citrus such as lemon and pink grapefruit and exotic fruit such as mango, evolves to embrace a trace of menthol, a hint of elderberry and a slight flintiness that completes this incredible aromatic complexity. The palate is clean and pure, with the fruit of white peach and apricot, floral notes of iris and a subtly toasted finish.

title: Domaine Potinet-Ampeau Meursault 2012
Description: Golden colour, leaning towards bronze as it ages. The bouquet has strong aromas of ripe grapes. Butter, honey, and citrus fruits are also present. On the palate it is rich and fat with a cheerful and appealing taste of hazelnut. Unctuousness and freshness are in silky balance.
By:: Prestige Des Grands Vins De Fr

title: Family Tree 'The Goat Lady' Chardonnay VQA Speck Brothers
Boschendal Appellation Series Elgin Chardonnay 2018
Description: Sourced from a single parcel of Boschendal's grapes, this is a modern, exquisitely crafted Chardonnay that always turns heads. The 2017 vintage was awarded a score of 96 points by Tim Atkin, MW, and you can expect the 2018 to reflect a similar complexity and depth.

title: Pirinoa Road Martinborough Chardonnay 2018
Description: Expect a ripe, complex wine, with a fragrant nose of peach and rockmelon and additional vanilla and hazelnut notes on the palate. Typically, this is crafted to be quite succulent and stylish, with well-integrated oak.

title: Meyer Tribute Series Old Main Road Chardonnay 2018
Description: This is from Meyer's Old Main Road vineyard in Naramata. Each year the Tribute Chardonnay honours a Canadian cultural figure, in 2018 modernist painter Gordon Applebe Smith.The Old Main chardonnay always strikes a riper, richer note and no change here even in the cooler vintage. The nose billows with ripe peach fruit, peat, spice and vanilla from French oak. It has sense of fullness but the 2018 acidity runs neatly through to the end. Excellent length. Score - 93. (David Lawrason, winealign.com, April 24, 2020)

title: Giulia Erminia Marche Bianco IGT 2017
Description: Straw yellow colour with aromas of white flowers, peach and citrus with spice, vanilla and hints of smoke. Balanced flavour, fruity with citrus and spice notes. Good acidity, mineral, sapid with great persistence and harmony. Light filtration before bottling. Serve at 13°C with grilled fish, cheeses, white meat and fried vegetables.

title: Le Verzure Bianco Augusto 2017
Description: Made from Trebbiano and Malvasia grapes, this wine displays aromas of acacia honey, peach, hazelnut, pine and a touch of incense. On the palate, flavours of golden dried fruits.
By:: Az. Ag. Le Verzure Di Villa Antonel

title: NV Cirelli Anfora Riserva Bianco
Description: A blend of 2015, 2016, 2017 Trebbiano d'Abruzzo Anfora. Deep gold in colour with aromas of pine nut, lemon, Thai basil, apricot and honey. Lemon, yellow pear, granny smith, buttery bread and saline minerality.

title: Cirelli Vino Bianco Anfora 2018
Description: The nose is dominated by chamomile flowers, with hints of clay and steely minerality This rare example of a Pecorino allows you to enjoy the grape variety fully. It has a soft creaminess and a precise and well-balanced tannin structure. On the palate, it is beautifully acidic with an easy-going freshness with hints of spice and delicate fruit notes.

title: Chateau Dereszla Furmint Szamorodni Sweet 2013
Description: This wine is made of a mix of regular and shrunken Furmint grape berries; a perennial favourite among Central-Eastern Europeans.

title: Domaine Ratte Chardonnay 2018
Description: Chardonnay grapes from vines on well exposed plots. Manual harvest and slow pressing. Aging in oak barrels for a few months. No filtration at bottling. A subtle nose of pome fruit (pear), that follows through on the palate.

title: Stairs n' Roses Ohrenschwein 2018
Description: Orange in colour with spicy, herbal flavours. Powerful tannin backbone with a mild but present acidity. An ideal wine for barbecues and grilled meats.
By:: Weinhaus Martin Kerpen Inh Celia Ke

title: Grawu Gewurztraminer Roots 2018
Description: A lot of juiciness and length. The grapes grow in a special small vineyard in Termeno. A true idyll that produces incredibly tasty grapes for our CRU. 7 months on the skins, 5 months in stainless steel, then refined in the bottle. No filtration. An aromatic explosion followed by a nice long and balanced body that stays with you for a while.

title: Muscadet de Sevre et Maine Monniere SF1947 2016
Description: From a vineyard dating to 1947, located between the twin villages of Monnieres and Saint-Fiacre, this is a limited-production wine. Ripe apple flavours have developed beautifully, keeping the natural freshness of Muscadet while adding depth and ripeness. Drink this wine now, - R.V. Published 10/1/2019

title: Chateau Dereszla Furmint Late Harvest 2016
Description: This very special late harvest wine is sweet, but not too sweet; made of the same grapes as the Aszu. The perfect after-meal drink.

title: Grawu Sauvignon Blanc 2018
Description: A lot of juicy freshness, ripe acidity and fruit to drink. Cultivated on an airy hill above the Adige valley at about 400 m high on limestone gravel soils in a simple pergola form. Fermented for 5 days with acacia skins. Aged 12 months on its fine yeasts in large acacia barrels. Elegant and subtle aromatics. Easy to drink, with a nice acidity and a citrus flavour that gives a nice backbone all along.

title: Santa Julia Chenin Blanc
Description: Bodegas Santa Julia is one of Argentina's leaders in sustainable winemaking, and Mendoza has become one of the world's top wine regions. This extra dry, aromatic chenin blanc delivers floral, yellow plum and quince aromas and ample tree-fruit flavours. Its lively texture is superb with seafood, chicken or vegetable dishes.

title: San Giorgio Lustro 2019
Description: Pantelleria is a small Mediterranean island that lies at the midway point between Sicily and Tunisia, where Abbazia San Giorgio is using ancient methods to produce incredible wines. Lustro is made from Cataratto that is planted in volcanic soil. The vineyard is left largely untouched until harvest, after which the grapes are spontaneously fermented on the skins for a few days, resulting in a light-medium bodied amber wine that is superlatively refreshing. Intense aromas and flavours of juicy young pineapple, floral and herbal notes.

title: Domaine Camille Braun Sylvaner 2019
Description: Natural wine. Floral on the nose with some notes of evolution. Crisp and fresh.

title: Domaine Camille Braun Riesling 2019
Description: Natural wine. Floral on the nose with substance and complexity. Beautiful freshness.

title: La Tunella Picolit 2017
Description: Sweet with hints of honey, ripe fruit, apricot, peach, and figs. The palate is sweet, warm, velvety, and refined

title: Mileto White 2017
Description: Made from Viura grapes and coming from Rioja, Spain. Aromas of white flowers, citrus and grapefruit. Medium bodied with bright acidity and some creamy notes.

title: Handley Estate Pinot Gris Anderson Valley 2018
Description: Aromas of nectarines, lemon blossoms, and thyme. Mouth-watering flavours of guava and lemon zest interplay with fleshy nectarine, peach pit, bees wax with hints of lemongrass.

title: PKNT Sauvignon Blanc Private Reserv 2019
Description: Yellow wine with greenish reflections. Intense aroma of currant, asparagus and orange blossom. The palate is crispy and balanced.

title: Hill Family Napa Sauvignon Blanc 2019
Description: The 2019 Napa Valley Sauvignon Blanc is largely from the Windy Flats Vineyard in the western foothills of Wooden Valley. This plot brings the complexity and the aromas to this wine. Some of the Watson Vineyard Sauvignon Blanc was also added for its acidity! The lots were whole cluster pressed, and fermented cold to give a crisp and fresh Sauvignon Blanc.

title: Darting Duerkheimer Riesling 2019
Description: As a semi-dry wine, the Riesling is a fresh and tasty table wine for every occasion. Uncomplicated flavours of lemon and ripe apples reflect the wonderful balance of delicate sweetness and crisp acidity

title: Darting Duerkheimer Grauburgunder 2019
Description: A spectrum of aromas ranging from nuts and almonds to more fruity aromas such as pear, pineapple and citrus. This Grauburgunder (Pinot Gris) is low in acidity, yet brings a fresh and lively structure.

title: Bask Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Enjoy a fresh, dry and flavourful sauvignon blanc; low in sugar and brimming with flavour. Bask is energetic and fresh on the palate with long-lasting fragrant herbal and grapefruit taste. Serve with salads, grilled vegetables or your favourite casual cuisine.

title: Barmes Buecher Gewurztraminer Steingrubler 2018
Description: The exquisitely restrained nose has just a touch of honeysuckle perfume?just a hint of that spicy headiness. These aromas also colour the fine, ripe and juicy peach fruit on the palate that vies with fine citrus zestiness for attention. Slight residual sweetness caresses the fruit on the palate but this is very subtly done. The finish is off dry, but utterly balanced. This is a very beautiful, elegant and fresh Gewurztraminer.

title: Barmes Buecher Riesling 2018
Description: A perfumed citrus freshness plays gently on the nose of this wine, offering ripe tangerine and zesty lime. These notions carry over to the slender but concentrated palate where this brightness is carried and buffered by juicy fruit flavours. This is a grown-up, dry Riesling in the most harmonious order.

title: Barmes Buecher Riesling Clos Sand 2018
Description: A perfumed citrus freshness plays gently on the nose of this wine, offering ripe tangerine and zesty lime. These notions carry over to the slender but concentrated palate where this brightness is carried and buffered by juicy fruit flavours. This is a grown-up, dry Riesling in the most harmonious order.

title: Barmes Buecher Gewurztraminer 2018
Description: Golden. Intense aromas, fresh, honey, citric, butter, mango, pineapple. Excellent entrance, silky, smooth, intense, perfectly balanced.

title: Barmes Buecher Riesling Rosenberg 2018
Description: Ripe Williams pear with grapefruit overtones segues into a creamy, almost buttery rounded palate that nonetheless has the tautness and verve of pure citrus zest. There are mellower tones here, too, of wet earth, pear juice and balm. This shows impressive elegance, length and personality.

title: Barmes Buecher Riesling Steingrubler 2016
Description: A wonderfully earthy note appears before lemon and crisp apple on the nose. The palate has something unusually savory, like crushed fennel, smoky cured meat and a creamier backdrop. All along, a bright lemon streak acts as a fault line of freshness. This is complex, unusual but utterly fresh. The finish is dry and wonderfully tangy.

title: Domaine des Coutures Saumur Blanc L'Etincelle 2017
Description: This Chenin from the Loire valley is fermented and aged in oak barrels. The nose is subtle with notes of acacia, apricot and lychee. On the palate, it's very unctuous, round and smooth. Definitely a gastronomy wine that will be enjoyed with seafood (lobster, scallop or fish) or pan fried foie gras.

title: Chateau Lazaridi White 2019
Description: A delightful blend characterized by its brilliant green-yellow colour which combines the aromatic richness and structure of the Sauvignon Blanc with the crisp acidity of the Ugni Blanc and the fruitiness coming from the Muscat of Alexandria. An excellent match for cooked dishes with vegetables, pasta with basil sauce and salads with goat cheese. Serve at 8-12C.

title: Valli Gibbston Vineyard Pinot Gris 2018
Description: Pear, lime zest, almond and mandarin on the nose accentuated by an intense mineral character. A very aromatic Pinot Gris with a distinctive creamy texture from a notably warmer growing season. The palate exudes delicious fruit flavours including many types of pear, white peach and citrus. We see riper citrus appearing in this vintage with a wonderful hint of orange. A richly textured mid palate is complimented by a vibrant vein of acidity that gives the wine great length. Our Pinot Gris is great for food pairings but also delicious on its own and very age worthy.

title: Supernatural Minus 220 Organic 2019
Description: 100% skin-fermented Sauvignon Blanc, farmed organically, vinified naturally and estate grown. Golden yellow colour. A waxy, honeysuckle and lemon, lime and bitters nose with hints of fresh lemon and a creamy ginger spice. Rich and textural in the mouth with flavours of ripe grapefruit and firm stonefruit. Delicate in structure, with just a touch of lemon seed phenolics, yet powerful in flavour.

title: Floralia D'Arcos Loureiro/Alvarinho 2019
Description: Citrine in colour with aromas of tropical fruits and citrus notes. Fresh on the palate with floral nuances, this wine fascinates and captivates by its minerality, complexity, and persistance. Pair with starters, salads, seafood dishes, fish and white meat. Serve between 8° and 10°C.

title: De Fermo Launegild 2018
Description: A Chardonnay that is well balanced but also dynamic with fruits to start then moving on to herbaceous, salty, and balsamic notes. Pear, banana and apricot notes combined with herbs, camomile and straw. Well balanced between freshness and smoothness. A pleasant, satisfying and compelling wine.

title: Floralia D'Arcos Loureiro 2019
Description: Citrine in colour with citrus fruit and floral aromas. Persistent and distinct on the palate. Ideal as an aperitif or accompanying seafood, fish and white meats. Serve between 8° and 10° C.

title: De Fermo Don Carlino 2018
Description: 'Don Carlino' by De Fermo is a pure Pecorino produced in Loreto Aprutino according to Stefano's artisan and biodynamic spirit. An electric, vertical and visceral white, aged in concrete tanks and in barrels, showing off both on the nose and on the palate mineral and salty aromas, combined with sensations of aromatic herbs and ripe fruit pulp. Intense and light straw yellow. Ripe yellow fruits, light spices and aromatic herb sensations.

title: Cellar Credo Aloers 2018
Description: Aloers takes its name from the farmers in the Middle Ages that owned these lands, remaining free from any necessary provisions to the nobles. This means that they were able to make wine because of their freedom in society. 100% produced from Xarel·lo. The grapes are from vines planted in calcareous soils located in the Alt Penedès. Medicinal plants are used to control the pests and the fact that leaving a vegetal covering has helped to regulate better water retention and draining. 92P Robert Parker

title: Collegium Wirtemberg Grauburgunder 2019
Description: Straw yellow in colour. Intense and fruity bouquet which is reminiscent of nuts, vanilla, honey and quince. In the mouth it is velvety, full and well-orchestrated. Enjoy as an aperitif or serve with cured ham and finger foods, fish and white meats.

title: Turtle White 2019
Description: Light yellow-golden colour. Dense and distinguished aroma, reminiscent of dried flowers and herbs (such as dill, thyme, marjoram, lime blossom) and combined with hints of wild flowers honey, nutmeg and gooseberry. This elegant and complex aromatic personality is expressed in the mouth in a quite fat yet not flat way at all. The wine is armed with good acidity and lingers in the mouth. Serve with lamb and veal sweetbreads, mushroom dishes, rich fish with buttery or creamy sauces.
By:: Minos Cretan Wines Sa Miliarakis Br

title: Vidiano Miliarakis 2019
Description: Silver and lemon in colour, this wine has very appealing and attractive aromas of apricot, orange blossoms, honey, and traditional Greek 'yarma' yellow peach. Rich and fulfilling in the mouth, with good grip, long-lasting flavours and a fruity feeling on the forefront. Serve with white meat, poultry, rich-oily fish or fish cooked with creamy white sauces.
By:: Minos Cretan Wines Sa Miliarakis Br

title: Riesling Ried Wehrleiten 2018
Description: Pale straw yet bright. Pronounced primary stone fruit aromas with apricot, white peach and white flowers. On the palate a touch of herbed spice with a lush array of fruit. Finishes with mouth-watering acidity and remarkable structure. Well-balanced and approachable; a pleasure to drink.

title: Val de Mo Branco 2019
Description: Fresh mint highlites lively lemon and yellow plum aromas. Balanced with graceful progression on the palate while stoney minerality adds lift to fleshier orchard fruit flavours.
By:: Soc. Ag. Joao T.M. Barbosa + F

title: Quarticello Incia 2017
Description: This still white wine from 100% Spergola (indigenous grape) presents itself with an intense straw yellow colour. Vegetal notes and secondary mineral aromas displays on the nose while the palate is fresh, full-bodied and structured. Enjoy it with raw fish, oysters and salted sea bass.

title: Montesecondo TIN Anfora Trebbiano 2018
Description: Trebbiano plus a small percentage of co-planted Malvasia. These biodynamically farmed, 25-45-year-old vines lie in the original Montesecondo vineyard. The fruit is hand-harvested, destemmed and put directly into unlined, above-ground, 250-to-350-liter clay amphorae from Spain. Fermentation is spontaneous with native yeasts and no sulfur.

title: Benito Santos Godello 2019
Description: Vivid straw-yellow. Vibrant tangerine and pear aromas are complemented by dusty mineral and floral accents. Sappy and silky in texture, offering lively citrus and orchard fruit flavours and a bitter suggestion of quinine. The taut, mineral-driven finish echoes the citrus fruit and floral notes and shows good tenacity.

title: Graffiti Pinot Grigio
Description: Pelee Island Winery presents a light-bodied and crisp pinot grigio that delivers great taste and excellent value. You will enjoy lifted aromas and flavours of ripe pears and candied fruit, and a clean, soft finish. Sip on its own as an aperitif, or pair this versatile wine with seafood, salads or light pasta dishes.

title: Tryst Fresh and Clean White
Description: From Arterra wines, the Tryst label features approachable, flavourful wines. Aromas and flavours of pear, melon and honey, with a lovely fig and yellow plum notes on the finish. Chill and serve this dry white blend with chicken, fish or grilled vegetables.

title: Estefania Tilenus Godello 2018
Description: White wine made from the Godello variety. Clean yellow colour with golden hues, expressive bouquet with fruity notes: peach skin and citrus fruit. Balanced mouthfeel, fresh and with a full mid-palate.

title: Sogno Manzoni Rosa Bianco Incrocio 1.50 2018
Description: A rare wine indeed, in which its two parent grape varieties, Trebbiano and Aromatic Traminer, find their ethereal expression in an elegant marriage of aromas and flavours that stand out for their pronounced, yet at the same time remarkably graceful, character. To the eye, the wine displays the qualities of each, offering a straw yellow that is both deep and luminous, while Traminer immediately claims the nose, albeit with discretion: a gorgeous florality, particularly of springtime, expands harmoniously, as do the notes of tasty fruit, predominantly yellow peach, lychee, and pineapple. While the Traminer is again obvious on the finish, it is the Trebbiano that infuses the crisp, finely-structured palate. Rosabianco partners beautifully with vegetarian pastas and risottos with pumpkin, shellfish and lighter meats, as well as with a variety of Asian dishes, even those well-spiced, since their flavours contrast with and complement the wine's complex aromatics. Enjoy best at 8-10°C.

title: Incrocio Manzoni Bianco 6.0.13 Coll 2019
Description: Incrocio Manzoni Bianco is a cross between White Riesling Renano and Pinot Blanc. It appears an intense, luminous straw yellow. On the nose, elegant notes of Pinot Blanc are the first to emerge, flanked by impressions of pineapple and spring flowers, while the crisp, tangy minerality of Riesling stands out on the palate. Its graceful aromas and its pronounced delightfulness on the palate make this wine a must-try with warm seafood antipasti; it is a tasty partner to summer soups and is at its finest with shellfish and fish-based main courses. Try it too with various styles of lighter meats, and even more, with full-flavoured meat sauces and braises. Enjoy best at 8-10°C.

title: Cinco Sentidos Torrontes Reserva 2018
Description: It has a brilliant lemon yellow colour with green hues. An expressive aroma, with notes of citric fruits, limes and flowers invites to you to discover it. In the mouth you feel a combination of fruits with a persistent and perfectly balanced taste.

title: Riesling Terra S 2018
Description: Straw yellow in colour. Intense and fruity bouquet which is reminiscent of nuts, vanilla, honey and quince. In the mouth it is velvety, full and well-orchestrated. Enjoy as an aperitif or serve with cured ham and finger foods, fish and white meats.

title: Inconnu Lalalu Chardonnay Organic 2018
Description: Vine age between 20-30 years, farmed organically, alluvial clay loam soils, deficit irrigated in drought years, but dry farmed otherwise, native ferment in stainless, aged in stainless on the lees (and a few neutral barrels).

title: Hobo Folk Machine White Light 2019
Description: The 2019 is 43% Tocai Friulano from Mendocino, 26% Riesling from Arroyo Seco, 9% Verdelho from Suisun Valley, 21% Sauvignon Blanc from Potter Valley, and 1% Gewurztraminer from Monterey. White Light continues to be fun, easy drinking, summery. A fresh wine with great acid and some mineral notes of salty, briny character that the Tocai Friulano has, but tone it down with the fruit and aromatics of Riesling and Verdelho.

title: Inconnu Clarksburg Chenin Blanc Organic 2018
Description: About 300 yards as the crow flies from the Sacramento River, silty clay loam soils, farmed organically, deficit irrigated in drought years, but dry farmed otherwise, native ferment in stainless, aged in neutral barrels on the lees for one year (lees aging makes the wine take a little longer to come around in bottle, but if you taste it now, it will all make sense).

title: Jackson-Triggs PS Light Pinot Grigio
Description: Lower-alcohol wines are here! From Canada's most-awarded winery, this light pinot grigio is lower in alcohol, and bursting with aromas of nuts, melon and fresh fig, with soft mushroom and fresh bread notes. Serve well-chilled with fresh pasta or grilled seafood.

title: Bolleggio Vino Frizzante Rosato 2018
Description: Bolleggio is an ancestral wine. The nose reveals a pleasant freshness and balsamicity, with strong mineral hints typical of the Bertinoro terroir. In the mouth it has a nice verticality with a simple but at the same time enveloping and balanced bubble.
By:: Tenuta La Viola Di Serra Lidia

title: Michelet Chablis Grand Cru Valmur 2018
Description: Generously perfumed with honey, dried fruits, rose and litchi. Richly structured on the palate, the finish is powerfully textured with earthy mineral complexity. A perfect pairing with fine fish in cream sauce or white meat stuffed with mushrooms. Can be aged for another 15 years.

title: Michelet Chablis 1er Cru Mont de Milieu 2017
Description: Pale golden colour; Aromas of almonds and apricots, with an ethereal touch of lemon; Straightforward at first due to its youth, then grapefruit aromas are revealed. A lovely minerality emerges with gunflint notes. Above all a wine for laying down, this premier cru Chablis is worth allowing the time to reveal itself fully.

title: Michelet Magnum Chablis 2008
Description: Old Chablis wine will present wonderful buttery aromas, revealing a great minerality with a very refreshing finish.

title: Domaine Moingeon Saint Aubin 1er Cru 2018
Description: Colour of sunshine, with golden highlights; Aromas of white flowers, green almond and orange blossom; Firm with sharp start but becomes fleshier and fuller with time.
By:: Prestige Des Grands Vins De Fr

title: Domaine Tatraux Givry Blanc 2018
Description: This 1er cru has a limpid pale gold colour. The mouth is delicate, with a balance between mellowness and acidity which guarantees its keeping qualities as well as giving it good length. Great pairing with fish in light sauces, freshwater pike cooked with butter and white meats.
By:: Prestige Des Grands Vins De Fr

title: Maison Corcia Rully Blanc 2018
Description: Appellation of the Côte Chalonnaise, Rully is well known for producing good value wines. This wine is gold flecked with green. It is redolent with superb aromas of hedgerow flowers (acacia, may, honeysuckle, and a very delicate elderflower) as well as violet, lemon, white peach or flint. Time brings out honey, quince, and dried fruits. Indeed, this wine is full of fruit, which on the palate is lively and well-rounded, meaty and long.
By:: Prestige Des Grands Vins De Fr

title: Domaine Georges Vernay La Grange aux Serpents Condrieu 2018
Description: La Grange aux Serpents Condrieu is a typical wine high on fruit, with peach flavour. An elegant, charming wine. Our highly balanced Condrieu shows lots of freshness and flavours.
By:: Prestige Des Grands Vins De Fr

title: Fari Societa Agricola Semplice Friulano 2018
Description: Straw yellow colour. To the nose fruity, floral and mineral. In the mouth it is fresh and full-bodied. It has hints of typical bitter almond, sage, pear and apple.

title: Fari Societa Agricola Semplice Ribolla Gialla 2019
Description: To the nose fruity, floral and mineral while in the mouth it has a lovely freshness. It has hints of citrus, acacia, white rose and hay.

title: Tarrica Pinot Gris 2019
Description: To enhance even the most delicate fruit tones and ensure freshness and lift, this Pinot Gris underwent a slow ferment in 100% stainless steel. The result is a wine that delivers lip-smacking crispness, with touches of tropical kiwi atop the pear, apple and mineral notes. Plush and refreshing, it's ideal for sipping or for enjoying with shellfish or light cheeses.

title: Citation Oregon Chardonnay 2015
Description: This exceptional Chardonnay is packed with aromas of citrus, butterscotch, spun sugar, vanilla bean and ripe apples. It's rich and mouth-filling with a touch of toasty oak followed by a hint of baking spices on the lingering finish.

title: Attems Cicinis 2017
Description: A dense and beautiful sauvignon with lime, kiwi and lemon character, as well as soil and stone. Full body. Flavorful and long. Excellent energy and brightness at the end. Phenolic tension too. Best ever? Drink now. Score - 94. (jamessuckling.com, July 22, 2020)

title: Vidal Reserve Chardonnay 2018
Description: Beautiful fragrant citrus, stone fruit and roasted nuts combine on a finely styled, textured, and balanced palate showing good complexity. Serve with fish, shellfish and poultry.

title: Château Doisy-Védrines 2017
Description: The 2017 Doisy-Vedrines gives up pretty lime cordial and lemon pie notes with a touch of mandarin peel and hints of chalk dust and ginger ale. The palate features super intense citrus fruit with great purity and depth, matched by wonderful freshness and a long finish. Score - 92-94. (Lisa Perrotti-Brown, MW, robertparker.com)

title: Aile d'Argent 2017
Description: One-third of the crop for this wine was lost to frost. A blend of 53% Sauvignon Blanc, 46% Sémillon and 1% Muscadelle, the 2017 Aile d'Argent has lovely white peaches, lemon curd and beeswax notes with hints of orange peel, grapefruit and a touch of sage. The palate is light to medium-bodied and bursting with exuberant stone fruit and citrus flavors, with a racy line and a long, peachy finish. Score - 91-93. (Lisa Perrotti-Brown, MW, robertparker.com)

title: Château Malartic-Lagravière Blanc 2017
Description: The 2017 Malartic-Lagravière Blanc has a clean, precise and mineral-driven bouquet with touches of smoke and flint hovering like errant school-kids in the background. The palate is very well balanced and full of energy. The acidity neatly counterbalances with saline apply fruit with great persistence on the finish, and touches of lemongrass that linger on the aftertaste. This is one of the best Pessac-Léognan whites that you will find in this vintage. Score - 92-94. (Neal Martin, vinous.com)

title: Château Rabaud-Promis 2017
Description: The 2017 Rabaud-Promis opens with pronounced lime cordial and lemon tart notes with hints of pineapple and candied peel. The mouth gives pristine, super pure flavors with a wicked acid backbone and great length. Score - 92-94. (Lisa Perrotti-Brown, MW, robertparker.com)

title: Chateau de Chantegrive Cuvée Caroline Blanc 2017
Description: A very intense character already of honeysuckle, papaya and mangoes. Medium to full body, loads of fleshy stone fruit, structured polyphenolics, tangy acidity and a long finish. Score - 93-94. (James Suckling, jamessuckling.com)

title: Château Latour-Martillac Blanc 2017
Description: 92-94. Barrel Sample. This is a classic wine, lightly herbal, textured, crisp in acidity and with an undertow of ripe yellow fruits. It will age well. Drink from 2023. Score - 93. (Roger Voss, Wine Enthusiast)

title: Carmel Selected Emerald Riesling 2019
Description: An innovative blend of two complementing grapes produces a perfumed wine full of tropical fruits. Spicy citrus flavours are complemented by a hint of grapefruit and litchi followed by a smooth finish

title: Château Haut-Brion Blanc 2017
Description: Composed of 56.2% Sauvignon Blanc and 43.8% Sémillon, the 2017 Blanc from Haut-Brion is a little more reticent on the nose than the La Mission Haut-Brion Blanc, offering up subtle pink grapefruit, green mango and ripe pears scents with an undercurrent of baking bread, ginger and allspice plus a waft of lemon peel. The palate is medium-bodied with wonderfully generous tropical and citrus flavors accented by loads of spices, finishing long and savory. Score - 97-100. (Lisa Perrotti-Brown, MW, robertparker.com)

title: Colio Cellar Door Series Sauvignon Blanc
Description: The Cellar Door Series is crafted in an approachable style. This lively sauvignon blanc is packed with citrus, tropical fruit and passion fruit notes. It is aromatic and flavourful with a refreshingly crisp finish. Serve with baked salmon over rice and grilled asparagus or grilled chicken and scalloped potatoes.

title: Casa Silva Cool Coast Sauvignon Blanc 2020
Description: Casa Silva's vineyards in Paredones are just six kilometers from the sea, in the coastal-most zone of the Colchagua Valley. There, on granitic-clay soils and with the strong presence of Pacific breezes, sauvignon seems to feel at ease. This example is juicy in acidity and rich in ripe white fruits, but it's also refreshed by herbal tones that give it complexity and liveliness. The texture on the palate is smooth, and the finish tastes of herbs. Score - 93. (Patricio Tapia, guiadescorchados.cl, 2021)

title: Weine Michel Gruner Silvaner Trocken 2019
Description: Fresh and crisp, light and thoroughly enjoyable with light snacks, cheese and salads.

title: Weine Michel Weissburgunder Off Dry 2019
Description: Balanced sweetness with a creamy fruity taste. Great with light pasta, seafood and chicken. Serve chilled.

title: Weine Michel Grauer Burgunder Trocken 2019
Description: Intense aromas supported with fine minerality. Best with white meats, grilled fish, or salads.

title: Conceito White 2018
Description: 93 pts Robert Parker - Just a beautiful white wine, reminiscent of top quality white Bordeaux. Lovely fresh aromatic nose of grapefruit and lemon with hints of herbs and vanilla. The palate is fresh and bright with notes of herb and grapefruit, nice presence and some lemony acidity. Lovely complexity here.

title: Contraste White 2018
Description: 90 pts Wine Advocate - The 2018 Contraste Branco is a blend of traditional white grapes, like Rabigato, Códega, Códega do Larinho and Arinto, from mostly 20-year-old vines at 600 meters, all co-fermented (wild ferment) in a 70/30 mixture of stainless steel and new French oak for eight months. It comes in at 13% alcohol. After a fairly fat 2017, this is a fresher and greener wine, closer to the Conceito style. That doesn't mean the 2017 was bad, but this is more typical, perhaps. It is a bit green this year, aromatic and herbaceous

title: Domaine Simonis Riesling Biodynamic 2018
Description: Domaine Simonis is one of the biodynamic pioneers in Alsace, eliminating chemicals over 20 years ago. The family has been cultivating vines in Ammerschwihr since the 17th century. Classic Riesling, expressive with aromas of citrus. Elegant and fresh palate with a nice minerality. Will be enjoyed with seafood, poultry, white meat and goat cheese!

title: Domaine Simonis Grand Cru Kaefferkopf 2018
Description: Domaine Simonis is one of the biodynamic pioneers in Alsace, eliminating chemicals over 20 years ago. The family has been cultivating vines in Ammerschwihr since the 17th century. Grand Cru Kaefferkopf produces one of the best wines of the region. Aromatic nose of exotic fruits including pineapple and mandarin. Ample and delicate mouth with high acidity and a nice lasting taste. Pairs wonderfully with seafood, poultry and goat cheese.

title: Domaine Simonis Grand Cru Mackrain 2018
Description: Domaine Simonis is one of the biodynamic pioneers in Alsace, eliminating chemicals over 20 years ago. The family has been cultivating vines in Ammerschwihr since the 17th century. This Grand Cru Marckrain comes from 2 plots of Gewürztraminer planted on marno-limestone soil with a South-Eastern exposition. It gives a powerful wine with intense nose of mango and pineapple. Full bodied and complex, the palate is rich with hints of spices. A wine to be enjoyed now or in a few years.

title: Domaine Simonis Chaud Lapin Biodynamic 2017
Description: Blend of Auxerrois, Pinto Gris, Riesling, Muscat and Gewurztraminer that comes from plot called 'Hasengrab', which means the rabbit's nest in Alsatian. These 45 to 60 year old vines are protected with herbals teas instead of chemicals. The marriage of these 5 grape varieties gives a fresh, festive and easy drinking wine. A nose of exotic fruits; peach, apricot and mango. A rich and ripe taste, it's best paired with Asian food.

title: Tramier Bourgogne Chardonnay 2018
Description: 100% Chardonnay with a beautiful green and gold colour. This fresh wine pairs well with shellfish, grilled fishes and medium-strong cheeses. Serve at 12-14°C.

title: Vegalfaro Caprasia White 2019
Description: A pale straw lemon colour, clear and brilliant. A pronounced aromatic intensity on the nose of tropical fruit, white flowers and subtle smoke and toast from barrel aging that is well integrated. Smooth of medium body with richness of the oak adding weight and volume on the palate. Juicy ripe pineapple and tropical peach flavours, refreshing acidity and a persistent fruity finish.

title: Rennersistas Waiting for Tom Weiss 2018
Description: A blend of Chardonnay, Pinot Blanc and Welschriesling. Aged in old oak, this white shows beautiful yellow starfruit, ripe nectarine, and sunflower aromas. On the palate it is acid driven with silky texture and great fruit length.

title: Bombi Chardonnay 2019
Description: Intense and bright gold in colour with aromas of tropical fruit, citric and mineral notes on the side. Fresh and balanced on the palate with nice acidity and complexity that provides elegance.

title: Santa Carolina Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Sauvignon blanc continues to grow in popularity - its crisp flavours and versatility at the table have made it Ontario's go-to wine for entertaining. Lightly yeasty, grapefruit and savory aromas followed by those of green apples and herbs; ripe citrus flavours. Serve with grilled fish, seafood pasta or vegetarian dishes.

title: Indelevel White IGP Alentejo 2019
Description: Citrus colour, stone fruit aromas (plum and apricot) with minerality hints. Fresh in the mouthfeel with a balanced acidity.

title: Domaine Fournier Verdigny La Chadouilonne 2016
Description: The Verdigny cuvee village reveals the complexity of the Caillottes terroirs. Thanks to its roundness and its ripe aromatic intensity, a palate full of candied citrus supported by a luscious textured minerality. The generous style and elegance of this cuvee is a real treat. Awards: 90 Points Wine Enthusiast / 91 points Wine Spectator

title: Le Vieux Pin-Ava 2018
Description: Today, Ava 2018 is at its best with a long decant or better yet tucked away for at least a couple of years of slumber time in the cellar. There is an erect spine holding this textural wine in balance. Red Haven peaches, yellow plums are mingling with white aromatic flowers, herbal tea, and light brioche notes. The restrained amount of new oak used (5%) in the upbringing of this wine is very well integrated already and barely shows itself more than a thin frame around a beautiful work of art. After decanting, slight acacia honey drizzled notes on toasted brioche bun come to the foreground. Anticipate beautiful toasted cereal notes to come forward about half a dozen years post vintage.

title: Vivi Vermentino IGT Toscana 2019
Description: James Suckling: 91 points 2018 NOSE & PALATE This wine has a very intense scent of fresh floral notes with a little mineral hint. The taste is fresh, full, and pleasant. The balanced acidity gives freshness with persistence flavours and makes it a perfect aperitif on a summer evening. Ideal service temperature is 8 - 10 °C. FOOD PAIRINGS Ideal to drink by itself, or paired with vegetables, seafood, salads and soft cheeses.

title: Jon Blanc Fleur Nature Organic 2018
Description: Domaine Jonc Blanc is organic and biodynamic (Demeter) certified. Their wines are made as natural as possible (wild ferment, low intervention in the vineyard, no fining, no filtration, no sulphites added). Cuvée 'Fleur' is a blend of Sauvignon Blanc, Sauvignon Gris and Sémillon. Nose of white flowers, pear and grapefruit. Will pair well with white meat and cheese.

title: Alta Alella Cau D'en Genis 2019
Description: The saline expression of a singular vineyard overlooking the Mediterranean Sea. Selection from the estate's oldest parcel, its ageing on lees gives to the wine a strong expression of the vintage. The quintessence of what a premium Pansa Blanca wine should be: fresh attack of white fruit notes, hints of fennel, salty, mineral and silky with a long and elegant aftertaste.

title: Domaine Fournier Pouilly Fume Tracy Sur Loire 2016
Description: Colour is pale gold with gold highlights. The nose captivates you by its complex mangoes and blackcurrant bud aromas. The palate is opulent and luscious. Serve with white creamed meats and grilled fish and scallops. Awards Wine Enthusiast/ Spectator 89 points.

title: Domain Modat Petit Modat'mour Blanc Organic 2019
Description: Domaine Modat is located in Roussillon (Agly valley). Certified organic with biodynamic practices, the wines are a sincere reflection of the land where they are produced. Le petit modat'mour blanc is a blend of Muscat, Roussane and white Grenache. Full of flavour with notes of tropical fruits and white spices. This wine pairs well with a creamy cheese or a ceviche.

title: Le Vieux Pin-Petit Blanc 2019
Description: A unique blend of Sauvignon Blanc, Muscat and Pinot Gris, Marsanne and Roussanne. Green citrus fruit, gooseberries, currants and touch of tropical fruits greet you on the nose. While orchard fruits are tasted on the mid palate, the finish and core of this wine is dominated by citrus and gooseberry.

title: Domaine Fournier Terres Blanches 2016
Description: Tense, mineral precise, our Terres Blanches is a treat for all Sauvignon Blanc lovers! The nose reveals persistent boxwood and blackcurrant bud aromas. The palate is a masterpiece of concentration and length. Pair with more complex dishes such as creamed poultry and grilled prawns. Awards: 91 Points Decanter

title: Château Moncontour Demi-Sec Vouvray 2019
Description: In this wine the balance between lemon fruits and light sweetness is impeccable. Fruity with baked apple flavors, it's lightly textured, perfumed and worth aging. Drink from 2021. Editors' Choice.  Score - 90. (Roger Voss, Wine Enthusiast, July 1, 2020)

title: Domaine Germain Beaune 1er cru Blanc 2018
Description: Great value 1er cru from Côte de Beaune! Gold colour with hints of green. Complex with notes of apple, peach, vanilla and pepper, the nose is intense and fruity. In the mouth, it's a powerful white wine. Delicate notes of honey and fresh, great pairing with veal in a mushroom sauce, lobster or asparagus.

title: Domaine Germain Auxey-Duresses Blanc 2018
Description: Manually harvested. Aged in oak barrels for 10 months (10% new barrels) A neighbour of Meursault, we find in this white wine the weight and generosity of the Côte de Beaune great white wines. Delicate and floral bouquet, subtlety in the mouth, balance, integrated wood and beautiful acidity.

title: Smallfry Isolar 2020
Description: Whole bunch basket pressed and straight to barrel for fermentation and maturation on gross lees. Picked later for riper spectrum flavours it is the Roussane that gives the freshness and acidity while the Riesling plays a juicier, fruitier role. Yellow/gold colour, unfined or filtered. Honeysuckle, tropical fruit, grapefruit pith, medicinal eucalypt lollies, lots going on. Fresh and juicy up front leading to quite a broad midpalate with the furniture showing up on the back to add length.
By:: W.G Ahrens + S.L Hilder Trading As

title: Casot d'en Gora Organic 2017
Description: A complex, rich and well-structured blend of organically grown Grenache Blanc, Grenache Gris and Macabeu from the dry, warm, wind-swept vineyards of Roussillon. Fermented and aged in large, Austrian barrels, to shows aromas ranging from zesty citrus and tree fruit to ripe melon and pineapple. The palate is full and flavourful adding a smokey, savoury minerality and a hint of vanilla.

title: Entre Colinas White 2019
Description: It is the result of the selection of a batch of grapes that produce this harmonious, light, fresh, aromatic and mineral wine, balanced green fruit. It was pressed with whole grapes and the must fermented at 14º C.

title: Domain CLO Saumur Blanc
Description: Located in the Loire valley (north of Puy-Notre-Dame), Domaine CLO is organic certified. Cyril Leau took over his father's vineyard in 2015 to make wines with character. This 100% Chenin blanc has a bright yellow color. Expressive nose with notes of citrus (lime, grapefruit) and white fruits (pear, peach). Subtle mouth, fresh and balance with notes of apple and a very nice length. Elegant wine to be paired with fish or fruit salad.

title: Domaine Germain Monthélie Blanc 2019
Description: Manually harvested. Aged in oak barrels for 10 months (10% new barrels) with a batonnage every 15 days until fermented. Fine and fruity with aromas of dried fruits (apricot, peach). Enjoy with shellfish or fish. 3 - 5 years aging.

title: Michael David Chardonnay 2019
Description: The grapes for this wine are hand-picked and used to make three Chardonnays, which are then blended together to create the final wine. The portions fermented and aged in stainless steel bring lift, freshness and crisp fruit, while those elements fermented and aged in French oak and on the lees impart complexity, depth and a round, soft texture. Pair with grilled chicken or pork chops.

title: Grand'Arte Chardonnay 2018
Description: Aromatic, fruity, rich, round, with a soft acidity which gives an excellent tasty, fresh wine. Very pleasant with a long elegant and persistent end.

title: Grand'Arte Alvarinho 2019
Description: A fruited wine of real finesse with an intense aroma of ripe orchard fruits. The body is full with a delicious, creamy character and this is countered by a fresh, citrus quality on a long finish.

title: Alfaciafacinha White IGP LX 2019
Description: Citrus coloured wine, with fruity and fresh aromas. Good acidity and well-balanced in the mouth, with a very pleasant aftertaste.

title: Recaredo Miranius 2018
Description: Miranius' is named after a local fox that invades the vineyards to gorge on the grapes. The grapes come from very low yielding vines and is unoaked. Lively and refreshing, its naturally vibrant acidity makes this a great food wine. A clear pale gold in the glass. Complex scents of lime, pear and orange flower. On the palate, bright and refreshing with a vibrant acidity leading to a lengthy finish. 91P Robert Parker, 90P Penin

title: Lykos Malagousia PGI Evia 2019
Description: Bright golden-green colour with intensely complex aromas of citrus, pineapple, apricot and peach. Cool with pleasant acidity, exceptionally balanced palate and long aftertaste.

title: Cascina Castlet ATAJ Chardonnay 2019
Description: Beautiful straw-yellow colour with slight, greenish reflections. A wide-ranging, intense, fruity and flowery bouquet, highly pleasing and very long-lasting. A dry taste, well structured and pleasantly acidulous; delicate and elegant, it is enhanced by a long aromatic persistence. Excellent as an aperitif, ideal with hors d'oeuvres and it goes nicely with first courses containing light sauces and with second courses of fish and shellfish. Best served at a temperature of 10-12°C in a long-stemmed, tulip-shaped, flared-rim glass.

title: Pop Art White PGI Evia 2019
Description: Lykos Pop Art White is a beautiful white wine gem from vineyards in northern and southern Evia. Lemon green in colour with a bouquet of flowers and citrus fruits, and a cool, palate-pleasing acidity. Well balanced in fruit and acidity to enjoy over the next 4-5 years, the wine is long and pleasing on the finish.

title: Pères de Eglise Calice de St. Pierre Châteauneuf Blanc 2019
Description: Jeb Dunnuck 90 'The 2019 Châteauneuf Du Pape Le Calice De Saint Pierre Blanc offers lots of honeyed citrus, crushed stone, a touch of celery seed, and white flower-like aromas and flavors. These all carry to a medium to full-bodied, fresh, lively white with a solid spine of acidity, terrific focus on the palate, and a crisp, clean finish. It's going to drink nicely for 7-8 years.'

title: Giannikos Windmill Malagouzia PGI 2019
Description: Light green-yellow colour, intensively aromatic with clear scents of apricot, peach, pear and a natural hint of lemon peel. Well balanced with a fresh acidity.

title: Giannikos At Sea Roditis PGI P2019
Description: Pale lemon tint, intensely aromatic with fresh hints of grapefruit and melon, combined with a crisp acidity.

title: Alta Alella Tallarol 2019
Description: A juicy, aromatic and fresh white wine. Aromas of white fruit, citrus and notes of fennel on the nose. In the mouth, it is unctuous, balanced and long.

title: Millton Crazy by Nature Sirius White
Description: Sirius White is a blend of Chardonnay, Viognier, Marsanne and Vermentino. This wine has a warm ripe apricot character with lifted acidity, scented white peach and honeysuckle and finishing with a soft, fat warm mouth-filling character of immediate appeal. A fruit forward expressive un-oaked style.

title: Drius Pinot Bianco Isonzo del Friuli 2018
Description: Fascinating greenish yellow, crystalline and consistent. The first nose, stony and oxidized notes, the minerality and the wood mark the step with their presence. Elder flowers, pineapple, lime, white grapefruit, then the wine has a phase stall, a stand-by of the aromas, and reopens with gravely notes, walnut husk. An interesting wine showing softness and flavour on the palate with a final note of white licorice.

title: Weingut Weinrieder Ried Bockgarten Riesling 2018
Description: Concentrated on the nose and on the palate, beautiful sweetness blended with a fresh acidity - a great Riesling. Displays stone fruit, delicate lime, and hints of ripe pear. On the palate there are flavours of juicy white peach and subtle hints of apricot. This wine is well balanced by a refined structure, very fresh, crisp and plush acidity.

title: Weingut Weinrieder Riesling Reserve 2017
Description: Riesling pure! The Reserve is a selection of top Riesling Grapes. Classy, elegant wine with high potential. Elegant, dense, brilliant structure, wonderful. Perfect with exotic and Asian cuisine.

title: Weingut Weinrieder Gruner Veltliner Old Vines
Description: Vegetal and a trace of nutty aromas of ripe yellow fruits with delicate oily notes, some minerality, rhubarb and a hint of bright tobacco. Sweet and creamy, very ripe fruit on the palate, delicate vegetal and nutty spiciness, very fine acidity, persistent, has full-bodied and polished, crumbly tannin, candied nutty traces, a little warm finish with light sweetness and spice.

title: Weingut Weinrieder Birthal Weissburgunder 2017
Description: Elegant wine with power and harmony notes of yellow fruits, light pineapple and hint of lemon. Very powerful yet supple, with a very full fruit sweetness. It is dominated by peach and apricot notes with mild hints of pineapple. Long finish, absolutely full-bodied.

title: Weingut Weinrieder Gruner Veltliner Reserve Old Vines 2016
Description: Complex nose with vegetal and slightly earthy aromas, pome fruit, a hint of citrus and a little pepper. Mature, quiet, creamy fruit on the palate, much vegetal and earthy notes again, moderate acidity, good persistence, nutty, mineral and delicate peppery tones, solid construction, a hint of caramel and tobacco.

title: Richter Riesling Classic 2019
Description: 'The 2019 Riesling Classic comes from 40 - 50-year-old vines in the villages of Veldenz and Burgen (Middle Mosel9, and was fermented down to almost dry levels of residual sugar (10 g/l). It offers a tantalizing nose made of floral elements, white peach, freshly cut apple, pear and smoke. The wine is playful and delightful driven by fruits and minerals on the palate and leaves a gorgeous sense of fresh herbs in the long and refined finish. This dry tasting wine offers textbook Mosel pleasure. (Now - 2027)' (MFW, June 2020) '

title: Siegrist Pinot Blanc VDP Gutswein 2019
Description: First a decent gentle perfume then a surprising opening in mouth with green apple, pear and honey melon, juicy and powerful, lively and complex with a refreshing acidity and lightly mineral finish. Food recommendation fish, seafood, white meat, for e.g. Blanquette de veaux (veal ragout) , lotte de mer (monkfish) in lemon sauce or rabbit in a Riesling cream.

title: Siegrist Leinsweiler Riesling Eigensinn VDP Ortswein 2019
Description: A masterpiece of Riesling which demonstrates perfectly the precious mussle limestone terroir. A bouquet of herbs and yellow stone fruit combined with a straight forward minerality. Very complex and elegant. The expressive minerality of the terroir completes this Riesling giving an incredible deepness and finesse. Pair with dishes of fish and white meat, for e.g. Blanquette de veaux (veal ragout) , lotte de mer (monkfish) in lemon sauce or rabbit in a Riesling cream.

title: Zulal Voskehat 2019
Description: Translating as 'golden berry' Voskehat is a late-ripening thick-skinned ancient grape variety. It is widespread in Aragatsotn, Armavir and Vayots Dzor. This wine has a vibrant light gold colour and rich floral aromas with notes of tropical and stone fruit on the palate. Finish is crisp and elegant.

title: Quinta dos Mattos Reserva 2019
Description: Intense with notes of white fruits, new wood and vanilla. Concentrated in the mouth, fresh and fruity; balanced and a long finish.

title: Oshin White 2017
Description: Gold in the glass, this barrel-fermented Voskehat has prominent aromas of ripe stone fruits, summer blossom and hints of grapefruit complemented by sweet toast. The palate is creamy balancing the notes of lemon, peach, melon and roasted almonds lingering on the tongue for a while after the sip.

title: Domaine Jacques Prieur Meursault Clos de Mazeray Monopole 2017
Description: THE FINE WINE REVIEW 90-92: ~33%% vinified and aged in foudre. Butter and mineral nose. Good layering in mouth, good acidity and crispness. Length is here. Lime and grapefruit. Still rather tight. Excellent focus and purity, plus a touch of rusticity that is typical of Clos de Mazeray.

title: Smallfry BV Riesling 2018
Description: Medium bodied white wine. Bright with pale yellow tints in colour, on the nose, aromas of lime and honey with notes of mineral. Light tannins. High acidity. Green and flinty white wine in style. On the palate, fresh, youthful, juicy, cool, approachable, crisp and dry with hint of citrus and lemon sherbet. It has a lingering finish.
By:: W.G Ahrens + S.L Hilder Trading As

title: Domaine Jacques Prieur Beaune 1er Champs-Pimont Blanc 2017
Description: THE FINE WINE REVIEW 91-94: 50% vinified and aged in large foudres. Apple-calvados nose - very attractive.
