Gentler on the palate with not such an imposing structure;medium-light on the tongue, but good structure here. Another style of Beaune, one with more finesse than the Grèves, but still with minerality and structure. Sensuality on the palate.

title: Vivi Vermentino Toscana IGT 2019
Description: James Suckling: 91 points 2018 'This wine has a very intense scent of fresh floral notes with a little mineral hint. The taste is fresh, full, and pleasant. The balanced acidity gives freshness with persistence flavours and makes it a perfect aperitif on a summer evening. Ideal service temperature is 8 - 10 °C. Ideal to drink by itself, or paired with vegetables, seafood, salads and soft cheeses.'

title: Fita Preta Branco de Talha 2018
Description: 90 points Wine Advocate 'The 2018 Branco de Talha was aged in old 1,000-liter clay amphorae...this wine is a field blend, basically the regular Branco with different vinification, but the blend has undergone some changes. As reported last August, the winery has acquired a new vineyard (with vines from 28 to 49 years old), which now constitutes half of the blend (the other half is 27 to 37 years old).'

title: Fazio U Marusu Grillo DOC Sicilia 2018
Description: Pale gold with green hints in colour with aromas of lemon, wildflowers, sea salt minerals and nuts. Tropical fruit flavours are glossed by bright lemon and savoury herbaceous elements. Zippy acidity and traces of nuts comprise the dry, saline mineral finish.

title: Riverview Cellars Sauvignon Blanc 2019
Description: A crisp, fresh Niagara Sauvignon Blanc with aromas of lime citrus and melon. Pair with seafood. Drink: 2020-2022. Best Value Wine. Score - 90. (nataliemaclean.com, June 9, 2020)

title: Running Stream Chardonnay Robertson 2019
Description: Light straw colour in the glass. An elegant and complex unwooded Chardonnay with pineapple and quince aromas on the nose underlined by fine citrus flavours and subtle creaminess. Medium bodied on the palate with good depth of flavour and a crisp, satisfying aftertaste. Already perfectly enjoyable but will gain further complexity with another 2 -5 years of bottle aging.
By:: Black Falls Brewing Company Pty Ltd

title: Joy Crisp White Chenin Blanc 2020
Description: Silvery emerald straw colour. Delicate aromas of tropical fruit, flamed lemon zest, and sesame with a bright, dry medium body and a relaxed lemon bar, yellow flowers, and sesame oil finish. A savoury and distinct South African Chenin for spicing up a weekday dinner party.
By:: Black Falls Brewing Company Pty Ltd

title: 9 Fields Chardonnay Robertson 2019
Description: Golden straw colour. Fruity aromas and flavours of lime, orange creamsicle, and mango lassi with a velvety, crisp, dry-yet-fruity light-to-medium body and a warming, relaxed finish with a suggestion of oak flavour. A food-friendly Chardonnay in an understated style.
By:: Black Falls Brewing Company Pty Ltd

title: Antica Irpinia Falanghina DOC 2019
Description: The first impact is fresh. Then, an explosion of white flowers. Saltiness and richness, a duet of both crunchy and soft sensations, with a long and enchanting finish of wisteria.

title: Le Grand Mare Touranine Sauvignon Blanc 2019
Description: A bright gold colour with green tints. The nose is aromatic with characteristic citrus, black currant leaf and floral scents. In the mouth, there is ripe gooseberry and herbal notes, a fresh and well-balanced citrus acidity leads into a clean and crisp finish.

title: Château de Fontenay Le Secret
Description: The contrast between the minerality of Chenin and the round aromas of Chardonnay brings to mind sweet and savoury cuisine. Fresh and fragrant with the first sip, it gradually reveals its substance and complexity.

title: Pietro Cassina Lucilla Bianco
Description: Pale yellow in colour with an intense, persistent nose, characterized by fresh white flowers, thyme, young pineapple. Dry white wine with balanced acidity and salts, light minerality. Elegant aperitif for all moments of the day, or serve with fish, steamed and grilled vegetables, soft cheeses.

title: Arribas do Douro White Wine 2017
Description: Made with aged vines, this is a quite well structured wine, presents a very balanced aroma with citrus and orchard fruit notes, such as pear, some vegetal and light nuances of minerals. Fruity, fresh and with nice acidity, this wine is the perfect pair for very smooth meals, soft cheese or any sort of fish.

title: Arribas do Douro Superior White 2018
Description: Citrine in colour with some minerality and a light touch of wood provided from the aging in French oak barrels.

title: Siegrist Sauvignon Blanc VDP Gutswein 2019
Description: Intense fragrance of blackcurrant blossom, exotic fruits, like lychee, mango and kiwi. Generous mouth feeling, complex with a refreshing acidity and light mineral finish. Serve with goat cheese with honey, fish, seafood, white meat, Asian cuisine, sushi.

title: Calabretta Minnella 2019
Description: Fresh and fruity, with notes of citrus and vegetal hints. Agile, fresh and easy drinking, with savory aromas and a characteristic sulphurous hint. Medium body with a dry finish.

title: Château de Fontenay Le Sauvignon 2018
Description: 100% Sauvignon Blanc from Touraine with a bright yellow colour and silver hints. It has a very refined nose with notes of white flowers and fruits. Beautiful balance, fresh and lively on the mouth it has a nice length. Enjoyed on its own, with grilled fish or goat cheese!

title: Anthea Alvarinho
Description: Pale straw with citrine shades. Biscuit and fruity aromas, namely citrus and white peach. Complex and powerful palate, with a fine structure and vibrant acidity. Slight evolution notes. Serve at 6ºC to 8ºC.

title: Esk Valley Riesling 2019
Description: This is a fruit forward style of Riesling. It is very aromatic, displaying a medley of tropical fruits, citrus aromatics and flavours. Its rich and mouthfilling but has a freshness of acidity that gives the wine length and a medium dry palate. Delicious on its own or as an aperitif or enjoy with Asian or seafood inspired dishes.

title: Vidal Estate Chardonnay 2019
Description: Enticing aromas of citrus, stone fruit and subtle French oak combine on a vibrant, balanced fruit-driven palate. This wine can be enjoyed on its own or served with fresh seasonal produce.

title: Clai Ottocento Bijeli 2016
Description: Ottocento is a cuvée made of Malvazija, Sauvignon Blanc and Pinot Grigio. Percent of the varietals varies from harvest to harvest depending on the yield. Even though Malvazija often prevails in the wine, Pinot Grigio influences the pink colour of the Ottocento. This biodynamic wine shows attractive aromas and a full-bodied palate packed with rich dried fruits such as apricot, complemented by a nutty dry finish refreshed by a mineral salts note. Serve between 14 to 15 C. (Andrew Rose - Decanter - 91 points)

title: Posip Korta Katarina 2018
Description: Golden-greenish colour in the glass provides an appealing appearance of the Posip wine. It has an intense citrus scent, mixed with white stone fruits and field flowers. Full and delicious, with a gentle bitterness. Extremely fresh and easy drinking, dry wine. Ideally served with seafood dishes, particularly shellfish and crab.

title: Hobo Winery Camp Chardonnay 2019
Description: A fresh wine with aromas of tropical fruit salad over a hint of creamy vanilla. Tree fruit makes up the backbone of this crisp, Sonoma County Chardonnay which is fermented in stainless steel followed by some time in oak. The 2015 vintage was awarded 90 points by Decanter and 91 points by Wine Enthusiast.

title: Beauty in Chaos Chardonnay 2018
Description: The 2018 growing season began with a hot spring and early summer but finished cool; an ideal situation for maintaining balance and freshness while achieving ripe, fruity white wines. This Chardonnay has a touch of tropical fruit underlying the melon and pear, and its crisp, driving acidity makes it a great food wine. Try it with chicken, salmon or pork chops. (Vintages panel, Nov. 2019)

title: Comparini Tenuta di Poggimele Chardonnay IGT 2016
Description: Tenuta di Poggimele is 100% Chardonnay. It ages for 8 months in French oak barriques before bottling. 2016 vintage has notes of white flowers, and apricots with an almond and honey background. Mouth is smooth and fresh.

title: Comparini Tenuta di Poggimele Chardonnay IGT 2017
Description: Tenuta di Poggimele is 100% Chardonnay. It ages for 8 months in French oak barriques before bottling. 2017 vintage has notes of white flowers, honey and apricots with an almond background. Mouth is smooth and fresh.

title: Domaine Hatzimichalis Assyrtiko Alepotrypa 2019
Description: Pale lemon colour. Pronounced citrus and floral aromas such as lemon, passion fruit and jasmine. Its volcanic aspect is evident, with notes of wet sea rocks. The aromas are evident on the mouth as well, with lemon dominating. Medium to full body, high crisp acidity and refreshing  aftertaste. It could get really balanced when aged for a few years.

title: Franco Roero Chardonnay 2019
Description: 100% Chardonnay grapes from Monferrato vineyards. Pale yellow colour. Fruity nose of banana, golden apple and sweet spices. In the mouth is fruity, very lean with a good structure, a nice acidity and a good freshness and honey notes. Very simple, not so dry neither so mineral. The final is short with sweetish aftertaste.

title: Ferrari-Carano Fumé Blanc North Coast 2019
Description: This wine has delicious aromas and flavours of grapefruit, lemon grass, lychee, pear, citrus, orange blossom, peach and a touch of minerality. The Fumé Blanc has bright acidity and crisp freshness from the cool, stainless steel tank fermentation, while the subtle oak character from neutral French oak barrels adds body, complexity and depth.

title: St.Hubert's The Stag Santa Barbara 2019
Description: Aromatically beautiful with an inviting mix of white peach, lemon oil and kiwi floral notes. The palate is fresh, elegant and balanced. Flavours of grapefruit, Asian pear, lime and subtle graham cracker spice emerge with a long, lingering finish. With generous layers of vibrant citrus and white floral notes, this medium bodied Chardonnay offers a plush texture and balanced acidity with a long, flavourful finish.

title: Villa Maria Private Bin Riesling 2019
Description: Bright lifted aromas reminiscent of spring, floral perfume, fresh lemon and limes jump out of the glass. The palate is light and crisp showing juicy apricot and mandarin flavours with a hint of ginger spice. This Private Bin Riesling is an off-dry style displaying excellent fruit sweetness balanced with zesty sherbet-like acidity on the finish.

title: Joao M Barbosa Vinha no Vale Branco 2019
Description: Beautiful expression of Malvasia, clean mineral notes with lemon citrus fruit and a subtle buttery vanilla finish. Enjoy as an aperitif or pair with poultry, fish and cheeses.
By:: Soc. Ag. Joao T.M. Barbosa + F

title: Brusa Di Marengo Diego Langhe Nascetta 2019
Description: 100% Nascetta, obtained from a local autochthonous vine. The soil is limestone dough tending to clayey. Fermented in stainless steel with control temperature. Before the release is aged for an extra 6 months in steel. The colour is bright straw yellow. The savoury and mineral flavour is accompanied by a fine and elegant fragrance.
By:: Az. Agricola Ca Brusa Di Marengo Di

title: Coronica Malvazija 2019
Description: On the nose it is floral and green. On the palate, it is salty, majestically minerally, very fresh with a long finish. The Mediterranean bouquet makes this wine an ideal partner for fish and seafood dishes, but served at slightly higher temperatures pair well with white meat and white truffle dishes. It is recommended that the serving temperature be between 8 - 12 ° C depending on the type of food with which it is paired.

title: Nemea Winery Malagouzia PGI Peloponnese White Wine 2019
No Es Pituko Chardonnay 2020
Description: New from 3rd gen winemaking family Echeverria; 'No Es Pituko' (IT AIN'T FANCY'). Project between winemaking duo Robert Echev & Victor Rivera. 100% Natural Wines. Sustainable, single vineyard, wild-fermented, unfiltered.

title: Villa Maria Private Bin Gewurztraminer 2019
Description: This delicious wine shows perfumed and classic varietal aromas of lychee, honey, rose petal and ginger spice. The palate reveals similar flavours delivered with lovely richness and seamless texture, leading to an off-dry finish.

title: Lykos Chardonnay PGI Sterea Ellada 2018
Description: Bright golden-green colour with rich aromas of tropical fruits and notes of honey against a vanilla backdrop. Mature, rich, refined palate with a complex vanilla aftertaste.

title: Domaine Serge Dagueneau et Filles Pouilly-Fume Clos des Chaudoux 2018
Description: Noble, fresh and deeply aromatic on the clear nose, with flinty aromas of star fruit, yeast, herbs and bacon, this is a firmly structured, dense, rich, full-bodied and powerful late harvest Sauvignon Blanc. Lots of complexity to this one.

title: Kindzmarauli Marani Kisi 2019
Description: Expressive aroma of ripe tropical fruits. Lively bouquet and harmonious taste with mineral and citrus hints. Pleasant, light aftertaste.

title: Kindzmarauli Marani Mtsvane 2019
Description: With a soft green hue and ripe fruit aroma with delicate notes of herbs and acacia flowers. Soft and harmonious taste with notes of ripe fruits, melons and pears. Long, light and sweet aftertaste.

title: Kindzmarauli Marani Pirosmani White 2019
Description: Delicate aroma with floral and fruity notes, honey and citrus nuances. Harmonious and velvety with soft notes of yellow fruits and white pepper.

title: Forgeron Cellars Blacksmith Blanc 2018
Description: A handy array of fresh peaches and apricots leads to a smoothly juicy palate with a fresh and fleshy edge. The balance is good and some nice tannins smooth the finish out nice and even. 58% viognier and 42% roussanne. Drink now [to 2025]. Score - 91. (jamessuckling.com, July 5, 2019)

title: Ella Chardonnay Reserva Apalta 2018
Description: Crispy and fresh. Nice orange blossom aromas together with some herbs and summer fruits. On palate is tasty, with a lovely natural acidity and a pleasant end.

title: Barberani Calcaia Muffa Nobile 2016
Description: The autumn fogs hanging over the Calcaia create noble rot, or Botrytis. This special wine is rich, perfumed and concentrated, with complexed earthy and honeyed notes, and great presence and persistence.

title: Cap Royal Bordeaux Sauvignon Blanc 2019
Description: 100% Sauvignon Blanc. Pure and refined, with white almond finesse over creamy depths. The lime, melon and blossom fruit is ample, sustained and exciting. Super stuff.  Score - 90. (Decanter World Wine Awards, 2020)

title: Onx Wines Field Day White 2018
Description: Pineapple, passion fruit, and green apple tones are overlaid by a beautiful bouquet of white freesia, oleander, and honeysuckle that create layers of both crisp and ripe aromas. The palate is greeted with an entry of healthy acidity that bolsters citrus flavours of lime pith, tangelos, and sweet limoncello. The moderate to high acidity is balanced out in the mid palate by notes of meringue, peach, and lychee followed by a last burst of acidity on the finish that provides an exclamation point to the taste.

title: Vineland Estates Bo-teek Vineyard Clone 76 Chardonnay 2017
Description: Alluring aromas of Golden Delicious apple and honey-drizzled pear abound. It blankets the palate with a medium-full bodied, nicely textured stream of lemon curd and piquant spice interwoven with tang-laden pizzazz and a lengthy and mineral-tinged finish and aftertaste. This is rich, tasty, interesting and worthy of your attention. Give this a try with roast festive bird or crown roast of pork-now to 2028.  Score - 92. (Vic Harradine, winecurrent.com, Dec. 8, 2020)

title: Villa Maria Vidal Estate Pinot Gris 2020
Description: Gold NZ International Wine show - Aromas and flavours of spiced pear, red apple and quince lead into a softly textured palate which is balanced by natural acidity and a gentle dry finish. Food matches: Seafood, pork, chicken or salads.

title: Foradori Fuoripista Pinot Grigio 2019
Description: Pinot Grigio 'Fuoripista' is a very expressive wine, vinified in terracotta jars on the skins. Rosé gold, engaging macerated hints due to the longer stay on the skins, from savory finish and tannins that closes the drink. Pretty and textural with pear, grapes and apple fruit. A real beauty to it and fine spicy notes.

title: Dona Matilde White 2019
Description: Citrine in colour with an intense and fresh aroma of tropical notes mainly passion fruit and some notes of lemon. In the mouth, the wine is voluptuous with a lot of structure and, at the same time, a balanced and natural acidity, which gives a lot of freshness and a long and persistent finish.

title: Felsengartenkellerei Blanc de Blancs 2019
Description: Incredible brilliant shades of straw yellow interlaced with golden hues. It has a firm, elegant and slightly fruity bouquet on the nose married to a soft, velvety mouth-feel with a taste of lychee, passion fruits, as well as mature pears. Pairs well with seafood, roast pork and veal.

title: Pinho Real White 2019
Description: This wine displays a lovely citrine colour. On the palate young, fresh, slighlty feminine, elegant and perfect acidity. Elegant and fruity aromas on the nose.

title: Kessler-Zink Silvaner Dry 2019
Description: Soft and delicate aroma with floral-fruity composition, with dominated notes of yellow apples. Harmonious, fresh, with balanced acidity. Light finish with citrus notes.

title: Kessler-Zink Pinot Blanc Semi-dry 2019
Description: Very mild, light-bodied with notes of grapefruit rind, peach, apricot and cantaloupe.

title: Kessler-Zink Pinot Gris Dry 2019
Description: Full-bodied and dry with fresh, unoaked orchard fruit and a crisp texture. Peach and apple notes are balanced with great fresh acidity.

title: Montecarlo DOC Bianco 2019
Description: Known as the 'Italian Chablis' Montecarlo Bianco has a very intense scent of fresh fruit and a hint of pleasant floral notes. It's crisp with a well balanced finish. The complexity of this wine is the blend of six different grapes, which makes it very fruity. The best serving temperature is 8-10° C. Pairs with vegetable appetizers, cheese, cold cuts and seafood, or just on it's own. It's a perfect wine for a hot summer day!

title: Davis Bynum Virginia's Block Sauvignon Blanc 2019
Description: Our 2019 vintage opens with bright grapefruit and quince notes highlighted by lime and herbal tones in the background. The body is supple with vibrant acidity creating a unique contrast on the palate with sweet and tart flavours featured prominently.

title: Ruelas White IGP 2019
Description: Citrus coloured wine, with fruity and fresh aromas. Good acidity and balanced in the mouth, with a pleasant end of taste.

title: Lello White 2019
Description: Clear, citrus yellow in colour. With a young and fresh nose it is marked by tropical notes in which aromas like pineapple and mango predominate along with boxwood nuances. In the mouth it is fresh with a pleasant acidity, balanced by excellent volume with passion fruit aromas. Recommended serving temperature: 8 to 10 °C. Excellent as an aperitif or with light dishes, salads, fish and shellfish.

title: Jraghatspanyan White Dry 2018
Description: Floral, fruit delicate aroma with shades of almonds and beeswax, harmonious, fruit taste with balanced acidity.

title: Kamara Pure Stalisma Dry White 2019
Description: With a beauty heady concentration fo honeysuckle, ripe quince, elderflower, and jasmine, this is long and smooth on the waxen palate, carrying pine nuts, yuzu to a pithy, salted citrus finish. Lovely balance here between mineral freshness, concentrated yellow fruits, and exotic spices.

title: Domaine Gavalas Vilana 2019
Description: A dry white wine made from Vilana (100%) a unique indigenous grape variety of Crete. Crystal white colour with aromas of citrus and peach. Enjoy it with fresh salads, seafood and white meat.

title: Cavino Irida Sauvignon Blanc 2019
Description: Bright yellow colour with green hues. Peach, exotic fruits and asparagus on the nose. Balanced in the mouth with good acidity and volume. Citrus aftertaste.

title: Mylonas Winery Malagousia 2020
Description: The wine is bright lemon colour with a green hue. On the nose, lots of prominent aromas of spring flowers, stone and tropical fruit such as peach and mango combined with herbaceous notes. On the palate, the wine is rich with balanced acidity. The length is long; the fruit profile follows the nose showing tart and ripe peach and mango with an herbaceous finish.

title: Leyda Kadún Single Vineyard Sauvignon Gris 2016
Description: Leyda has 5 hectares planted to sauvignon gris in the Leyda zone, near the sea. This gris has a delicious saline side, but the best part is the texture, which is creamy and silky, yet that is marked by knife-sharp acidity at the same time. Although it lacks the exuberant aromas of sauvignon blanc, this variety has a much better sensation on the palate - it's covert, caressing it with a finish that's slightly mineral, but also fruity and refreshing. This is for crab meat.   Score - 93. (Patricio Tapia, guiadescorchados.cl, 2019)

title: Green Leaf Organic Riesling 2019
Description: Crafted in a modern, approachable style, this Riesling is fruity and dry, with apple, peach and yellow plum. The richness of the fruit is well-balanced by the wine's freshness and lift, which also makes this a great food wine. Pair with grilled sausages or mildly spiced vegetarian curry.

title: 13th Street Expression Riesling 2019
Description: The new Expression wines at 13th Street replace the Palette series beginning with the 2019 vintage. It's themed around the new art gallery and is an 'expression of the winemaker's style' and the 'vineyard's terroir.' The Riesling shows zippy lemon, lime and crisp apple on the nose. It's off-dry on the palate with sweet-tart citrus, apple, peach and nicely balanced on the finish. Score - 88. (Rick VanSickle, winesinniagara.com, Oct. 19, 2020)

title: Kabola Malvazija Amfora 2017
Description: This wine features a wonderful straw-yellow colour with a golden sheen. It is crystal clear and full-bodied. The bouquet opens with notes of quince compote, followed by dry fern, star anise, vanilla and herbs. This wine is dry, partly warm and soft, while retaining a crisp freshness, mild tannins, excellent minerality and full body. This is a wonderfully balanced wine with an intense flavour and a long finish. It is harmonious and flavourful with notes of butter, ripe peach and bitter almond in the aftertaste.

title: Daskalaki Sera White 2019
Description: Dry white wine with a gold colour and green hues. A blend of Sauvignon Blanc and Plyto, which is a rare Cretan variety. It has a rich fruity character with hints of citrus flavours. Ideal with poultry, fish and light sauces. Gold Medal 2019 Berliner Wein Trophy and Gold Medal 2019 Frankfurt International Trophy.

title: Biblia Chora Pangeon Areti White PGI 2018
Description: Wine is bright with a pale yellow colour. On the nose, the wine offers beautiful aromas of citrus, lemon and grapefruit. On the palate, the wine is fresh and elegant with aromas of almonds and citrus. Areti White offers a fantastic combination of freshness and purity. Organic Pairings: Fresh oysters.

title: Manousakis Nostos Romeiko 2019
Description: Bright, moderate to bright lemon-green colour with slow and rich legs. Nose with high intensity. Unripe gooseberry, grassy notes, and some marzipan. Medium bodies and fresh mouth with intense flavour of white stone fruit. Long finish of citrus and grassy notes. Our Romeiko is best paired as an aperitif in the company of good friends, fresh salads, and raw seafood.

title: Isonzo Del Friuli Sauvignon Blanc DOC 2018
Description: Pale straw yellow shimmering with greenish highlights. The spacious, beautifully orchestrated bouquet ranges from sage to elderflower and tropical fruits. Distinctively dry, full-flavoured palate with a plush, distinctive texture. A wine to serve with spring vegetables or substantial, elaborate rice and pasta dishes. Outstanding with shellfish and crustaceans.

title: Abbotts & Delaunay Les Fruits Sauvages Chardonnay 2019
Description: This Chardonnay is sourced from several growing areas, each selected for particular attributes. The grapes from Cévennes bring freshness, those from Limoux's Aude Valley introduce aromatic fruit tones to the bouquet, and those grown in Hérault add richness. Partially fermented in oak with the rest in stainless steel, this is an easy-drinking, concentrated wine that will be great with roast chicken.

title: KESSLER-ZINK Chardonnay Dry 2018
Description: A fresh, fruity wine with a scent of berries.

title: Terre Degli Osci Falanghina IGT 2019
Description: The wine is pale gold in colour with a green-gold hue. There are aromas of white stone fruit supported by exotic fruit notes of pineapple and gooseberries. There are also subtle grassy, vegetal notes along with notes of wet slate. On the palate the nuances that were present on the nose are confirmed, with the mineral notes really being dominant. This wine has exceptional minerality and acidity, with a long and riveting finish. Pairs well with tomato salads, young cheeses or simply as a summer sipper on the patio. Drink 2019-2022

title: KESSLER-ZINK Riesling Dry 2018
Description: This wine has a fine, fruity scent of ripe fruit and full taste.

title: Isonzo del Friuli Pinot Grigio DOC 2018
Description: Fascinating greenish yellow, crystalline and consistent, with the first nose stony notes and oxidized notes, the minerality and the wood mark the step with their presence, elder flowers, pineapple, lime, white grapefruit, then the wine has a phase stall, a stand-by of the aromas, reopens with gravely notes, walnut husk, an interesting wine but sitting, in the mouth the softness and flavour are the most interesting things.

title: Diamantopetra White 2019
Description: Diamantopetra White 2019 Bright yellow colour with aromas of dried fruits, nuts, citrus and notes of pineapple, apricot and vanilla. Crisp acidity, long finish and aftertaste of apricot and vanilla. Pairing: Seafood, fish and smoked yellow cheese. Awards: Thessaloniki International 2019 - Silver medal (2018 vintage), Decanter World wine 2018 - Silver medal (2017 vintage).

title: Menade Verdejo Organic 2019
Description: Menade Verdejo Organic 2019 Dry, balanced and tasty. Brimming with concentrated varietal and mineral aromas; its pronounced white fruits vie with attractive herbaceous elements such as laurel, thyme and fennel.

title: Bianco di Morgante 2019
Description: Made with 100% Nero d'Avola but vinified as a white wine, this bright wine offers aromas of white stone fruit and honeysuckle. The fresh palate features juicy pink grapefruit and white almond before a tangy saline finish. Score - 89. (Kerin O'Keefe, Wine Enthusiast, Dec. 1, 2020)

title: Cave de Beblenheim Heimberger Réserve Particulière Pinot Blanc 2019
Description: Cave de Beblenheim is a cooperative created in 1952 by a group of small-farm wine growers. This wine was grown in a vineyard of stone, marl and limestone, so look for mineral notes in addition to crunchy orchard fruit. It'll pair well with chicken spiced with pepper, cloves, nutmeg and ginger.[Concours Général Paris did not include a tasting note.] Score - Silver. (Concours Général Paris, 2020)

title: Tesch Karthäuser Riesling Trocken 2018
Description: Floral and herbal elements mark the nose, with saffron details leading the way and extending on the palate, meeting flavors of ripe lime, yellow apple and white pepper. Very pure and focused, but needs a bit more time for the acidity to mellow. Best from 2022 through 2032. Score - 93. (Aleksandar Zecevic, winespectator.com, Feb. 29, 2020)

title: Nikolaou Moschofilero Organic 2019
Description: Vivid light yellow colour, concentrated wine with crisp acidity and fruity character of white rose , lemon and orange. 100% Moschofilero

title: Nikolaou Malagouzia Organic 2019
Description: Light gold colour, low acidity combined with a silk character. Sweet aromas of fresh fruit, peaches, roses and apricots.

title: Blank Canvas Sauvignon Blanc Abstract 2017
Description: Crafted by MW Matt Thomson and wife. Oak fermented and matured Sauvignon Blanc that's as much about texture as it is about grapefruit, guava, struck flint, mineral and passionfruit flavours. An impressive wine with power and purity.

title: The Paper Nautilus Sauvignon Blanc 2019
Description: Elegant, sophisticated, alluring and complex bouquet. Aromas and flavours of lemon and peach, apple and grapefruit, lees and fine sweet herb. An abundance of acidity with a contrasting silky texture then flavours that reflect the nose.

title: Ata Rangi Te Wa Sauvignon Blanc 2019
Description: Te Wa, 'time & place' in te reo Maori pays homage to distinctive wine style delivered by stony, alluvial gravels & cool climate of Martinborough Terrace. 100% handpicked to remove any botrytis; made with unconventional methods, using whole bunch fermentation & destemmed skin contact ferments and barrel fermentation.

title: Blank Canvas Gruner Veltliner 2013
Description: Crafted by MW Matt Thomson and wife. 94pts Bob Campbell 'Made from grapes grown in the Rapaura area of Marlborough, with 25% fermented in new and old puncheons before eight months oak maturation. Silken textured wine with orange zest and white pepper flavours plus some tree fruit and nectarine flavours. Subtle, pleasing wine.'

title: Domaine Glinavos Primus Zitsa Dry White 2019
Description: A fine and youthful dry white wine with superb aromas produced from the indigenous grape variety Debina, which is cultivated in the wine region of Zitsa. It is a grape variety which dominates in the area since the 16th century and it is used to produce intense wines of superb quality and freshness. The 'sincerity' of the variety is expressed with unique vitality even from the first sip and its good acidity combines together with its 'body', highlighting the delicate fruity aromas of apple, pear and fresh peach.

title: Elena Walch Pinot Grigio 2019
Description: Architect-turned-winemaker Elena Walch runs this 150-year-old estate with her daughters. Their PG is picked by hand and makes for a juicy, flavourful wine with lovely evocations of pineapple and pear. It'll suit tuna steaks or roast pork. (Vintages panel, Jan. 2020)

title: Marco Felluga Maralba Collio Ribolla Gialla 2019
Description: Along the same lines, the 2019 Collio Ribolla Gialla Maralba is another quality white that has lots to love. Melon, subtle pineapple, and more tropical notes all define the bouquet and it's a soft, fruit-forward white that offers good acidity and a clean finish, all of which is going to allow it to shine with food. Score - 89. (Jeb Dunnuck, jebdunnuck.com, June 24, 2020)

title: AIR Vinho Verde 2019
Description: A bright, aromatic, expressive and complex modern Vinho Verde made from a blend of Loureiro, Avesso and Arinto. Delicate aromas of green apple, orange peel and stony minerality. The palate is light, but textured, with notes of bright citrus, orchard fruit and a salty, long finish.

title: Lourinho White Frisante
Description: Clear, citrine in colour with floral aromas and apricot and mango notes. Smooth and fresh, with balanced acidity and a persistent and refreshing finish.

title: Global Wines Casa de Santar Reserva Dao White 2018
Description: Varietals- 50% Encruzado, 30% Bical, 20% Cerceal Branco. Defined citrine colour with greenish tones. Fresh aromas with predominance in citric, exotic & complexity notes. Fresh taste, fruity, unctuous, complex & persistent. Serve as an appetizer or pair it with mild spiced fish dishes, white or red grilled meat. Drink at 10C.

title: Valle Da Fonte DOC Douro White 2019
Description: Rich ruby red; black cherry, ripe currants, and blueberry notes with a dusting of cocoa and cassis; dark fruits focus on the center of the palate then steadily permeate the mouth; focused acidity, balanced with gripping tannins, carry the rich dark fruit flavours to a long seductive finish.

title: Cambridge Road Down the Rabbit Hole 2020
Description: 100% Sauvignon Blanc. The new Rabbit exhibits intense aromas of a tropical diversity. A delicate balance between sweetness and acid gives this fruit forward Sauvignon an approachability, even for those who would not usually gravitate towards this variety. A little more tannin than most due to skin contact gives the wine extra drive and palate weight.

title: Cambridge Road Naturalist Rose Pet Nat 2020
Description: Pinot Gris, Riesling, Chardonnay, Sauvingon and Syrah from Martinborough and Gisborne.The Naturalist is our sparkling wine made in the usual cloudy raw fashion. Nothing added or taken away, just organic grape juice wild fermented under cap in the style of a Pettilant Natural; this wine is slightly off dry but carries a good acidity.

title: Matua Pinot Grigio Marlborough
Description: An inviting pinot grigio from an award-winning winery. Pale straw, with aromas and flavours of baked pear, white peach, citrus and white flower. It's light-bodied and crisp with a refreshingly clean finish. Try with rotisserie chicken alongside fingerling potatoes or seared scallops with a lemon butter drizzle.

title: Pelee Island Lola Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: A worthy addition to the acclaimed Lola series of wines from Pelee Island Winery. This white is crisp and refreshing with lemon-lime, fresh melon and floral aroma followed by green apple, pear, and citrus flavours on the finish. Great on its own or paired with light seafood and fish dishes, poultry or pork.

title: Pedra Alta Pedra a Pedra Branco 2018
Description: A refreshing, aromatic, textured Douro white made from a blend of indigenous Portuguese grapes (Rabigato and Gouveio) from the property's highest vineyards (450 MASL). Harvested by hand early in the morning from vines aged between 15 and 26 years-old, grapes are whole-bunch pressed and fermented via wild yeasts. Matured in stainless steel for 6 months sur lie.
By:: Vinhos Quinta Da Pedra Alta, Sa

title: Quinta de Pacos Prazo da Cotovia Moscatel Galego Branco 2019
Description: Quinta de Pacos has belonged to the same family for more than 400 years and 15 generations, maintaining a tradition of expertise on winemaking in the region of Minho. Crafted from an elegantly scented grape and rich in flavour, this wine is a treat at this value price and uniquely dry.

title: Tinpot Hut McKee Vineyard Gruner Veltliner 2017
Description: 'A stylish expression; the elegantly lifted bouquet shows Gala apple, lemon peel, oatmeal and subtle spice aromas, followed by a succulent palate that is beautifully weighted and rounded. It is texturally appealing with lovely fruit vibrancy, leading to a lengthy engaging finish.' Sam Kim, 93 Points Wine Orbit

title: The Hunting Lodge Expressions Sauvignon Blanc 2019
Description: ***LATE ARRIVAL. PRODUCT NOT CURRENTLY AVAILABLE.***Wonderfully fruited and immediately appealing, the wine shows passionfruit, feijoa, lime peel and subtle musky characters on the nose, followed by a succulent palate that is both powerful and delicious. It's pristine and vibrant, and fabulously drinkable. At its best: now to 2022. Score - 93. (Sam Kim, wineorbit.co.nz, Nov. 2020)
By:: Brix & Co Ltd The Hunting Lodge

title: Sottal White 2019
Description: Pale citrine, deriving from its method of vinification. Fresh aroma, with an appealing and fragrant aroma of Muscat grape. Fresh and light, with notes of tropical fruits. Well balanced finish for a wine.

title: PAGINA Encruzado IGP Lisboa 2019
Description: Varietal Encruzado from Lisboa sustainably harvested from two tiny vineyards. The wine undergoes partial fermentation in French oak barrels with acacia tops, followed by a 150 days bâtonnage. It has a lemon color, and aromas of yellow orchard fruits, with some notes of honey and light toast from the oak. Great balance and fine acidity. An oily texture that is both mouthcoating yet fresh. Lovely long and complex finish.
By:: Romana Vini - Vinhos E Culturas, Ld

title: 9 Fields Sauvignon Blanc Robertson Valley 2019
Description: Straw colour. Aromas of soft papaya, tropical fruit jam on scones, pipi du chat, and golden beets with a supple, crisp, dryish light body and a smooth, quick guanabana finish with no oak flavour. A solid Sauvignon Blanc for the table.
By:: Black Falls Brewing Company Pty Ltd

title: Dampt Freres Petit Chablis Kosher 2017
Description: Old vines (50-70 years old) that gives a beautiful expression of the Chardonnay. Bright and intense yellow colour with hints of green. On the nose, it's fresh and crisp with notes of pepper mint and flowers. Round and fruity in the mouth, it develops notes of exotic fruits.

title: COZs Pop White 2019
Description: 100% Vital - COZ's POP 2019 is a white wine made from old vines, made with the Vital grape from Serra de Montejunto. 2019 is a year with a final cycle of rapid maturation in the mountains and produced rich, but well-defined wines. Medium body, fresh green fruit aromas, refreshing and crisp with a dry finish.

title: Channing Daughters Scuttlehole Chardonnay 2019
Description: Made in stainless steel without any malolactic conversion and completely unoaked, this 100% Chardonnay is 100% vivacious, juicy and fruit-forward. Crunchy apple, pear and lemon notes are joined by a bracing mineral quality.

title: Jacob's Creek Moscato Lower Sugar
Description: This low sugar moscato is geared towards the health-conscious consumer. It's packed with inviting aromas and flavours of citrus and pear, along with floral notes. It's light-bodied and fruity with a kiss of sweetness on the refreshingly clean finish. Pair with watermelon and feta salad or grilled Cajun shrimp over rice.

title: Thirty Bench Winemaker's Blend Riesling
Description: From the Beamsville Bench, one of Niagara's best spots for growing Riesling. A classic, featuring ripe peach, pear and lemon flavours, refreshing acidity and a hint of spice. Makes any meal special, from simple ham-and-brie sandwiches to foie gras.

title: Bouchard Père & Fils Macon-Lugny Saint-Pierre
Description: The Macon region is the most southerly region of Burgundy, and the warmer climate is reflected in wines that show richness and intensity of flavour. LIfted aromas and flavours of nutmeg, roasted nuts, toast and canned pineapple. Serve with fish and seafood dishes, roasted chicken or a selection of fine cheeses.

title: 20 Bees Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: Bees are hardworking, unselfish and in tune with their environment - all qualities that also describe Ontario winegrowers! Pale yellow colour, with aromas of grapefruit zest, wild flowers, yellow plum and melon. Medium-bodied and extra dry with a fresh finish. Serve with grilled chicken salad, smoked salmon or as a starter.

title: Pasqua Soave DOC
Description: Pale straw; delicate nutty, yeasty and citrus aromas and flavours with a hint of bitter almond; extra dry and fresh with a clean finish.

title: Woodbridge By Robert Mondavi Chardonnay
Description: The colour is a bright pale lemon; aromas of ripe pear and buttered toast are joined by hints of spicy vanilla; the wine is extra dry and medium-bodied with balanced acidity framing notes  of ripe pear, toast and vanilla; a medium length finish, with honey and toasted oak notes balanced by lemony acidity.

title: The Beachhouse Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Pale straw colour; grass, citrus aromas with light smoky, savory touches; dry, medium body; flavours match the aromas, with balanced, clean finish.

title: Inniskillin Riesling Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: Pale straw colour; waxy, delicate floral, pear, melon, peach and herbal aromas; dry, medium bodied with pear and melon fruit and herbal flavours; fresh, clean finish.

title: Sandbanks Shoreline Chardonnay Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: Sandbanks have been one of the leading wineries in Prince Edward County since 2003. A blend of unoaked chardonnay and pinot grigio that offers floral, pear, fig, melon and mango notes. Medium-bodied and extra dry with a finish that is delicate yet flavourful. Serve with seafood salad, Cajun cuisine or use in a Sangria.

title: Black Tower Rivaner
Description: Pale straw colour; floral, fragrant pear and peach aromas with citrus and spicy notes; medium sweet with floral fruit and balanced acidity.

title: White House Wine Co. Riesling Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: Pale lemon colour; delicate pear, tobacco, fig, herbal and nutmeg aromas; dry, medium body with fresh pear, tobacco and fig flavours.

title: Ironstone Obsession Symphony California
Description: The symphony grape variety is an Ironstone specialty, and it thrives in California's Lodi appellation. Aromas and flavours of orange blossom, peach, pear, ginger and nutmeg. Off-dry and medium-bodied with balanced fresh acidity and a crisp, clean finish. Serve with spicy cuisine or grilled fruit.

title: Oyster Bay Chardonnay
Description: A real crowd-pleasing Chardonnay that shows there's more to New Zealand than Sauvignon Blanc. Apple, melon, lemon and well-handled oak - a model for trendy cool-climate Chard. Oysters are an obvious match, but try with sautéed fish or grilled pork chops.

title: Paco & Lola Albariño
Description: This is a lively, zesty wine. Created by a co-operative of 428 growers that was formed in 2005, it's characteristically floral, with citrus, peach and pear notes. A good option as a sipper or for pairing with summer salads or seafood.

title: Jackson-Triggs Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Pale straw; floral & grassy aromas; dry, light-body, with gooseberry and citrus flavours & finish.Pale straw colour with a lively nose of lemon and green apple with a hint of herbs; fruit character is replayed on the palate; crisp and dry, with medium body.

title: Rodney Strong Charlotte's Home Sauvignon Blanc
Description: The Charlotte's Home Sauvignon Blanc vineyard was established in 1971, and fruit from this site continues to be the basis for this wine. It's zesty and bright, with tropical fruit, lemon grass, grapefruit and honeydew melon notes. A great wine for salads, seafood or creamy goat cheese.

title: Trius Pinot Grigio VQA
Description: Situated on Niagara-on-the-Lake, Trius has been creating quality wines for over three decades. This Pinot Grigio has aromas and flavours of nuts, citrus and herbs. Balanced and refreshing on the palate with a pleasant cleansing finish.

title: Pelee Island Pinot Grigio
Description: A perfect addition when hosting, this offering has lively aromas and flavours of nuts, fresh fig, herbs and toast. Medium-bodied and fresh, it finishes with vibrant acidity and echoes the nuts and fig notes.

title: Magnotta Pinot Grigio Venture Series VQA
Description: Magnotta is a family-owned winery and one of the largest in Ontario. This pinot grigio is pale straw in colour and exhibits aromas of nuts, citrus, smoke, fig and melon. Medium-bodied this is a vibrant wine with a refreshingly clean finish.

title: Peller Estates Family Series Chardonnay VQA
Description: Medium straw; floral, apple, lemon & oak aromas; dry, crisp with green apple & pear flavours.Medium straw colour; vanilla, smoky oak and yellow plum/pear aromas with a hint of hazelnuts; dry, medium bodied, soft acidity, with yellow plum/pear flavours.

title: Mezzacorona Pinot Grigio
Description: Pale straw colour; fresh, berry, cantaloupe and fruity pear nose with a touch of spice; medium body, clean and fresh with berry and melon flavours and pear and spice on the finish.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Dry White
Description: Pale yellow straw; grapefruit, yellow melon and floral aromas; extra dry with soft round fruit flavours and light tropical fruit notes; easy drinking wine.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Sauvignon Blanc
Description: A crisp, easy drinking white in an easy to serve box. In the glass, it's a pale, lemon green colour. On the nose the wine exhibits, forward aromas of grapefruit, herb, lemon and melon with light tropical, pear and grassy notes. The palate is dry, light-bodied and crisp with light peach, apple, melon and citrus flavours.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Pinot Grigio
Description: Easy drinking, refreshing white wine, sourced from vineyards in Canada and around the world. Shows aromas of cantaloupe, yellow berries and pear with a hint of chocolate. Extra dry, medium-bodied with refreshing melon, berries and pear flavours. Perfect for casual sipping or pair with light fare, salads and appetizers.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Pinot Grigio
Description: Easy drinking, refreshing white wine, sourced from vineyards in Canada and around the world. Shows aromas of cantaloupe, yellow berries and pear with a hint of chocolate. Extra dry, medium-bodied with refreshing melon, berries and pear flavours. Perfect for casual sipping or pair with light fare, salads and appetizers.

title: XOXO Moscato
Description: This wine lemon in colour and it is intensely aromatic with aromas and flavours of white melon, pear, white flowers, spice and herbs. It's fresh and medium sweet with a pleasant crackle on the palate which makes it perfect for weekend brunch, afternoon casual get-togethers, fresh fruit salad or spicier fare.

title: Comuna Chardonnay Pinot Grigio
Description: Comuna is an area in Argentina where the Tango originated. This fragrant blend will sweep you off your feet, with its aromas and flavours of citrus, quince, vanilla, mushrooms and yellow pear. Fresh and clean on the palate with lifted citrus and quince notes on the finish. A crowd-pleasing blend.

title: Pelee Island Lola Chardonnay VQA
Description: Lola first arrived as a rosé and won our hearts; now you can try their food-friendly chardonnay. It has appealing notes of apple, melon, citrus and spice. This wine is aromatic and flavourful with a long-lasting finish. Pair it with grilled halibut over a bed of rice, or a soft cheese plate with crackers and grapes.

title: Trinity Oaks Chardonnay
Description: Partnering with Trees for the Future, a nonprofit that's planted over 180 million trees, Trinity Oaks plants one tree per bottle purchased. The grapes come from sustainably farmed vineyards. Its juicy citrus and pear flavours, hints of oak toast and vanilla and silky finish pair nicely with chicken pot pie or creamy pasta.

title: Peller Family Vineyards Light Pinot Grigio
Description: This pinot grigio is lighter in alcohol without compromising on flavour. On your first sip you will experience flavours of biscuit, pear and melon, then herbal and nutty notes on the finish. Excellent with lightly spiced grilled chicken, fish and chips, California rolls, shrimp skewers or grilled vegetables.

title: Woodbridge By Robert Mondavi Pinot Grigio
Description: Attention to detail creates the quality and consistency that Woodbridge wines are known for. This appealing pinot grigio boasts citrus, cantaloupe, floral, and mineral notes.  It's light-bodied and crisp with a palate-cleansing finish. Serve as an aperitif or with shrimp or seared scallops.

title: Château Thieuley Francis Courselle Blanc 2010
Description: Wood aging has given this a spicy feel. It's rich, full bodied and textured with a citrus tang. The texture is creamy, with pear and grapefruit notes. Age for another two years.  Score - 90. (Roger Voss, Wine Enthusiast, Sept. 2012)

title: Clarence Dillon Clarendelle Blanc 2018
Description: Beeswax and honey, lemon curd and toast are all delightfully expressed in this classic Bordelaise blend. . A notable value, the wine is 'inspired by Haut-Brion' as it is made under the auspices the great grandson of Clarence Dillon, proprietor of Chateau Haut-Brion and is produced by the same team as the revered Château. Despite its concentration, it is delisiously drinkable right now. Showing gentle and welcome maturity. [Drink to 2022+] Score - 92. (Sara d'Amato, winealign.com, April 10, 2020)

title: Strewn Gewürztraminer 2014
Description: A fine example of Ontario Gewürzt. You can expect this to play all the correct notes, offering floral tones with suggestions of tropical fruit and lychee, with a mineral underpinning. The palate will be balanced, crisp, lush and round, with a citrus edge to the replays.Gewurztraminer in Ontario is a hit-and-miss kind of thing but occasionally someone hits the bull's-eye. In this case it was Strewn winery with their 2014 Gewurz. Alsace is the yardstick by which all Grewuztraminer are measured and this one stacks up very well for varietal typicity. Pale straw in colour, it has that characteristic lychee and rose petal nose and Turkish delight flavour, finishing elegantly dry on a pear-like note. Score - 4 Stars (out of 5). (Tony Aspler, tonyaspler.com, Feb. 2016)

title: La Crema Russian River Valley Chardonnay 2017
Description: The largest production cuvée, the 2017 Chardonnay is still beautiful, with a richer, rounded, style. Ripe pineapple, citrus, white flowers, and brioche define the nose. Medium-bodied, rounded, and supple on the palate, with beautiful fruit, this is one seriously pleasure-bent beauty that represents a good value. Drink date: 2019-2021.  Score - 91. (Jeb Dunnuck, jebdunnuck.com, June 14, 2019)

title: Pieropan La Rocca Soave Classico 2017
Description: A glorious Soave with cooked-apple, pear, honey and stone aromas and flavors. Full-bodied, layered and fruity with peach and light pineapple character on the finish. Drink and enjoy [through 2023+]. Score - 94. (jamessuckling.com, Nov. 7, 2019)

title: Domaine Bonnard Sancerre 2019
Description: As a gift or served as part of your holiday meal, benchmark expressions of benchmark styles are always a winning choice. This one is sourced from calcareous soils, Kimmeridgian marl and siliceous (flinty) clay, which contribute to the fine flinty mineral component you will encounter. Expect mouth-watering acidity, with bright citrus, gooseberry, tropical fruit and grass tones.

title: Weingut Burg Ravensburg Husarenkappe Riesling 2013
Description: If you're drawn to the exotic, this is a sensational pick that shows complexity, balance and structure. It opens to the aromas of tropical fruits with a tinge of assertive minerality. From there, it expands on the palate with dense fruit and a fresh character that lingers on a sustained fade.

title: Marchesi di Barolo Gavi del Comune di Gavi 2018
Description: Marchesi di Barolo has been a major contributor to successful dining for over five generations. The wines for Gavi di Gavi are made from the Cortese grape and must come from the township of Gavi itself. They tend to have more heft and impact than wines from the larger Gavi DOCG. Expect a floral, bright wine with juicy apple, lemon and underlying mineral. Perfect for sipping or for seafood dishes.

title: Piat D'Or Chardonnay
Description: This Chardonnay has aromas of citrus, apple and pear, and is fresh with fruity flavours.

title: 13th Street White Palette 2018
Description: The 2018 vintage marked the 20th anniversary of 13th Street. A blend of 94% Riesling and 6% Gewürztraminer, this virtually leaps from the glass with gorgeous aromas of spring flowers, cinnamon-spiced apple, sweet grapefruit and lemon. It's zesty and bright with a subtle suggestion of sweetness and a citrusy finish, and will pair nicely with seafood or salads. (Vintages panel, July 2019)

title: Burrowing Owl Estate Bottled Chardonnay 2017
Description: Burrowing Owl is one of Canada's standout producers, raising the bar year in and year out with wines such as this. It's always a wine of significance and complexity, with ripe tropical notes, peach, pineapple and mineral all artfully delineated. Look for a sexy caramel introduced by the barrel fermentation and ageing. Consider pairing this fresh, long Chardonnay with grilled pork loin and grilled peaches.

title: Moscatel De Favaios 10 Years
Description: A fine blend from several wine harvests (1989, 1999 & 2004) this Moscatel has an average age of 10 years. The blend of young and older vintages enriches the resulting aroma, flavour and complexity. The younger wines impart aromas of tangerine, orange peel, lime and roses. The aged wines provide a toasted flavour with the aromas of dried fruits, honey and caramel. It is an ideal wine to accompany desserts.

title: Gehringer Brothers Dry Rock Vineyards Unoaked Chardonnay 2018
Description: Founded in 1985, Gehringer Brothers is one of the oldest family-run estate wineries in the Okanagan. Expect this Chardonnay to have apple, pear and citrus tones and a long, creamy finish. Great with seafood or lighter picnic-style meals. [The Indy International Wine Competition did not include a tasting note.] Score - Gold. (Indy International Wine Competition, 2019)

title: Marqués de Murrieta Capellanía Reserva Blanco
Santa Julia Organic Torrontés 2018
Description: The Santa Julia Winery was the first in Mendoza to earn Fair for Life certification, which ensures that human rights are safeguarded at all stages of production, workers enjoy good and fair working conditions and smallholder farmers receive a fair share. This Torrontés offers aromas of stone fruit and orange blossom, with ripe peach, lime and spice joining on the palate. Crisp and long with delectable complexity. Ideal for fish or tofu-based dishes. (Vintages panel, Aug. 2018)

title: Knee Deep Kim's Chardonnay 2013
Description: This limited release Chardonnay is a complex and beautiful expression of a classic Wilyabrup Chardonnay. White peach, lemon curd and floral hints are woven into crisp, clean acid and tones of melon and orange zest. A great wine for food matching, try with duck breast sous vide, pork belly, creamy chicken, pasta and crisp salads.

title: Schreiber Riesling Sonnenberg Dry 2014
Description: This one offers exceptional affordability for a Riesling that shows such distinct character. Note the smoky bouquet of black pepper and licorice that precedes the bright flavours of wild fruit, mint and juicy berries.

title: Schreiber Riesling Hungerbien Kabinett Dry 2014
Description: A can't-miss proposition at this price, this white unveils a medley of tropical fruit notes on the nose before summoning more assertive flavours of lemon and a quenching acidity.

title: Blue Riesling Auslese Rheinhessen 2014
Description: A unique approach to making a Riesling of distinctive character, this release is produced by choosing only overripe grapes, which results in a succulently fruity and full-bodied wine. Concentrated notes of apricot, nectarine and honey lead the way and persist for a lengthy finish.

title: Thyrsus 2014
Description: A vibrant blend of Malagousia and Viognier, this bright yellow, dry Macedonian white features an elegant nose of acacia flower, pear, violet and white peaches. Tropical fruits and honey inform the palate and linger seductively. Fresh shellfish or a simple roast chicken would make a great accompaniment.

title: Louis Jadot Beaune Bressandres 2013
Description: This rare white wine is associating richness and vivacity, which is why it is well balanced and very attractive. It will perfectly match fish, cooked shellfish, and hot pâté.

title: Sijnn White 2013
Description: Pair your next succulent seafood feast or creamy chicken dish with this white. It flows with fresh fruit flavours and aromas flecked with honey and nutty notes all wrapped in an appealing texture.

title: Chateau De Chaintres Cremant De Loire Blanc De Noir
Description: A pure and intense nose of yellow fruits with marks of peach. The mouth is very well balanced, with flavours of lemon. Fleshy and long, this brut wine pairs well with grilled fish, aperitifs, desserts or fruits.

title: Château La Nerthe Clos de Beauvenir Châteauneuf-du-Pape Blanc 2016
Description: Transparent yellow. Smoky, mineral-accented citrus and orchard fruits on the nose, along with a suave floral nuance and a touch of iodine. Sappy, concentrated and lively on the palate, offering pear liqueur, tangerine, honey and buttered toast flavors that are given spine and lift by a core of juicy acidity. Emphatically echoes the mineral and pear notes and shows excellent delineation on a long, seamless finish. Drinking window: 2022-2030. Score - 94. (Josh Raynolds, vinous.com, Oct. 2018)

title: Refugio Tiradora Sauvignon Blanc 2015
Description: Deeply flavourful and showing an appealing grip on the palate, this white leads with an array of bright aromas that embrace the citrus-infused orchard fruit. That freshness translates so seamlessly to the palate with unequivocal vim. It has fabulous acidity and a shimmering finish.

title: Refugio Ranch Viognier 2014
Description: Flowing with personality and fresh with full-bodied flavours, this is the embodiment of a classic Viognier. Dense layers of fruit, including peach, tangerine and apricot and a whisper of jasmine, wow the taste buds and tease out a clean, lengthy finish.

title: Billaud-Simon Montée de Tonnerre Chablis 1er Cru 2017
Description: The 2017 Chablis Montée de Tonnerre 1er Cru offers a super-intriguing mix of floral notes, citrus, almond, mint and white pepper. Lifted and precise with striking translucency, the Montée is really expressive today. Because of the lower yields in this vintage, 2017 was done entirely in oak. It is unquestionably a very fine wine, but it lacks that extra touch of purity that in top years can elevate wines from this site even more. Drinking window: 2022-2032. Score - 93. (Antonio Galloni, vinous.com, Jan. 2020)

title: Whitehaven Greg Reserve Sauvignon Blanc 2019
Description: Filled with youthful exuberance expressed through vibrant pear and tropical fruit notes. There's a lovely sweet herb undercurrent that adds great character. A juicy, fresh wine that will be delicious on its own or paired with king crab. (Vintages panel, Oct. 2019)

title: Hagafen Chardonnay Napa 2015
Description: The fluency of aromas, flavours and textures playing out in this release are testament to the winemaker's art. Detect fragrant lemon and butterscotch that open into juicier shades of apple, Asian pear and a honeyed note. An undercurrent of oak ties it all together over a prolonged finish.

title: Hagafen Napa Sauvignon Blanc 2016
Description: Who doesn't admire a reliable dining mate that shows such verve of character and subtlety of balance? Beautifully rounded, glowing aromas of fruit open to juicier aspects of mango and peach. A tweak of acidity frames the flavours and rides out a wholly satisfying finish.

title: La Famiglia Vermentino 2013
Description: Irresistible fruit fragrances occupy the upper reaches, while subtler honeydew and green apple notes serve as an anchor around which a crisp, refreshing body quenches. A slight minerality lends that extra refinement for a clipped, satisfying finish.

title: Saale-Unstrut Grauburgunder Spätlese Dry 2015
Description: A swirl of pear, apple and dried fruit flavours unfolds in this traditional Pinot Gris and presents a medium level of acidity on the finish. It finds easy companionship with any manner of white meat mains.

title: Celista Tierra Blanco 2016
Description: A blend of Viognier and Chardonnay grapes grown in Catalonia, the northernmost wine region of Spain, this approachable white has hints of citrus with balanced acidity, making it a great match for roasted chicken, grilled fish and clam chowder.

title: Tobacco Road Pinot Grigio 2016
Description: There's a strong Italian influence in Australia's King Valley and this crisp Pinot Grigio pays homage to that heritage. Lifted citrus, green apple and pear aromas follow through to the crisp palate that is balanced with hints of spicy complexity and a clean and zesty finish.

title: Gapsted Moscato 2016
Description: From the heart of the Victoria wine region comes this pale gold Moscato with intense aromas of tropical fruit, cantaloupe and lemongrass. These aromas lead to a palate bursting with passionfruit, citrus and crushed grape flavours. The finish is fruity and refreshing with a zesty spritz that pairs beautifully with creamy coconut-based curries.

title: Gapstead Valley Selection Pinot Gris 2016
Description: Italian Pinot Gris meets Australian winemaking and the result is this straw-coloured stunner with white peach and blanched almond on the nose and flavours of crisp pear, nectarine and lime zest. Food-friendly and approachable, it's well-suited to dishes like trout almondine or clams.

title: IE Mendocino Chardonnay 2015
Description: Pristine clarity, a lean, medium body, organic fruit and a vibrant acidity are just the start of the conversation. What defines a terrific white is how those characteristics come together and are woven around fruit-forward flavours and aromas of peach and quince. This wine has limited availability.

title: Louis Jadot Domaine Duc De Magenta Morgeot Clos De La Chapelle Monopole 2013
Description: The 2013 Chassagne Montrachet 1er Cru Morgeot Clos de la Chapelle has a very attractive bouquet that is well defined, with scents of yellow plum, honeysuckle and jasmine billowing from the glass. The palate is very well balanced with a crisp line of acidity, good tension here from start to finish, though conservative and linear, not wishing to put a foot wrong.

title: Dona Isidora Chardonnay 2016
Description: This wine stands out by its elegance and complexness. It shows the character of the region and reveals the unique character of hand selected grapes. Both bouquet and taste are distinguished by delicate fruity notes. Enjoy this wine as accompaniment to meat, fish or pasta.

title: Dona Isidora Sauvignon Blanc 2016
Description: Our Galan Sauvignon Blanc varietal possesses fruity and fresh flavours like melon and peach. Light to medium bodied. Serve with white meat, fish and pasta.

title: Ironstone Chardonnay 2018
Description: Ironstone Vineyards is owned and operated by the Kautz family, who were the first to plant Chardonnay in the Lodi region. Five months' ageing in French oak imparts this wine's classic vanilla and upfront toasty oak notes. Expect a rich, ripe, tropical wine with a creamy texture. Enjoy it tonight with smoky pulled pork, roast turkey or pork chops.

title: Colomé Torrontés 2019
Description: Plenty of lemon-rind, white-peach and green-apple aromas follow through to a full-bodied, firm and fresh palate and a long, lingering finish. Shows tightness and crispness down the line. Drink now. Score - 93. (James Suckling, jamessuckling.com, April 2, 2020)

title: Muses Estate Clio White 2016
Description: Named for the Valley of the Muses northwest of Athens where the grapes are grown, this vibrant blend of Assyrtiko and Roditis is fresh and crisp with a lemon, green apple acidity and a round, juicy finish. Enjoy it with seafood, fish, lobster and crayfish, poultry or pork in white sauces and wild goat cheeses.

title: Hugel Gentil 2017
Description: Luminous pale straw-green. Delicious aromas and flavors of apple, nectarine, chamomile and gentle spices. Fruity, juicy and refined; harmonious acidity lifts the stone fruit and mineral nuances. A very complex blend of 40% Sylvaner, plus mostly Pinot Blanc Auxerrois, Riesling, and Pinot Gris, and a little Gewürztraminer, Muscat Ottonel and Muscat d'Alsace. Drinking window: 2019-2022. Score - 90. (Ian D'Agata, vinous.com, Jan. 2019)

title: Tomh White 2016
Description: This bright, crystal clear Moschofilero from the Peloponnese exudes fragrant aromas of incense, citrus and nutmeg. Full-bodied with a long, pleasant, bergamot finish, this is an excellent companion for halibut in lemon butter sauce or grilled sardines with fresh herbs.

title: Masi Masianco Pinot Grigio & Verduzzo
Description: Made using a blend of freshly-harvested pinot grigio and semi-dried verduzzo grapes. Enjoy floral aromas and flavours of citrus and nuts with mineral and honeyed notes. The wine is medium bodied with soft acidity and clean finish. Serve with hors d'oeuvres, fish or white meats.

title: Bien Nacido Vineyards Chardonnay 2018
Description: Energetic aromas of lemon peel, crushed chalk, shiso leaf, crushed oyster shells and light mint show on the sizzling nose of this bottling. The palate is fascinatingly mineral-driven, offering wet rocks and more seashells, but also waves of tangerine cream and grapefruit peel. Drink now through 2038. Ranked #39 in Wine Enthusiast's Top 100 Cellar Selections of 2020.  Score - 95. (Matt Kettman, Wine Enthusiast, Dec. 1, 2020)

title: Schloss Vollrads Riesling Grosses Gewächs 2014
Description: Germany is home to note-perfect Rieslings, as is illustrated by the stunning character of this release. Layers of concentrated fruit flavours unfold on the palate with full-bodied firmness. Plummy sweetness and grapefruit edginess are framed with touches of lemon zest.

title: Hautes Pierre Blanc 2015
Description: Light gold yellow colour with amber highlights. Refined and complex aromas with scents of white fruits, dried and preserved fruits, pear, peach followed by hints of toasted almonds. Superb finesse, full bodied and rich with hints of pear and peach with a long, velvety finish. Serve with richly flavoured dishes based on poultry or veal, ripe and goat cheese, foie gras, asparagus, desserts, after-dinner sipping.

title: Tenuta Mezzadria Passerina IGT 2016
Description: Boasting pretty floral notes combined with hints of citrus, lime, tangerine and apricot, this fine Passerina is fresh and dry. Balanced with excellent acidity, it makes a fine dinner companion to seafood chowder or spinach salad.
By:: Tenimenti Le Ginestre Srl Societa A

title: Cilento Fiano DOP Cumale 2016
Description: A fine white from southern Italy that's crafted from the indigenous fiano grape. Expect bright aromas and flavours of citrus, yellow apple, pear and herb with notes of anise and raw nut. On the palate, this is fresh and lively with a zesty mineral-like finish. Serve on its own or paired with antipasti and light fish.

title: Von Hövel Hütte Oberemmel Spätlese 2015
Description: Expressive passion fruit flavours and a vivid acidity lend an appealing sweetness without tipping the scales. The mineral backbone provides the refined balance, while a sustained finish lets the flavours gradually fade.

title: William Fèvre Bougros Côte Bouguerots Chablis Grand Cru 2017
Description: The 2017 Chablis Bougros Côte Bouguerots Grand Cru is mind-bending. Usually a more powerful Chablis, in 2017 the Côte Bouguerots is airy, weighty and beautifully lifted, with pretty floral and saline notes that confer a great deal of freshness. The 2017 opens up beautifully with time in the glass, showing tons of volume and resonance, all retaining its bright, sculpted personality. Drinking window: 2025-2037. Score - 96. (Antonio Galloni, vinous.com, Jan. 2020)

title: Les Cantarelles Blanc 2016
Description: Gastronomic white wine for pairing with a fish dish or shellfish. The nose is elegant, expressive and original with flavours of candied lemon and sweet spices. Aged in oak barrels for 6 months. Bronze Medal-Concours des Vins de Nimes 2017

title: Coppola Director's Chardonnay 2017
Description: This Chardonnay is balanced, bright and complex, with the apple, lemon and oak spice well-integrated and well-knit. The 2017 vintage gave lower than normal yields, resulting in exceptional high-quality fruit and wines of even greater concentration. Try this with seafood or grilled chicken dishes.[The California State Fair did not include a tasting note.] Score - 95. (California State Fair, 2019)
By:: Francis Ford Coppola Pres Rosso & B

title: Luna Nuda Pinot Grigio 2019
Description: Castelfeder is family-owned, founded in 1970 by Alfons Giovanett. It's now under the stewardship of the fourth generation. 'Luna Nuda' ('Naked Moon') describes a bright full moon shining in a clear night sky over the vineyards; a sight considered both beautiful and inspirational. Expect a delicately aromatic wine with notes of apple, citrus and white flowers. Enjoy with lemon-dressed baked fish.

title: Helexo Retsina 2016
Description: A dry and crisp retsina rich with lemon and smooth pine tasting notes, the long aftertaste is clean and fresh. This light- to medium-bodied retsina makes an ideal accompaniment to traditional Greek cuisine, of course, but also works with charcuterie and fried fish.

title: Kanakaris Ano Polis Roditis Chardonnay 2016
Description: Crisp, food-friendly Roditis, a local specialty in Western Greece is blended with Chardonnay to create a wine redolent with red apple, fresh pear and melon aromas. Medium-bodied with a slight toasted almond quality on the palate this is a wine made for drinking with grilled fish, vitello tonnato or lighter chicken dishes.

title: Domaine Louis Jadot Les Narvaux Meursault 2018
Description: Cool aromas of green fruit, tangerine peel, acacia blossom and a whiff of oak lead to solidly voluminous, vibrant and mineral-inflected middle weight flavors that possess notably better depth and much better persistence on the bone-dry finale where the only reproach is a touch of warmth. Lovely and worth checking out. Drink: 2026+. Outstanding. Score - 89-91. (Allen Meadows, burghound.com, June 10, 2020)

title: Meiomi Chardonnay 2017
Description: Golden color; soft, toasty nose; smooth and creamy with depth and lovely balance; nicely structured, long, elegant and fresh. Score - 91. (Anthony Dias Blue, bluelifestyle.com, undated)

title: Hess Select Sauvignon Blanc 2016
Description: From the iconic Hess Family Wine Estates, this is sourced from sites planted in both gravelly and volcanic soils. Impressive Sauvignon character on the nose and palate. Grassy, with gooseberry, grapefruit, passion fruit and lemon aromas and flavours. This has some weight on the palate and a soft, creamy mouthfeel. Enjoy with goat cheese, or grilled fish or shrimp. (Vintages panel, Jan. 2017)

title: Küehling-Gillot Nackenheim Riesling 2016
Description: The seductive character of this white slowly reveals itself with each sip. Sweet aromas of fruit are first to appear before a seam of spiciness and herbal notes nudge in. Apricot, gooseberry and more herbal flavours are rounded with a snappy minerality and creamy finish.

title: Küehling-Gillot Qvinterra Grauer Burgunder 2016
Description: Bursting with floral notes and revealing shades of fresh nuts and supple honeydew melon, this white should be considered an easy essential. It's food-friendly, so keep a few bottles stocked and you're always ready to entertain.

title: Château Lazaridi White
Description: A combination of vivacious Sauvignon Blanc with fresh and fruity Ugni Blanc, along with the ancient, Greek variety of Muscat of Alexandria gives this playful blend a bright colour and intense aromas of white-flesh and exotic summer fruits and honey. Try it with fish stew or grilled vegetables.

title: Raven Conspiracy Wicked White VQA
Description: This Wicked White is made from a blend of select Niagara grapes. Look for subtle aromas of apple and citrus with underlying floral notes.  Refreshing, yet off-dry on the palate with flavours of ripe apple, peach and citrus that last until the finish.

title: Domaine Ernest Burn Clos Saint Imer La Chapelle Goldert Pinot Gris 2010
Description: Golden yellow with amber highlights. Very intense dried apricot and canned peach aromas are intensified by spicy botrytis. Creamy on entry, then sweet and suave in the middle, showing precise flavors of orange oil, poached pear, cinnamon apple pie and vanilla bean. Looks, smells and tastes like a sweet wine (it does have 60 g/l residual sugar) but the almost mind-numbing acidity here keeps this wine vibrant on the suave, rich, very long finish, which tastes drier than I would have expected from the numbers. About 50% of the grapes were hit by noble rot at the time of harvest. Score - 95. (Ian D'Agata, vinous.com, Nov. 2012)

title: Mayacamas Chardonnay 2018
Description: Made from decades-old dry-farmed vines planted to the Wente clone in rocky, volcanic soils, this is a stunning wine, flinty, fleshy and expansive, with undeniable minerality. Lemon zest, meringue and pear contrast against persistent acidity and a lasting briny tone that lifts the palate further. Enjoy from 2026-2032. Ranked #7 in Wine Enthusiast's Top 100 Cellar Selections of 2020.  Score - 96. (Virginie Boone, Wine Enthusiast, Aug. 1, 2020)

title: Postumia Verduzzo DOC Lison Pramaggiore
Description: Looking for a crowd-pleasing white? This soft wine from the Veneto region is bright, with intense fruit aromas and a velvety texture. It's a wonderful choice alongside dessert or an after-dinner cheese course.

title: Rodney Strong Sonoma Coast Chardonnay 2015
Description: Golden straw in the glass, the bouquet is an intense aroma of buttered toast. The palate gives way to Meyer lemon, cider apple, and jasmine, with the oak being very well resolved and integrated. Pair to elevate simple fish and vegetable dishes. Extraordinary, Ultimate Recommendation. Score - 96. (Ultimate Wine Challenge, 2018)

title: Vive La Vie Blanc Colombard Gros Manseng Vin De France
Description: Pouring a clear pale lemon colour, this wine is fragrant with aromas of floral and pear. The palate is dry, light-bodied and offers zingy acidity with flavours or citrus and light tropical notes followed by a medium length, crisp finish.
By:: Les Grands Chais De France Sa

title: La Chapelle de Lafaurie-Peyraguey 2015
Description: Brimming with peaches, mangoes and papaya on the nose, this is so bright and enticing. Then you take a sip and you have the classic richness and creaminess of Sauternes married to an uplifting freshness. The finish is long and elegant. Score - 93. (jamessuckling.com, Feb. 5, 2018)

title: Old Coach Road Sauvignon Blanc 2019
Description: The wine is fabulously aromatic on the nose showing passionfruit, feijoa, kiwifruit and lemon zest characters, leading to a vibrant palate that is juicy and bright. The wine offers terrific fruit intensity and lively mouthfeel, finishing long and very tasty. At its best: now to 2021. Score - 93. (Sam Kim, wineorbit.co.nz, July 2019)

title: Domaine François Lumpp Clos des Vignes Rondes Givry 2017
Description: Moderate wood influence and reduction overpower the underlying fruit today. Otherwise there is both fine volume and vibrancy to the rich and relatively full-bodied flavors that deliver excellent length on the saline-inflected finish. Lovely stuff and worth your interest. Drink: 2021+. Outstanding. Score - 89-92. (Allen Meadows, burghound.com, Oct. 15, 2018)

title: SEXY White 2016
Description: A blend of local and international varietals (including Viognier) from the Alentejo region, this white offers peach aromas with a hint of citrus. Lots of stone fruit on the palate and a kiss of creaminess and spice from oak make it a good match for creamy pastas.

title: Open Riesling Gewürztraminer VQA
Description: Clear, pale straw colour; floral, peach and ripe pear; dry, with these plus herb and melon flavours with fresh citrus finish.

title: Poço Do Lobo Espumante White 2015
Description: From just east of the Atlantic in Bairrada, this sparkling wine is intensely perfumed with citrus blossoms, honey, toast, pineapple and peach. Enjoy its fresh, dry and well-balanced taste with fish and chips or fried seafood.
By:: Caves Sao Joao - Sociedade Dos Vinh

title: Tara White Wine 1 Chardonnay 2016
Description: Like the rest of the 2016s, I am truly impressed by the 2016 White Wine 1 Chardonnay. It's a cloudy and unfiltered Chardonnay with no varietal aromas, but it has a vibrant and lively palate with pungent flavors, great acidity and a salty, extremely tasty finish. This is unique?not just in Chile but in the whole world. These wines from Huasco are produced from extreme vineyards in an oasis created by the Huasco river in the south of the Atacama desert, planted on limestone-rich soils with a high content of salt that clearly gives them a saline finish. The palate has the austerity of the limestone soils, serious and textured. Drink date: 2018-2024. Score - 94+. (Luis Gutiérrez, robertparker.com, Oct. 31, 2018)

title: Six Eight Nine White Wine 2015
Description: This unconventional blend of Chardonnay, Sauvignon Blanc, Viognier and Muscat was aged in a combination of French oak and stainless steel. Floral, fruity, soft and round, it's got a lovely creaminess to the mouthfeel and a touch of spice on the finish. Wow! (Vintages panel, Jan. 2017)

title: The White Knight Viognier 2015
Description: Fermented and aged in stainless steel, this Viognier is expressive in ultra-aromatics and texture. With just a dab of Chardonnay blended in, the flavor sensation and scents of just-ripened white peaches and honeyed apples offer a sumptuous quality. White petals bloom, while lemon-dill edges in to add a crisp tonality. Score - 91. (Meridith May, The Tasting Panel Magazine, March 2017)

title: Atma White 2017
Description: Hailing from the hills of Macedonia, this brilliant, light yellow wine is a blend of Malagousia and Xinomavro grapes. Light floral aromas and sweet exotic fruits, banana and honeysuckle are buoyed by a fresh, light, silky mouthfeel and linger in the long and pleasant aftertaste.

title: Giesen The Brothers Sauvignon Blanc 2016
Description: From the cooler climate of the Awatere Valley, this medium-bodied Sauvignon Blanc offers aromas of nettle and gooseberry, opening up to flavours of grapefruit and pineapple. Its plumpness makes it a perfect match for rich seafood or roast chicken.

title: Henri de Villamont Les Embazées Chassagne-Montrachet 1er Cru 2016
Description: Henri de Villamont vinifies its wines in historic 18th-century vaulted cellars. This Chassagne-Montrachet 1er Cru comes to Vintages from those very cellars. Vintage after vintage, this is an impressively balanced, mineral expression. Expect this 2016 to show beautifully through 2030.

title: Alain Corcia Montagny 1er Cru 2015
Description: To the eye, these wines present the classic features of a burgundian Chardonnay: limpid, pale gold colour with green highlights. Aromas of acacia, mayflower, honeysuckle, bramble flowers. Touches of hazelnut and white peach. In the mouth, the wine is always fresh, young at heart, frisky, alluring, and rich in spicy back-flavours. Refinement and delicacy are harmoniously matched to a durably well-built structure.
By:: Prestige Des Grands Vins De Fr

title: Concha Y Toro Frontera Sauvignon Blanc
Description: Pale lemon with a green hue; aromas of white citrus, green apple and gooseberry; flavours of lemon-lime, lemongrass and mineral; dry, medium-high acidity, medium body, with a lingering finish of citrus zest.

title: J.J. Vincent Marie-Antoinette Pouilly-Fuissé 2019
Description: Sourced from prime sites across the appellation including parcels from Le Clos, Les Brûlés and Les Combettes, this Pouilly-Fuissé is vinified in stainless steel and sees only approximately 25% time in oak. The aim is to create a youthful wine with impactful freshness. Vincent calls this wine refreshing and crisp, with layered tones of apple, peach and vanilla.

title: Fortes Family Wine Sauvignon Blanc 2016
Description: Be the gracious guest who knows to bring a wine that will find easy pairing possibilities with a range of dishes. Combining expressive fresh fruit notes suggesting lemongrass and fig, vibrant body and firm acidity, consider your return invitation a sure thing.
By:: The Trojan Trust Operating As Forte

title: Honoro Vera Blanco Rueda DO
